story:
Amaya Accessories is one year old!

One year ago this month, I launched Amaya Accessories from my home in Washington, DC. 

It was a dream come true: My own space, where I could design and make unique, handmade accessories--necklaces inspired by Matisse's cut-outs; handbags repurposed from upholstery remnants; earrings made from crochet.

Over the year, I connected with independent women artisans to collaborate on new designs and items. I offered jewelry-making workshops to children and clients. And I learned the ins and outs of social media to keep the business going during these complicated times.

Now, after securing a business license and building a loyal client base, it's time to grow!

 

The 2020 Campaign: From Start-Up to Sustainable!

I'm looking for backers who will help my woman-owned, independent business thrive in 2021.

You can donate straight out, but I'd actually prefer if you leave the "Contribution" box blank and click on  one of the "perks boxes" instead. That way, your contribution not only provides some funds, but also gets more of my products out in the world--which is the best advertising there is. So please look at the perks--if there's nothing right for you, start your holiday shopping early!

My goal is to infuse the business with $1200 to start 2021 strong.  $800 will go toward the creation of new collections, including a line of earrings inspired by the artwork of Colombian artist Omar Rayo and some awesome new laptop bags handmade from upcycled upholstery remnants. The remaining funds will help me launch a social media ad campaign to expand my reach.

story:
"We want a healthier you on a healthier planet, that is why we have invented the world’s smartest watch". 

  • Swiss award-winning engineering
  • Automatic self-winding timepiece by default
  • Transforming 100% clean kinetic energy into electrical power
  • Generating a "world record" power autonomy
  • »Smart on demand« concept, for ultimate user experience 
  • Equipped with high-precision sensors, that track all your activities
  • Daily performance always visible in real time by mechanical hands
  • Unique technology, saving millions of batteries per year
  •  Using premium and eco-friendly components   

 Statement by the int. jury: "A smartwatch equipped with a hybrid charging system is an exciting, innovative idea whose sustainability is convincing". 

All your activities are tracked and automatically stored, ready to sync anytime you want.

The SuperCharger² is built from the ground up as a "smart on demand" device designed for efficiency using energy only when it's needed. It’s so easy,  just double tap the crown to wirelessly sync with our cutting-edge Sequent BioFeedback app that runs on your Android or iPhone. 

 

 

 

 

The SuperCharger² shows your daily movement on the activity semi-circle that track your progress all day long, in real time. 

The goal is simply, to fill up your semi-circle each day!

"Understanding all the ways you move throughout the day, is an essential part of living a healthy and balanced life" 

 

Designed for performance and power efficiency, the SuperCharger² self-charging technology is saving millions of batteries, spearheading the development of smartwatch technology, reducing effectively the carbon footprint. 

 

 

  • Automatic self-winding timepiece by default

  • Transforming 100% clean kinetic energy into electrical power  by simple wearing it on your wrist 

  • Providing a "world record" power autonomy by storing all generated energy in the built-in energy accumulator

  • "Smart on demand" concept, changing from a traditional automatic timepiece into a smartwatch at your convenience.

 

 

Plastic trash has become a serious problem for our eco-system. There’s too much of it, that’s why we teamed up with organizations who know how to recover waste material from the sea and to use it on straps and some of the internal components of the electronics.

 

Together with scientists and recycling experts we have developed a way how to regenerate plastic granules and reverses the damage caused by the UV rays and salt water

 

 

 

 We started SEQUENT in 2015 as an entrepreneurial experiment to create the first kinetic self-charging smartwatch. In 2017, with the help of more than 4000 backers, we raised on Kickstarter and Indiegogo over CHF 1’200’000. Soon after, we have reached out to like-minded people that provide financial support to upscale production and continuous product development, the SuperCharger² project we started in April 2018.

We have teamed up with the most reliable partners such as Kinetron, Braloba and Seiko to deliver the best Hybrid Smartwatches for your wrist, providing the ultimate user experience, sustainable, reliable and autonomous.

DOWNLOAD: Press Release & High Resolution Pictures 

 Estimated Delivery

Each reward tier may have a different estimated shipment month starting from March 2020. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. Alike our first campaign, we will not be selling  SuperCharger² watches in retail until all Kickstarter rewards have been shipped. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

story:
Sinopia Tan

Jet Black

Summary of Features

  • One central slot to accommodate up to 10 Standard ‘Credit Cards’ 
  • A rear pocket slot ideal for carrying up to 10 Folded Bills (based on USD and GBP bill sizes)
  • Embossed Vincoe Logo 
  • RFID Protected Interior Lining 
  • Supple build to prevent the bending of credentials and currency
  • Palm sized for maximum functionality and minimalism 

 

FAQ's

Q: What are the dimensions of the Travel Sleeve?
A: The dimensions are: 3” x 2.7” (8x7cm).


Q: Which colours are available?
A: The Vegetable Tanned Leather comes in Sinopia Tan and Midnight Black. 

Q: Are the colours exactly as pictured?
A: All the pictures are taken under bright studio lighting as such perception of colour may alter slightly upon receipt of goods.

Q: What leather do you use?
A: We use the finest Italian Vegetable Tanned Leather that has been tanned through a process lasting at least two months.

Q: How much does shipping cost?
A: We offer free worldwide shipping. Always.

 

Shipping Details

We offer Free Tracked Shipping Worldwide. Once your order has been received, the wallet will be shipped within 2 weeks (excl. public holidays).

You will then receive a tracking number for DHL eCommerce (or another service if we can make it arrive faster)

 

Refund & Return Policy

If you are unhappy with your wallet(s) you may do one of two things:

  • If it does not function as described, you may return it for a full refund and the return shipping.
  • If it is fully functional, you may return it for a refund (minus a restocking fee of $15) but please note that in this instance you will not be refunded the return shipping.

Please note: In order to begin the returns process, you must email us (within 7 days of receipt).

All items should be returned in original condition and in the original packaging.

story:
The Style Guide provides instant outfit suggestions for any occasion, season, or clothing item, using photos from the best menswear sites online.

The Style Guide is a free new website that organizes thousands of men's style photographs (from your favorite magazines, blogs, & fashion brands) into an interactive and easy-to-use platform that provides instant outfit suggestions for any occasion, season, or clothing item. 

All the photos in The Style Guide are hand-picked and meticulously categorized by award-winning menswear expert Dan Trepanier and the team behind his leading men's style website TSBmen.com.

Check out the current beta version to get the basic concept*:www.TSBmen.com/styleguide

*keep in mind this test version was made on a limited budget and our Wordpress platform is not capable of fully supporting it (which is why we need funding to build the new site!) 

The Style Guide solves three problems:

1. ONE-STOP STYLING. Every day millions of guys search the internet for style advice/inspiration, but there isn't one place that brings all of this content together in a way that is easy to navigate. The Style Guide aggregates menswear photos from top-quality sources (men's magazines, street style blogs, fashion brands, etc.) into one expertly-organized platform to help guys find great style.

2. CONTENT MANAGEMENT. The only content currently consumed online is that which is most recently published. After a week or two, photo shoots, magazine articles, and blog posts get lost in the depths of website archives. The Style Guide organizes all of this content for you, and links directly back to the original source of every photo, so it's a great way to find great new sites too. 

3. INSPIRATION + E-COMMERCE. Ever look at a style photo online and wonderwhere you can buy the items right now? You shouldn't have to get your advice/inspiration from one place, then have to search for the products in another. Every item in every photo featured on The Style Guide is instantly shoppable. We've spent over a year developing our shopping algorithm to offer only the best menswear products, offered in three different price points so every guy can afford to upgrade his style. 

"In my opinion, content management is the future of fashion blogging and online publishing. There is just too much great content that is not seen, or that gets lost in the shuffle of the internet."

Our photo library (which is growing daily) is meticulously categorized using the following filter criteria:

1. Occasion
Choose from more than 50 possible occasions for appropriate, and stylish, outfit suggestions. Where are you going?
Ex: beach wedding, job interview, first date.

2. Season/Weather
Choose the season and/or weather in your area to see only seasonal-appropriate outfits. 
Ex: summer, rain, snow, winter. 

3. Clothing Item 
Enter any clothing item in your wardrobe to get instant outfit suggestions that include a similar piece. Chose to narrow the outfit suggestions by item style, color, fabric, and/or pattern.
Ex: Suit (grey, tweed), Button-down shirt (purple, cotton, plaid), Jeans (black)

*ANY COMBINATION WORKS
You can use the outfit filters in any order and any combination. The more filters you select (occasions, seasons, clothing items), the more specific the outfit suggetions get. There are countless combinations in our thousands of photos, and we're adding more and more top-quality conten every day, from the best menswear sources online.  

 

It's not just for TSBmen photos, it's for all the quality menswear sites online. 

 

 

You can sort the results of any particular outfit search by:

  • highest rated
  • most comments
  • most recently added

 

Once you find an outfit that piques your interest, click on it and perform the following functions: 

- Rate the Outfit
- Discover the original source of the image
- Comment & Discuss the outfit with other members of the Style Guide community
- Share it with your friends via email or social media
- Save it to your favorites for later reference 
- SHOP any item featured in the outfit, by choosing from designers in three different price points.

 

Dan Trepanier
Fashion Stylist & Founder of TSBmen.com
Esquire Magazine's "Best Dressed Real Man in America"

"Born and raised on a small farm outside of Windsor Ontario Canada, it has been quite a journey to becoming a fashion stylist in downtown Manhattan.

I came to NYC to attend Columbia University, where I was recruited to play basketball. After playing 4 years of Division 1 hoops and graduating with an Ivy League degree in Psychology, I spent a summer interning on Wall Street and a few months in the buying office at Saks Fifth Avenue before taking my title as Esquire magazine’s “Best Dressed Real Man in America” and running with it."

In 2009 Dan started a men's style blog from his college dorm room, which has grown into one of the most popular online menswear publications worldwide: TSBmen.com. Today he styles, writes and manages TSB full-time with a talented and loyal team. On the side, he serves as a creative consultant for a number of menswear and men's lifestyle businesses. He's worked with hundreds of brands, including names like Ralph Lauren, Nordstrom, Gillette, Allen Edmonds, etc. He's also been featured in dozens of major media publications like Esquire, GQ, and Men's Health.

“Dan Trepanier is a digital entrepreneur who is changing the way men think about style online.” -Men's Health

Alex Crawford
Fashion Photographer
Art Director at TSBmen

"I grew up on a ranch just outside of Houston Texas, spending my weekdays shoveling manure for my mom and weekends hunting with my dad. Needless to say, my first experience with “fashion” was heavily influenced by utility and workwear.

After high school I left home to study photography at Belmont University in Nashville, TN. Moving to “Music City” had a huge influence on me; my artwork changed, my clothes changed, my drinking habits changed (and by changed I mean they didn’t exist before Nashville). I fell in love with Americana and classic Southern style.

After graduation I moved to New York City to work on a Masters in photography from Pratt University in Brooklyn. Shortly thereafter I was introduced to Dan, we hit it off, and TSB hasn't stopped growing since!" 

TSBmen.com, formerly TheStyleBlogger, started as a small men's style blog written from a college dormroom. 

Today we are a full-time team of five in downtown NYC producing and publishing 100% original content for an audience of 1Million+ men (and women) from all over the world (190+ countries). 

Our website and brand is constantly evolving (as is the online content industry) but our goal remains the same: practical, relatable, and inspirational style advice for real guys. 

www.TSBmen.com

We've spent the past two months working closely with one of the leading website development firms here in NYC. We already have an hour-by-hour breakdown of what it will take to bring this new website to life. 

Our developers love the Style Guide concept and they're very excited to get started. 

All we need is funding to give them the green light! 

At $30K we can custom-build the new website as well as dramatically increase our photo library. 

At $50K we can build the Style Guide APP for iPhone, iPad, and Android. 

At $100K we can start building the functionality for members to catalogue their current wardrobes (easier outfit filtering, personalized product suggestions, etc) as well as upload their own outfits into the photo library (share with friends, get expert feedback, etc). 

At $200K we can begin expanding the social aspects of the Style Guide platform. Imagine checking out your friends' profiles, seeing what's new in their wardrobes, rating or commenting on their outfits, receiving instant feedback and/or suggestions on your outfits from friends or experts, etc.

Reward #10 ($500)

ADVERTISE YOUR BRAND on the new Style Guide! A static 300x250 px advertisement above-the-fold with a link to your website on The Style Guide results pages. 125,000 impressions guaranteed ($4 CPM). Once your ad receives 125,000 views it will be automatically removed. The estimated retail value of this ad buy is $1,000 (estimated retail rate: $8 CPM).

Reward #11 ($1,000)

ADVERTISE YOUR BRAND on TSBmen.com! A static 300x250 px advertisement below-the-fold with a link to your website on TSBmen.com post pages. 250,000 impressions guaranteed ($4 CPM). Once your ad receives 250,000 views it will be automatically removed. The retail value of this ad buy is $1,500 (retail rate: $6 CPM).

At the end of every article on TSBmen, we thank our readers. 

Your support allows us to provide free content that challenges the menswear publication industry to offer relatable, unbiased, knowledge-driven content for real guys.

story:
Ta quête pour le soutien-gorge parfait prend fin ici.

SHAPE est le premier soutien-gorge sur-mesure grâce aux technologies 3D.

SHAPE a : 
1.  Tes formes, pas de taille
2. Deux bonnets indépendants ajustés aux asymétries
3. Deux bases de soutien sur-mesure imprimées en 3D en Nylon 
5. Un dos sans agraphes pour ne pas géner ton appui 
6. Des bretelles ajustables selon ton besoin de maintien

( Sur ton téléphone ? Clique sur "Lire l'histoire" pour + de détails)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pour créer Shape, nous avons rencontré 304 seins, du A au I de 16 à 73 ans.

 

            Julie 95D te parle de son SHAPE

            Margaux 85E te parle de son SHAPE

 

 

 

 

 

  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Frais de livraison :  France: 6€, World : 20€

2. Délais de livraison :  entre octobre et février 2019 selon ta ville et la date de la prise de ton empreinte.

3. Retour: si tu n’es pas satisfaite, pas d'inquiétude. Tu disposes de 15 jours pour retourner SHAPE, satisfaite ou remboursée !

4. Prix de vente public : après la campagne, SHAPE sera vendu à 150€.

5. Empreinte : Prise via scan 3D par Iphone, sans rayon X, totalement anonymisé et crypté. Il n’y a ni visage, ni signe distinctif, seulement un nuage de points. Tu as accès à tes données à tout moment. 

6. De la Dentelle ! Tu verras des photos avec un  soutien-gorge en dentelle. C'est un modèle que nous pourrons développer si nous atteignons 400% de notre objectif. La bonne nouvelle ? C'est que si tes bases de support sont déjà imprimées, tu auras juste besoin de commander la partie textile ! 

7. Villes disponibles en France:  Nice, Montpellier, Toulon, Marseille, Toulouse, Nantes, Bordeaux, Lyon, Strasbourg, Lille et Paris.

8. Ma ville n'est pas disponible ? Tu peux commander Worldwide Shape pour commander avec l'application à partir de Février 2019, ou nous écrire à mathilde@endeer.paris pour qu'on essaie de trouver une solution ! 

9. Fabrication 100% Française : Avec le savoir faire des meilleurs ateliers et modélistes français 

10. Contact : Une question ? mathilde@endeer.paris

story:
What if you could have the immersive audio and video experience of a movie theater . . . from the comfort of your own couch?


INTRODUCING CINERA

The headset that’s about to disrupt the entire home theater industry. 



If you love movies, you know that home theaters have long been playing catch up with movie theaters themselves.

Few things are more relaxing than watching the movies you love from the comfort of your own home, on your own time and without spending a dime.

But when you manage to overcome the inconvenience and expense of getting into a movie theater, it’s a cinematic experience like no other.

What’s a movie lover to do?

 

With CINERA, You Can Have It All
 

When you put on CINERA goggles, you enter another world.

Imagine standing in the center of your favorite film. The action happening all around you, sound flying past your ears.

Imagine combining your favorite stories and games with the immersive power of VR, regardless of genre and no matter how they were originally made.

With CINERA, you can dive into it all, watch it all, play it all, hear it all. And you can do it from your own home.

 

The CINERA Difference

At CINERA, we look at things differently.

Instead of asking how we can make your home cinema more like a movie theater, we asked how we could make your home movie-watching, show-streaming, video-gaming experiences better?

 

 All Of Your Favorite Media In Stunning Detail
 

 

Dual 2.5K Resolution (2560 x 1440 x 2)al

With ground-breaking dual 2.5K displays, CINERA is a pioneer in the headset industry. You’ll enjoy all your favorite media at a resolution 8X that of an iPhone 7+ . . . and 3X that of a movie theater screen! 

Check out this video to see what we mean.

 

Get Into the Action with the Best 3D 

Before, the only way to get a high-quality 3D movie experience was at the theater. Now you can watch 3D even better from your couch.

To give the illusion of 3D, most movie theaters project two distinct images onto the same screen through polarizing filters. Your big, plastic glasses filter out the images so one eye sees only one version.

In this process, you lose more than 75% of the light—and the images never quite match up. This is why you often lose the crispness of the images, and why some people even feel nauseous.

 

BETTER 3D THAN THE MOVIE THEATER

CINERA's dual-screen architecture eliminates this problem entirely. Its native stereoscopic display system means each of your eyes has its own individual display panel and light path, there is no filter and no loss of quality. So you can to enjoy brighter, more vivid 3D images than ever before. 


See More Than Ever With Super-Wide Field of View

 

 

ENTHRALLING SCREEN SIZE

A lot of the reason why movie theaters provide such an enthralling experience is because you feel immersed in the film.

Typically this is done by making a physically larger screen. However, bigger doesn’t always mean better.

Your vision consists of two portions: a central portion (30 degrees in either direction of the center), and a peripheral portion (the rest of your vision range).

Even though we perceive objects in our peripheral area as blurred, making an experience truly immersive requires that the visuals extend into that space.

After extensive testing, we believe we have found the perfect combination of clear image and the feeling of immersion: 66 degrees.


Never Miss a Detail

 

 

Dual Screen Solution

Most existing headsets use a single screen and split it down the middle into left and right regions. This leaves each eye with a square-like peephole with an aspect ratio of 0.89.

If you’re wondering why this feels so inadequate, it’s because most movies have an aspect ratio of 2.39. So when you play a movie on a typical headset, to keep the ratio, only about 47% of the screen can be used—rendering over half the pixels useless.



 

With more than half the pixels out of commission, it’s no wonder the image quality suffers.

To give you the highest quality display ever, CINERA provides an entire unique display panel for each eye. Each of these panels are optimized for movie-viewing, letting more than 95% of all the pixels shine.
 

 

More Pixels, More Quality . . . Or Not?


You probably have heard of PPI, or Pixels Per Inch. (Most of us became familiar with the term thanks to Apple’ retina display.)

While PPI can be a helpful stat, it doesn’t tell the entire store. PPI only illustrates the pixel density of a display—not necessarily what the human eye can actually see. Your sight can be affected by a handful of other factors, like distance to the display or optical lens.


PIXELS PER DEGREE (PPD)

Instead, a more efficient way to measure display quality is with PPD—Pixels Per Degree. 

PPD translates to the number of pixels per degree in human vision. The higher the number, the nicer quality image you get to enjoy. Here are a comparison of PPD between CINERA and several other headsets:

 

 

 

All of the Action, None of the Pressure
 

 

Enjoy CINERA with the Burden Free Arm 

*UPDATED ARM*

We added an all-new functionality that allows the arm to connect to the goggles from either the top OR the bottom. Check out these short videos to watch it in action.
 

Connect from the bottom to preserve space
 

Or connect from the top for some more hand-to-mouth clearance.


The last thing you want when you’re watching your favorite media to get fatigued.

Most headsets require you to put the entire stress of their product on your head. This can be burdensome over long stretches of time, leading to discomfort or even health issues.

We totally eliminate this problem, with hands-free CINERA arm.


BRING THE POWER OF THE MOVIE THEATER TO YOUR COUCH

Finally—the comfort of your couch with the high-quality movies you love. With the zero-stress hands-free arm, you’ll be more relaxed than ever.


WATCH MOVIES HOW YOU WANT

With its a easy-to-use built in pump, you can move Cinera to practically any position without a lot of force. You’ll enjoy complete freedom—watch standing, sitting on your couch, or even lying down flat.


PROTECT YOUR HAIR STYLE

Okay, maybe it’s not the first thing you think of when you hear “movie experience.” But it’s true—headsets destroy hairdos.

Someone’s solution was to shave his head! But don’t worry, we’re not going to let you go that far. With the burden-free arm, you’ll end the movie with the same gorgeous hair you had at the start.

BONUS: CONTROL YOUR DRONE CAMERA WITH STYLE 

 

See Why People Love CINERA
 

A Note From Our Designer
 


 

FPV Head Mount

When you aren’t watching movies, Cinera’s First-Person View (FPV) head mount is perfect for flying your drones.

  • High-Quality Display
  • Wide-View Angle
  • Embedded 4-Hour Battery (with head mount)
  • 9-Axis Gyroscope

You’ll be controlling your drone’s camera with a tilt of your head in no time!

Upgrade Your Personal Entertainment

Connect with your favorite devices and applications to take your entertainment to the next level. 

 

WATCH YOUR FAVORITE STREAMING SHOWS

Easily install your favorite streaming apps like Netflix, YouTube, Hulu, and HBOGo. You’ll instantly be able to enjoy the content you love in a gant screen way bigger than your local movie theater.

As another option, you can also play files from your local video archive either using a micro-SD card or your network server.

CONNECT WITH HDMI

Hook up your favorite Blu-ray player, gaming console, or computer with Cinera’s HDMI Input to take your gaming from the little screen to the silver screen.

You feel surrounded by the story—like you’ve been invited for a couple hours to leave your own life and enter someone else’s. No home theater system could ever come close to the enthralling screen size, the gorgeous detail, the heart-racing surround sound.

 

All the Details

* We plan to upgrade CINERA HDMI from 1.4a to 1.4b . We got many requests urging us to upgrade HDMI so as to fully utilize Cinera’s 2.5K ultra high resolution displays. We heard you. Based on our engineering team’s evaluation, it CAN BE DONE! We are working to upgrade Cinera’s HDMI from 1.4a to 1.4b, which supports 2.5K resolution input. 

However, this is still a preliminary analysis, which requires further reviewing and testing. We will release a final update before the campaign ends, so our backers can make a final decision then. But we suggest youto pledge as soon as possible, as the super early bird units are almost all gone.

Cinera and all the Accessories

01: Cinera Headset

02: Power Adapter

03: Micro USB Cable

04: Burden- Free Arm

05: 2-in-1 Mouse and Keyboard Remote (STRETCH GOAL!)

06: FPV Head Mount (Purchased Separately)

 

What they say about Cinera

 


Hello from the Cinera team!

About CINERA


Cinera, Inc., is incorporated in Newark, Delaware.

The company was founded in 2014 by a group of enthusiastic and passionate entrepreneurs who love movies and technology and is scheduled to launch its first product—a head-mounted personal theater system—in the summer of 2017.



Cinera Inc.’s mission is to revitalize the big-screen experience outside a movie theater, so movie lovers could enjoy movies with the highest quality and great convenience with comfort.

 

 

 

Strech Goals

 

We have unlocked our 1st stretch goal! Join us in celebrating by casting your vote for the all-new Cinera color! Backers can use the survey below to cast their vote—so be sure to back us now if you want your voice to be h eard!

We have reached 200K in funds pledged, exceeding our expectations and as such, we are so excited to announce an upcoming stretch goal and new item for all backers: the Cinera 2-in-1 remote control. 

The CINERA 2-IN-1 REMOTE CONTROL is the perfect tool to complete your home theater experience and keep the control in your hands. All backers will have the opportunity to add a 2-in-1 remote control to their purchase in the post-campaign Kickstarter survey.  

When we hit 500k, a Cinera remote control will be added to ALL backer levels for free! It’s our way of saying thank you for your continued support. 

Project Timeline

Project Status

All of Cinera’s major features are developed and are in the fine-tuning stage.

We’ve produced about 50 prototype / test units to iron out all the potential challenges in assembly before making out tooling.

We expect to start production of the tooling in September 2017, and mass production in November 2017. We are very confident the Cinera headsets will be shipped and on their way to you by Christmas 2017!
 

Milestones

Events and Demos

In April 2017 CINERA attended HardwareCon in San Francisco.

There, our team demoed prototype v3 to attendees from every part of the world. CINERA left an extremely strong impression, and we are proud to report that CINERA's design make it very flexible for various sizes of faces and different distances between pupils.

In July 2017, CINERA attended RISE conference exhibition in Hong Kong.

There, our team demoed our latest prototype, v5. We got many “Wow”s when people putting on our headsets. Our booth quickly became one of the most crowded!

(Yes, we got bored and started to make faces when people were experiencing our products, because once they put Cinera on, they didn’t want to take it off! :) )

 

Pledges
 

 

 

 

Risks and challenge

As early as the design stage, many crowdfunding campaigns persuade backers they are legitimate using only words and mock-ups.

However, people are understandably skeptical about promises made by tech and home theater companies. CINERA promises to be more beautiful, more effective, and more enjoyable than ever before, and we understand that this may seem too good to be true.

So, to provide our backers with reassurance that this is the real deal, we delayed our campaign until far into product development. Now, our demo units have even appeared (and impressed!) at various consumer and media events.

We are ready to mass produce, and that’s why we need your help.

All CINERA’s major features are complete. However, we acknowledge that there is risk in going from prototype to mass production. We are doing everything we can to mitigate the risk.

For example, we have already manufactured about 30 full units for demo and evaluation purposes. During this exercise, we critiqued and tested our design from the perspective of quality control and assembly, and we are confident in our decision to move forward.

We need your help acquiring the capital necessary for producing the tooling, which will start immediately after the campaign. We have worked through the timeline and all possible hiccups extensively, and we are very confident that shipment will commence at the end of November or early December.

story:
The Detroit Leather Company has been producing the best in hand-made artisan leather goods since 2007. We strive to bring you top quality products at affordable prices, and every piece in our line is personally designed by our in house artist and constructed right here in the USA. We want you to have clothing and accessories that you can proudly wear for years, and that will serve you well on your epic travels and grand adventures.

 Right now the Detroit Leather Company invites you to take part in our creative process by helping us to fund our brand new Fall 2015 creations. We're offering you our artisan quality goods at fantastic prices in this special Indiegogo campaign. Every dollar you contribute will go to fund the design, prototyping, and production of brand new, never before seen merchandise.

Want to help but can't afford to contribute? Then we invite you to share the Detroit Leather Company campaign online and all over your social media. Who knows? You might help someone find that one of a kind accessory they always wanted. So help however you can and remember that your support helps keep independent artists and small businesses in business.

Classic Goggles Perk $25 - You get one of our handmade black leather Classic Goggles. Your choice of color lens : Gray, Blue, Red, Purple, Yellow, Neon Green. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Alchemical Leather Harness Perk $25- You get one handmade leather harness. Your choice of color : Black,White,Red,Green or Purple. One size fits all and is adjustable. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Aviator Goggle Perk $40 - You get one of our handmade Leather Aviator Goggles. Your choice of color: Black or Brown leather. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Classic Mask Perk $40 - You get one handmade leather Classic Mask. Your choice of color: Black, Brown, Blue, Red, Purple, Green, Yellow, Pink, Gray. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


X-Mask Perk $40 - You get one handmade leather X-Mask. Your choice of  color: Black, Blue, Red, Purple, Green, Yellow, Pink, Neon Green, Grey. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Pin Lock Sketchbook Perk $55 - You get one handmade blank hand bound leather journal/sketchbook for any occasion; 110 sheets (220 pages), and 75lb white paper. The books inside can be swapped out and replaced. Your choice of color: Black or Brown leather. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Timey Wimey Bundle Perk $70 - Spoilers! Call The Doctor as you are going time traveling. You get one handmade blank leather bound journal/sketchbook for any occasion; 110 sheets (220 pages), and 75lb white paper. The books inside can be swapped out and replaced. You also get one pair of our handmade leather 3D Glasses Goggles in white leather with blue and red lenses. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Wasteland Bundle Perk $100- Witness me! while I ride the fury road historic in this Wasteland Bundle. You get one handmade hand tooled wasteland leather mask and one custom handmade hand tooled set of wasteland leather warrior goggles. Your choice of color: "Weathered" Brown or Gray. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.  


Steampunk Skylord Bundle Perk $125 - Be the master of the Steampunk skies or the airship pirate you have always wanted with our Steampunk Skylord bundle. You get one handmade leather Steampunk Mask with steampunk detail work. You get one pair of our handmade leather Aviator Goggles and one handmade leather Tri-Bottle Holder. Your choice of color: Brown or Black. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA. 


Lovecraft Bundle Perk $100 - Heed the Call of C'thulhu and run with the Great Old Ones with our Lovecraft bundle. You get one pair of our handmade leather C'thulhu goggles and one handmade blank leather bound journal/sketchbook for any occasion; 110 sheets (220 pages), and 75lb white paper. The books inside can be swapped out and replaced. Your choice of color for the sketchbook of  Black, Brown, Red, Yellow, or Octopus Purple. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Plague Doctor Mask Perk $155 - The Doctor is in. You get one handmade leather Plague Doctor Mask. This custom hand crafted plague doctor mask comes with the upper mask, and a detachable lower black mask that can be worn separately. One size fits most, and they are adjustable. Your choice of  color: Black, Brown, or White. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.


Domino Mask Perk $20 - Great for any masked superhero or that masked ball you must attend. You get one handmade leather Domino Mask. Your choice of  color: Black, Brown, Blue, Red, Purple, Orange, Green, and White. Free shipping in the continental USA. Add $9.99 if shipping is outside the continental USA.
story_txt:
The Detroit Leather Company has been producing the best in 
hand-made artisan leather goods since 2007. We strive to bring you top 
quality products at affordable prices, and every piece in our line is 
personally designed by our in house artist and constructed right here in
 the USA. We want you to have clothing and accessories that you can 
proudly wear for years, and that will serve you well on your epic 
travels and grand adventures.
 Right now the Detroit Leather Company  invites you to take part in our creative process by helping us 
to fund our brand new Fall 2015 creations. We're offering you our 
artisan quality goods at fantastic prices in this special Indiegogo 
campaign. Every dollar you contribute will go to fund the design, 
prototyping, and production of brand new, never before seen merchandise.


Want to help but can't afford to contribute? Then we invite you to share
 the Detroit Leather Company  campaign online and all over your social media. Who
 knows? You might help someone find that one of a kind accessory they 
always wanted. So help however you can and remember that your support 
helps keep independent artists and small businesses in business.

story:
Help us empower independent designer fashion
and build a fashion-forward community:

You are no longer a fashion clone of the repeated fast fashion and common labels. Our online marketplace and fashion social media dedicated to independent designer fashion will be launched in December. Your supports will be the booster to the launch and the encouragement to the designers!

We are offering the EXCLUSIVE, LIMITED AND BEST offers here as the rewards for our honored backers in this Indiegogo campaign. THE DISCOUNTS ARE ONLY AVAILABLE IN THIS ONE-TIME LAUNCH CAMPAIGN, so grab this limited chance to enjoy the EARLY-BIRD OFFER and support our designers and launch!

Please visit www.istyleup.com to learn more about us.


About This Project


What is iSTYLEUP?

An exciting social-commerce platform dedicated to talented independent designers and fashion enthusiasts integrating the following: 

· An online and globally curated marketplace for independent designer fashion and accessories

· A social platform for a fashion-forward community

· A pre-order platform for next season's designer fashion and accessories






Our Story

iSTYLEUP’s story began in 2014. When I was planning a fashion incubation project, I spoke to and analyzed what young designers need to launch a successful fashion label. What is the key to success? Creativity? Well, absolutely. Design technique and handcrafting talent? It is presumed they should have learned so in the institutions and only experience would refine this. Business sense? Sure, but again, we couldn’t do much for that, and experience is probably the only way to help them improve. Marketing and PR? Yeah, bingo! This is the area that designers struggle with. Not because they don’t know or can’t accumulate the knowledge, but because to achieve this goal one needs money and resources! Can a fashion incubator help? Yes, a bit of PR, but just short-term. In the long run, an incubator’s mission and use of resources are not to assist designers in marketing their line, especially after they have been out in the world for a while. Competitive pricing? Here you go! I see so many designers that are great, but just high quality designs alone cannot sell. Why? It’s the quantity issue. Designers cannot place large quantity production orders because they don’t know how many they can sell! It’s a chicken-and-egg loop – low quantities make costs high, thus making the price high, therefore creating low sale volume.

What if we could help designers to market products to the customers overseas directly? What if we could help designers to finance their production cost when they got the orders? What if we could let more people know and appreciate designer fashion? By conglomerating designers of different characters, we could have more resources and make a bigger impact on the market. That’s how iSTYLEUP began.  

To once again summarize our mission – we connect talented designers with consumers, in a more direct and appealing way. On top of that, we encourage exchange of fashion ideas and  inspirations among people.

Inspire, be inspired!


Harry

Founder

iSTYLEUP


** FREE WORLD WIDE SHIPPING**


Perks

By participating in our Indiegogo launch effort, you'll be our honored backers of iSTYLEUP! Everyone who gives at any level will be our honored backers and that is only possible through this campaign. There are several different levels we go into below but all levels are important! Thank you for being here, and please spread the word!

We are proud to have some of the most prominent designers in our iSTYLEUP community supporting this launch effort. We are offering the following EXCLUSIVE, LIMITED AND BEST offers as the rewards for our honored backers. The discounts are only available in this one-time launch campaign, so grab this limited chance to enjoy the EARLY-BIRD OFFER and support our designers and launch!



Timeline



Our Promise

All our designers are committed to their assurance of quality. For any faulty product reported within 7 days after the backer receives it, the designer will arrange the timely exchange and bear any additional shipping cost.


Risks and Challenges

Producing designer fashion at a higher volume may pose stress to our designers’ production capacity. However, we’ve coordinated with all the participating designers carefully  to ensure they can deliver the products on schedule as promised. Moreover, all of our designers have had ample experience in shipping their products on time

We put customer satisfaction and user experience at our top priority. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about the project status and any unplanned hurdles or delays.


FAQs

·  How do I order?

By ordering you are backing our project and doing what Indiegogo calls "Perks".

You can easily select the item you like by clicking the respective box of the perk item along the right side of the screen.

·  Do you ship globally?

YES! We offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING for all our backers.

·  Where do I choose my size?

For the apparel products which require your size info, we will email you the size chart and confirm your size when the Indiegogo campaign is closed.

·  Can I exchange my reward?

Unfortunately we cannot offer exchanges because the designer products for rewarding this campaign are pre-orders of limited quantity and one-time production. For this as well as the hygiene reasons, the reward is going to be the final sale.

·  Why do we have to wait till the end of the campaign to get our reward?

Because of the way Indiegogo operates, your credit card is not charged until the end of the campaign. We will also not receive any fund until around 15 business days after the campaign ends on Dec 19. This is also the earliest we are able to send out the surveys.

final sale.

story:
Hi everyone :)

Suuuuupper simple: this is just a pre-order project for a bunch of shiny new Globular T-shirts. It takes a fair bit of cash to print these things, and once you start to factor in all the different sizes, colours, genders and designs I'd ideally like to get done, it gets crazy complicated and expensive reeeeaal fast. 

So to help kick things off I'm running this project. The first batch will be limited to one [freakin' awesome] design, screen-printed on black only, in both Unisex/Men's & Unisex/Women's T's. 

Here's a high-res image for a better look at the design :) https://imgur.com/a/gCgyt

The T-shirts themselves will be 'earthpositive', organic, climate-neutral, ethically manufactured clothing, sourced from a company that pay the living wage (and generally seem pretty awesome tbh). I'll put a link to the original manufacturer's site at the bottom, so you can check them out yourselves.

The pre-order cost from here will have a small discount applied to it (as compared to future merch on bandcamp etc), something around 5%. In the future I'm hoping to add more designs, sizes, colours etc, but it really depends on the success here, and if I can get enough cash together to make it happen. Most* of the surplus from here - if there is any - will go in to new T's in one form or another. 

I'm not entirely sure of the turnaround time this whole thing will take, but I should have the T's back from the manufacturer's within a week or two of closing this campaign. So that should leave plenty of time for christmas pressies (ohhhh shit, did I just mention christmas...?) ;) 

So yeah, I think that covers it! Oh I should say thanks to Luc L'Anthoen for his amazing design - I seriously can't wait to see this vibrant awesomeness on the front of a nice high quality T-shirt, hopefully under a stoked, grinning face ;) 


Loads of love! Morison x


*I say most and not all, because, well, got to put food on the table too :p 

http://www.earthpositive.se/about.html

story:
Introducing SmileRunner, the most affordable sports wristband with built-in GPS and a heart rate monitor, making your workouts more scientific and your results more accurate. SmileRunner also features an HD color display, is IP68 waterproof, with multiple sports mode, and sleep monitor.

WHY SMILERUNNER?

You need to collect comprehensive data to analyze and enhance your performance, but most of the wristbands on the market cannot provide everything you need. Other sports wristbands without built-in GPS need a smartphone app to connect GPS, but this limits the user’s freedom and movement. Lastly, they’re just flat-out expensive, heavy and uncomfortable.

That's why you need SmileRunner, the only sports wristband that brings built-in GPS, heart rate sensor and step counter altogether!

 

 

 

 

SmileRunner tracks all of the data points you need to maximize your results. In the app, you can easily see all of the data you care with SmileRunner, including:

Heart rate: Tracking your heart rate could take your training to the next level. The heart-rate training uses your heart rate as a guide for your training intensity. Using your heart rate, you will be able to train your cardiorespiratory system to work at a specific level for a set amount of time.

Pace: Learning to properly pace yourself is one of the most critical skills a runner can develop.  SmileRunner tracks your running pace to help you understand and adjust your training plan.

Steps per minute: steps per minute is essential for runners who want to know their running style and stress on knees, for example when spm increases from 155 to 180 (which is the best spm for marathon runners), the stress on knees will reduce for 25%. While many fitness trackers cannot track spm, SmileRunner can provide you your precise spm.

Besides, SmileRunner also tracks other important data such as distance traveled and calories burned.

Monitoring your heart rate is extremely important, especially for health enthusiasts like you. SmileRunner is here for you, making use of science to accurately track your heart rate and steps, breaking everything down to easy-to-understand statistics.

SmileRunner will tell you the amount of time you have been working out, your heart rate and its corresponding Heart Rate Training Zone (Z1-Z5). 

Just knowing your heart rate isn’t enough, which is why SmileRunner features five unique Heart Rate Training Zones, so you know where your pulse is at any given moment.  

Knowing your Heart Rate Training Zone will help you maximize your results. You’ll know when to speed up to kick your fat-burning system into overdrive, and when it’s time to take a break.

 

 

Unlike most fitness wristbands, the built-in GPS of SmileRunner allows you to locate yourself without your phone within 8 seconds, on empty fields. The MT2523 chip makes SmileRunner very accurate and reliable. This quick and straightforward feature will ensure you never lose your way and are always on the path to success.

 

 

SmileRunner provides both treadmill mode and running mode to satisfy your professional needs. With both indoor and outdoor running modes, you can use SmileRunner anywhere. Whether you’re jogging through the city, on an outdoor track, or even on a treadmill at the gym, you can track your pace and running data to stay on pace.

 

 

 

 

SmileRunner serves as your personal 24/7 fitness tracker. As you run, SmileRunner provides you with instant updates on:

  • your steps taken
  • calories you've burned
  • your heart rate
  • how much sleep you’ve gotten

 

While SmileRunner is specially designed for runners, any fitness lover can enjoy the full benefit and advanced functions of this sports wristband. With different sports modes for multiple sports, track your workout for whatever you’re doing today.

With SmileRunner, you can use specific modes to track your data:

  • Running (Outdoor) / Treadmill
  • Biking
  • Walking
  • Hiking
  • Skiing

 

You shouldn’t let rain or sweat ruin your workout. SmileRunner is IP68 waterproof meaning it’s perfectly capable in a downpour outside, in the shower, pool, or if you’re drenched in sweat from a personal record-breaking workout.

 

 

 

 
There's nothing worse than getting caught in a rainstorm halfway through a run. SmileRunner will keep you up to date with local weather, three days in advance.
 

 

  

 

Whenever you get a text, the wristband will vibrate, and you can read the text easily on the display. Even more, if you get a call and don't have your phone with you, you'll see a missed call notification on the built-in screen with the caller's name.

 

 

 

 

SmileRunner is designed with an advanced HD screen at only 0.96FT small with 110*110 resolution. The display features different vibrant colors to show specific data, making it easier for you to read and read your health information at a glance under any lighting condition.

 

SmileRunner is light enough to blend in and durable enough to hold up to your toughest workouts. It weighs only 26.8g and is durable enough for daily use. The wristband is extremely comfortable and will last through sweaty workouts and is comfortable enough to wear while you sleep.

 

You aren't a tech genius; you're an athlete. SmileRunner shouldn't slow you down during your runs, which is why the user interface is intuitive and easy to use for anyone.

 

Connect your SmileRunner with your iOS or Android compatible mobile device to record all of your run data. Not only is the wristband easy to use, but the app is clean and intuitive too.

 

 

Battery life is crucial for any watch let along a fitness wristband. What good is it if it can’t last through your entire run? SmileRunner features a four-day battery life if fully used, and in standby modes the battery lasts for two weeks, which means charging it will be the least of your worries.

Run with ease, run with SmileRunner!

 

 

SmileRunner features interchangeable wrist straps to fit your personal style preferences. Different colors of wristbands will be unlocked as a $5 new perk when our funding reach $50,000 and $100,000.

The “Watch Face” or front screen is customizable too, with 6 different options. Display only the data metrics you care about most and hide the ones you don’t need.

 

PROJECT STAGE

Currently, we have started mass production!

Air Leakage Testing Video:

Designer's Draft:

Working Prototypes:

Prototype Testing by Youtuber Juice:

 

190130 Production Update:

ABOUT US

SmileRunner is created by a team of tech and fitness lovers. We are a group dedicated to using technology as the vessel to support and aid our lives. In our pursuit of a healthy lifestyle, we believe that having a good understanding of our bodies and how we react to exercises is the first step to success. SmileRunner makes use of scientific precision so you can achieve more with accurate data.

The MT2523 chip makes SmileRunner very accurate and reliable. This quick and straightforward feature will ensure you never lose your way and are always on the path to success.

Whether you’re jogging through the city, on an outdoor track, or even on a treadmill at the gym, you can track your pace and running data to stay on pace.
 
 

 



 
SmileRunner serves as your personal 24/7 fitness tracker. As you run, SmileRunner provides you with instant updates on:

your steps taken
calories you've burned
your heart rate
how much sleep you’ve gotten

 


While SmileRunner is specially designed for runners, any fitness lover can enjoy the full benefit and advanced functions of this sports wristband. With different sports modes for multiple sports, track your workout for whatever you’re doing today.

With SmileRunner, you can use specific modes to track your data:


Running (Outdoor) / Treadmill

Biking
Walking
Hiking
Skiing


 


You shouldn’t let rain or sweat ruin your workout. SmileRunner is IP68 waterproof meaning it’s perfectly capable in a downpour outside, in the shower, pool, or if you’re drenched in sweat from a personal record-breaking workout.
 
 

 



 
There's nothing worse than getting caught in a rainstorm halfway through a run. SmileRunner will keep you up to date with local weather, three days in advance.

 
 
  

 
Whenever you get a text, the wristband will vibrate, and you can read the text easily on the display. Even more, if you get a call and don't have your phone with you, you'll see a missed call notification on the built-in screen with the caller's name.
 
 

 



 
SmileRunner is designed with an advanced HD screen at only 0.96FT small with 110*110 resolution. The display features different vibrant colors to show specific data, making it easier for you to read and read your health information at a glance under any lighting condition.
 


SmileRunner is light enough to blend in and durable enough to hold up to your toughest workouts. It weighs only 26.8g and is durable enough for daily use. The wristband is extremely comfortable and will last through sweaty workouts and is comfortable enough to wear while you sleep.
 


You aren't a tech genius; you're an athlete. SmileRunner shouldn't slow you down during your runs, which is why the user interface is intuitive and easy to use for anyone.
 



Connect your SmileRunner with your iOS or Android compatible mobile device to record all of your run data. Not only is the wristband easy to use, but the app is clean and intuitive too.
 

 

Battery life is crucial for any watch let along a fitness wristband. What good is it if it can’t last through your entire run? SmileRunner features a four-day battery life if fully used, and in standby modes the battery lasts for two weeks, which means charging it will be the least of your worries.
Run with ease, run with SmileRunner!
 


 
SmileRunner features interchangeable wrist straps to fit your personal style preferences. Different colors of wristbands will be unlocked as a $5 new perk when our funding reach $50,000 and $100,000.
The “Watch Face” or front screen is customizable too, with 6 different options. Display only the data metrics you care about most and hide the ones you don’t need.
 
PROJECT STAGE
Currently, we have started mass production!


Air Leakage Testing Video:

Designer's Draft:

Working Prototypes:

Prototype Testing by Youtuber Juice:

 
190130 Production Update:

ABOUT US
SmileRunner is created by a team of tech and fitness lovers. We are a group dedicated to using technology as the vessel to support and aid our lives. In our pursuit of a healthy lifestyle, we believe that having a good understanding of our bodies and how we react to exercises is the first step to success. SmileRunner makes use of scientific precision so you can achieve more with accurate data.

story: Hi!  My name is Freda Keck.  I am looking to start my own ladies online jewelry boutique.  Fashion and accessories has always been something that I have been passionate about!  All money contributed will go towards starting up my business (inventory, getting my website up and going, etc...), and will be GREATLY appreciated!  In exchange for your generous donation, you will receive not only a thank you gift, but a lifetime discount on jewelry as well!!  Thank you, and have a great day!

story:
Short Summary

Miguel A. Ramos of Somar Productions & Promotions and James Williams Jr. of Poesidon Ave have teamed up to put together a project to promote our talents: Photography and Fashion Design

 We both have start up companies that are wanting to share our abilities to the world!  In an area, where there are limited opportunities for high fashion photography, we've decided to make our own, but we need your help.  To up our game and quality level, we need professional models, crew, and equipment.  We know how much hard work it takes to pull of a shoot that will involve 6 looks in different locations in one day.  We need to be able to compensate our talented and hard working crew.  With your help we can create an awesome project that gives opportunity to much more than ourselves.  It gives a paid opportunity to the crew members and models to show their talents and get some recognition for their work.  The common dream with members of the creative community is to have their work seen by the world.  The pictures we make will be used by Somar Productions & Promotions for its portfolio and hopefully leads to more work, which will in turn lead to more work for our crew.  Poesidon Ave will use the photos to promote its line of clothing online and in print.  This allows members of our shoot to say that their work has been used by a creditable designer and their work is out in the world.  We all want to live the dream!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our current budget is half of our initial budget.  To achieve our goal and provide some financial compensation for our crew, we're hoping to acquire at least $800.  It's definitely a realistic goal and I know we can get there with your help.  Other expenses we are planning for are:

-casting location rental

-professional models

-permits

-food and beverage for the crew (Florida Summers are hot! Got to have water)

-lighting equipment

-additional camera lenses

-behind the scenes video

Every little bit helps and every dollar will go to the shoot, even if we don't reach $800 and have to scale back the shoot.  But that just means we have less people working and missing out on a paid opportunity. 

The Impact

   There's so much talent in Central Florida and we want to show the world what we're capable of.  People here have a great love for fashion, photography, and the arts.  We have all had to pay our dues and do some freebie projects in our life.  We want to do something different for our crew (as we know they all have a living to make) and compensate them for their amazing talents and hard work.  We're all not ones to sit around and wait for opportunities.  There comes a time to put your tools together, call your connections, and get the ball rolling yourself and see your goals come to fruition.  You are our connections.   We're very ready to get going and we need your help.  It's our hope that when others see the caliber of work, the photos will generate more work for us and our crew.  Can you be the person to help provide an opportunity?

   We want to thank you for any contribution you give us.  Please check out the different contributions levels to see some of the great gifts we have, like a custom tailored swim suit (female or male) from Poesidon Ave, autographed photos from the models to be chosen for the shoot, different hair and beauty packages form our Lead Hair & Make-up stylist Lesley Rivera, as well as gift certificates for jewelry from Evecesories, the official accessories provider for our photo shoot!

     If you can't contribute financially that's ok.  We would still love for you to be apart of journey.  Please get the word out to those you know through your social medias or any way you can share the message.  Just in case anyone can get us a billboard ad. for free, I'll be forever grateful and treat you out to many dinners.  As for the rest of you..... use the Indiegogo share tools below and help us shout out to the world.  Thank you all!

story:
Let’s face it, daily challenges in our lives never get smaller, they just seem to multiply.   How much time and worry do we waste on finding things that are lost, stressing out about bringing your kids to crowded places, or just forgetting to bring something on a trip?  These problems are exactly why the StoneTether wireless tracking system was invented.  After years of research, we are proud to announce a new way to make life easier with technology, StoneTether. 

StoneTether is not your ordinary wireless tracker, we designed this device specifically around the user, so it’s extremely small/thin and easy to use. To be fair, we're not the first to help find lost items, but we are when it comes to 500 ft range.  It is the world's first compact Bluetooth tracker that reaches this far!  We created an antenna that reaches this incredible range and proud to say it's built into StoneTether.

**Get one for free by selecting at least 1 Perk that includes 1 StoneTether. This requires sharing us via the "share offer" button in the e-mail from Facebook.

Features  |  How to Qualify for Facebook Promo  |  FAQ  |  Competitive Grid

Locate & Track Anything Easily with StoneTether

Use the advanced proximity tracking feature of our iOS and Android Application to find anything from the common set of keys to children with a StoneTether attached.

If something, like your keys are under the couch or just out of site? Just make StoneTether Audible!


Locate, Track, and Tether Children or Pets

Have some peace of mind knowing that your kids or pets are not any farther than what you are comfortable with. 


Never Forget Anything On a Trip Again With Smart-Tether


Track Lost Items Further With Our Network


StoneTether Cloud Provides Redundancy and Accessibility

We just added a new feature!  Now you can get notifications sent to multiple smart devices,  access settings/calendar events in the cloud, and be notified from anywhere!



Take StoneTether Anywhere, Including the Pool.  It's Water-Resistant!


Multiple Colors to Choose From


StoneTether is Small, How Small?


User-Replaceable Battery


StoneTether Feature Breakdown


Why Choose StoneTether? 

  • No Device Comes Anywhere Close to the Range of StoneTether's 500 feet!!
  • Made for Tracking Real World Items: Children, Keys, and Events.
  • Quality, not Quantity - Would we love to sell a million of these? Of course we would and perhaps will.  However, we will never compromise quality by saving money on cheap components.
  • Full 2-Year Warranty

Delivery Schedule

Where are We In Development

  • Prototypes Completed
  • Completion of Alpha iOS/Android App
  • Initial Firmware for Device (Firmware Version 1)

How Your Funds Will Help

  • Developing and testing of the Beta Version Application
  • Release and Testing of Version 1.1 of Device Firmware
  • Modifications of Programming to Increase Range (yes, past 500 feet)
  • Modifications to Software for Even More Functionality
  • Tooling for Production
  • Assembly and Final Fulfillment

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the range of StoneTether? 500 feet in most situations (not just "line-of-sight").  FYI, we are able to achieve 1,450 feet in a line-of-sight situation.

Then why does the video say 150 feet? We created the video before we upgraded StoneTether and geared it with an internal antenna.  Don't worry, we will edit the video with the correct distance of 500 feet.

Does the antenna make it any larger or look any different?  No, we developed a slim antenna that fits within the casing directly on the circuit board.

When is StoneTether expected to ship? March 2, 2015

Is it waterproof?  ST is water resistant up to 30 feet.  For everyday use, it should cover most situations.  Scuba diving may be taking it too far.

How does ST differ from its competitors? Huge range of 500 feet!, Water resistant up to 30 Feet, Specific Child-Tethering function, Item/Event Tracking with Reminders, user-replaceable battery, built with quality 2-year warranty.

Will ST work with both iOS and Android operating systems? Yes

Which smartphones is the app compatible with? iPhones 4s and Newer, Android smartphones utilizing Bluetooth 4.0

What is the cost of your app? The Application is Free.

Can I use the app on my iPad or other Android Tablet Device? Yes

Who did we use for our amazing video? Patrick Pacheco and James Drikas from New Form Productions.  Please contact them through e-mail: questions@stonetether.com.


Why StoneTether?  Take a Look


Get a StoneTether Free Promo

1.  Simply Share Us on Facebook Using the Sharing Tools Underneath Our Video. 
2.  You will then be eligible to receive an extra StoneTether with any StoneTether Perk that includes at least one StoneTether.
3. You can then use the Contribute button and select the Perk that you would like to receive for your support.

Available Perks


Get Another For Free!

Yes, We Love Questions or Suggestions!  In Fact, so much that we will be giving away 20 StoneTethers to those that send in 20 best uses of StoneTether.  We will then use that information to develop further functionality added to the first version of the device or application before delivery.

We would love to answer any questions!  Just use the e-mail address below.

questions@stonetether.com


Risks & Challenges

After multiple years of planning, designing, and research, we are at a point that allows us to confidently give out our launch date.  As we all know, some things/situations can cause delays that were never intended or could have been prepared for.  To prevent this outcome, we are committed to securing multiple resources when it comes to our supply-chain and assembly.  At a minimum, we will have the redundancy of two suppliers of any given component including assembly.  If for any reason there is a delay that could potentially occur of any kind, we will communicate this immediately.  We will also be updating every backer consistently on every step of progress we take to completion.  

Our team is committed to making StoneTether an exceptional device with great support.  We consider customer service and product quality to be the hallmark of true success for a company.  We are absolutely certain that StoneTether will be a success thanks to your support.

 If they stray beyond your chosen distance, you get a notification immediately on your smartphone. You can either locate them or extend the tether further.

Never Forget Anything On a Trip Again With Smart-Tether

 Tag luggage, computers, or any other necessities to an event on your calendar. You will get a reminder if you depart for the event missing anything!

Track Lost Items Further With Our Network

 Any StoneTether Device Can Help You Find Any Item You Have Marked As Lost!  500 Feet of range is industry leading by far, but make that unlimited thanks to our StoneTether network.  These devices see each other and they will communicate any lost item's location back to you without compromising privacy.

StoneTether Cloud Provides Redundancy and Accessibility
We just added a new feature!  Now you can get notifications sent to multiple smart devices,  access settings/calendar events in the cloud, and be notified from anywhere!

Multiple Colors to Choose From

 

StoneTether is Small, How Small?

 At about 30mm square, StoneTether is almost as small as a quarter!

User-Replaceable Battery

A Common CR2016 Battery Is All StoneTether Needs! Typical Battery Life is 1-Year

story:
What is behind Pawfect Collars

    Every time I entered the pet store trying to find a perfect collar for my best friend, all I ever found was the same style, same width, same colours and designs. I’m sure you have had the same experience. Sitting behind a borrowed sewing machine for the fourth time in my life, armed with tons of patience, creativity, the moonlight and the warmth of my dog sleeping on my foot, my first Pawfect collar was made. 

    All of our products are handmade and customized to meet our customers’ unique requirements.  They are made with love, passion and dedication because our friends are worth it. Like the fox said to Little Prince, “You become forever responsible for what you have tamed."

    Why we would like you to support our campaign

    • We would like to reach target of $7000 to fund our business growth. To purchase new professional sewing machine, new laptops, to fund our new Web marketing for our website that its almost ready, and to prepare and pay for the trip to America's Family Pet Expo 2015 in California which will help us to boost our business and to promote it.
    • What we offer for your help? Exactly what our business is offering. To our funders that are going to help us to fulfil our business dream we offer an  opportunity to be the first to order and receive our products. For each funding level we would like you to offer a better value for our collars, collar and leash combos or even special gift packed package.


      Funding options

      Vouchers and collars options are available at our newly launched website: www.pawfectcollars.com


      • $10 - You will receive $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website or facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
      • $25 - You will receive 1 Collar from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
      • $50 - You will receive 1 Collar and 1 Leash in the same style from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website and and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
      • $100 - You will receive two sets of Collar and Leash in the same style from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra  $15 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website and and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
      • $200 - Fund-raisers Special Package You will receive option to purchase any four items from our on-line store. Meaning any collar or matching leash. Any size and measurement. Absolutely up to your preference. Each specially gift packed. Plus three $15 Gift Cards by real post for future purchases via our website and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.

      What If

      In case we won't reach our target, we are still going ahead, it just won't be so easy for us like with the full funding. We would spend it primarily for creating new designs and parts for collars, for the web development and promotions, to get word spread out about our unique products. Then we would like to upgrade our laptops, that are old enough for replacement to assure we can be creative. We won't be able to visit Trade show expo and it will take a while to be able to afford new sewing machine.

        The Impact

        Thank to your contribution we will get the chance to show to all dog lovers that their four legged friend can wear cosy, stylish and handmade product that is really special, because it is individually measured and designed by your unique taste. The feature that makes it comfy and cosy is the special width of the collar that is not common. Some breeds and their owners really enjoy the comfort and safety that our products with wider designs provide. Your trust in our business will make the dog world a bit more colourful, glowing and cosy.

        Our first designs became very popular among our friends and lot of dog owners we kept meeting while we walked our dog. We have dozens of orders in pipeline already, but we have decided to get engaged with Indiegogo campaign first to kick off the idea of our unique collars.

        We are ready to meet your high level requirements for your own design collar straight away and you can choose among 2 types of collar, 4 different widths, 24 buckle colours and 40+ fabric designs within our current portfolio.

        Risks & Challenges

        Relative to our business we are confident that we will keep working on our project and can fulfil all the orders and requirements that we receive. Within the reason of course. Because we won't make anything, that will lower our quality, safety of our products and design values.

        Our designs were already tested in harsh environment - our dog (95pound cross Vizsla) is pretty good testing professional, and all his encounters with his enemies were stopped safely by our collars and leashes.

        Though we can see only one challenge among the business and that's' to fulfil all orders after 10th of December to be fulfilled by Christmas. Because of that, orders will be prioritized for Indiegogo fund-raisers.

        However, we have already confirmed backup for extra workforce and as well projected supply orders to overcome this risk.


          How can you help us without funding?

          We would greatly appreciate your help with spreading our campaign among your friends and fellow dog owners. By sharing Indiegogo campaign, our facebook page and talking about us. Our Indiegogo Campaing short link: http://bit.ly/1swTRuu

          If you have any suggestions, or would like us to provide you with more information or is there a way you can help spreading our campaign but don't have a knowledge how, please contact us.

          Our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Pawfect-Collars/282875045245245?ref=bookmarks

          Our website: http://www.pawfectcollars.com/

For each funding level we would like you to offer a better value for our collars, collar and leash combos or even special gift packed package.





Funding options
Vouchers and collars options are available at our newly launched website: www.pawfectcollars.com




$10 - You will receive $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website or facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
$25 - You will receive 1 Collar from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
$50 - You will receive 1 Collar and 1 Leash in the same style from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra $10 gift card by real post for future purchases via our website and and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
$100 - You will receive two sets of Collar and Leash in the same style from 10 designs, any size and measurements plus extra  $15 gift 
card by real post for future purchases via our website and and facebook.
 You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.
$200 - Fund-raisers Special Package You will receive option to purchase any four items from our on-line store. Meaning any collar or matching leash. Any size and measurement. Absolutely up to your preference. Each specially gift packed.  Plus three $15 Gift Cards by real post for future purchases via our website and facebook. You can as well use it as a gift for your family and friends.

What If  

In case we won't reach our target, we are still going ahead, it just won't be so easy for us like with the full funding. We would spend it primarily for creating new designs and parts for collars, for the web development and promotions, to get word spread out about our unique products. Then we would like to upgrade our laptops, that are old enough for replacement to assure we can be creative. We won't be able to visit Trade show expo and it will take a while to be able to afford new sewing machine.
  The Impact

Thank to your contribution we will get the chance to show to all dog lovers that their four legged friend can wear cosy, stylish and handmade product that is really special, because it is individually measured and designed by your unique taste. The feature that makes it comfy and cosy is the special width of the collar that is not common. Some breeds and their owners really enjoy the comfort and safety that our products with wider designs provide. Your trust in our business will make the dog world a bit more colourful, glowing and cosy.
Our first designs became very popular among our friends and lot of dog owners we kept meeting while we walked our dog. We have dozens of orders in pipeline already, but we have decided to get engaged with Indiegogo campaign first to kick off the idea of our unique collars.
We are ready to meet your high level requirements for your own design collar straight away and you can choose among 2 types of collar, 4 different widths, 24 buckle colours and 40+ fabric designs within our current portfolio.
  Risks & Challenges  
Relative to our business we are confident that we will keep working on our
project and can fulfil all the orders and requirements that we receive. Within
the reason of course. Because we won't make anything, that will lower our
quality, safety of our products and design values.
Our designs were already tested in harsh environment - our dog (95pound cross
Vizsla) is pretty good testing professional, and all his encounters with
his enemies were stopped safely by our collars and leashes. 
Though we can see only one challenge among the business and that's' to fulfil
all orders after 10th of December to be fulfilled by Christmas. Because of that,
orders will be prioritized for Indiegogo fund-raisers.
However, we have already confirmed backup for extra workforce and as well
projected supply orders to overcome this risk.
 
  How can you help us without funding?
 We would greatly appreciate your help with spreading our campaign among your friends and fellow dog owners. By sharing Indiegogo campaign, our facebook page and talking about us. Our Indiegogo Campaing short link: http://bit.ly/1swTRuuIf you have any suggestions, or would like us to provide you with more information or is there a way you can help spreading our campaign but don't have a knowledge how, please contact us.Our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Pawfect-Collars/282875045245245?ref=bookmarksOur website: http://www.pawfectcollars.com/

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone!  As you may know by now, I will be competing in the Miss Arizona USA pageant in November! I currently hold the title of Miss Catalina  Foothills USA, and would  absolutely love to represent the state of Arizona  in  the following Miss USA pageant. More so, I would love to represent Christ, modesty, and purity. I not only view this pageant as a fun experience, or good platform, but also a ministry opportunity. I need to raise money to pay for my pageant fee, as well as an evening gown, cocktail dress, and swimsuit. (Modest, of course!) I would be tremendously blessed if you would consider donating  any amount of money to help me reach my goal of $1,500.00 for this pageant. I love you all! Thank you so much for taking the time to invest in me.  

Blessings,

-Miryea Gist. 

"In the same way, let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven." -Matthew 5:16
