story:
Apache Pine is a tight knit group of friends. We spend our free time hiking and exploring, and we live for fresh air and freedom. We work long hours but our spirits our in the mountains. Bringing a part of nature into our daily grind helps us look forward to our next adventure.

We know you feel the same way. You grind to provide for your family and to grow your empire.  For you we have spent many long nights and weeks at the drawing board. Now True North is ready. True North will get you through the grind and to your next adventure.

True North is just like you adventurous, free, and ready to explore.

Go to the Gallery to see all the watches close up! 

Durability and Sustainability 

Traditional wood watches are either very expensive, and/or have very limited water resistance and durability. Having worn and sold wood watches for years, we were very familiar with the problem and knew there had to be a fix. With True North we have found the solution.

The Development Process

We wanted to create a watch that solved the issues of traditional wood watches, and offered the same features we've come to expect in every watch we wear.

  • A strong band Anchor
  • Water Tight* 
  • Reliable timekeeping
  • Responsibly sourced materials 

Is that too much to ask? We don't think so. This past year we have been working hard to come up with a design that solved these problems. Putting in months of after-hours work, long weekends, spending sleepless nights on the road, and even travelling near Hong Kong to meet with manufacturers and finalize our designs.

Perfect for Any Situation

Whether you want to look classy, professional, casual, or are headed out on your next big trip, True North is just right.

Specs 

  • Unisex Case: 45mm or 40mm (More info below)
  • All-Natural Wood: Bamboo, Black Sandalwood, Zebrawood, or Maple 
  • Dependable Quartz Movement: Rhonda 762
  • Scratch Resistant Mineral Glass 
  • Water Tight* Stainless Steel Inside Case

Sizing 

  • Small-Medium: 40mm width case. Band: 6-8 inch spread of holes and .6 inch width. Traditionally a women size.  
  • Large: 45mm width case. Band: has a 7-9 inch spread of holes and .8 inch width. Traditionally a men size. 

 

All backers get 30% Off Apache Pine for LIFE!

 

Risks and Challenges

Fortunately, we have years of experience with designing and manufacturing wood watches. As such, we understand the risks that can occur in the production process. As with any physical item, flaws not picked up during our rigorous testing and quality assurance phases are possible. That’s why Apache Pine offers a full warranty on your watch for 12 months.  

We have planned for two challenges: One, that we shoot past our funding goal and having to deal with a much larger scale of production than we are used to. We have options for logistics lined up should this occur. The second potential challenge being an unforeseen manufacturing delay. If any delay should happen, we will let you know as soon as possible. You will still get your True North watch, but the timeline would shift accordingly.

Thanks, keep building your empire and grab a True North!

Your Friends at Apache Pine.

Ethan and Jordan

Nate and Marcus

story:
Modena Volley ha bisogno di uno sponsor supplementare. Noi crediamo che questo sponsor straordinario possiate essere tutti voi. Perché la pallavolo è un bene comune e quindi è anche un patrimonio collettivo, da salvaguardare. 

Scegli il tuo premio e sostieni la squadra. 

Modena Volley ha bisogno di uno sponsor supplementare. Noi crediamo che questo sponsor straordinario possiate essere tutti voi. 
Perché la pallavolo è un bene comune e quindi è anche un patrimonio collettivo, da salvaguardare. 

Perciò chiediamo a tutti - tifosi, istituzioni, imprenditori, cittadini - di sostenere la squadra in modo nuovo, per poter continuare a scendere in campo da protagonisti. 

 

In termini pratici:

  • Il 31 Maggio scadono i tempi per decidere se iscrivere la squadra al prossimo campionato.
  • Quindi, abbiamo bisogno di una risposta - da chiunque voglia darcela, e secondo le sue possibilità - entro il 30 Maggio.
  • Se raggiungeremo un milione di euro, Modena Volley potrà essere in campo nella stagione del suo 50° anniversario.

Modena ha fatto la storia della pallavolo.

Continuiamo a farla, insieme.



FACEBOOK COVER TWITTER COVER IMMAGINE DI PROFILO
IMAGE GALLERY PERSONALIZZA LA TUA FOTO


Posso ricevere una fattura?

Solo per le donazioni libere è possibile ricevere fattura. A donazione avvenuta, scrivere a info@noisiamolasquadra.com per richiedere fattura dell’importo versato.

Cosa succede se l’obiettivo non verrà raggiunto?

Se la campagna non raggiungerà l’obiettivo prefissato di 1.000.000€, tutte le donazioni verranno restituite ai rispettivi donatori.

Dove ritiro i premi?

Se la campagna sarà finanziata, i premi potranno essere ritirati presso il Palazzo dello Sport di Modena, a partire da Ottobre 2016. Tutti i sostenitori riceveranno una comunicazione in proposito, a campagna ultimata.
Palasport Giuseppe Panini
Viale dello Sport n.25
41122 Modena
 In caso di necessità di spedizione, scrivici all'indirizzo: info@noisiamolasquadra.com

Come scelgo il giocatore per l'autografo?

Al termine della campagna, saremo noi a contattarti tramite e-mail per chiederti di quale giocatore desideri l'autografo sulla card o sulla t-shirt.

Come scelgo la taglia della t-shirt?

Al termine della campagna, saremo noi a contattarti tramite e-mail per chiederti modello e taglia della t-shirt.

NOTCOT

The Union wallet is slim, made from a unique wood piece, and elegantly carries your essentials.

MEET THE UNION WALLET

The Union Wallet is a minimalist wood wallet that carries your cards, cash, and small miscellaneous essentials in an elegant slim profile shell. It is designed as a slim alternative to leather, elastic, or metal wallets - with the look and feel only wood can bring. Without sacrificing function.

MODERN ESSENTIALS

The Union wallet hold your essentials comfortably. With elastic slits that will allow you to securely carry small neccessities, such as an SD card or a spare key. Downsizing your pocket has never been this easy.

Union wallet can hold up to six cards for the pure card-carrying minimalist.

Use it as an emergency coin holder minus the jingling.

Keep things simple, by placing your most frequently used card at the front, to stop you from fumbling at the till.

WOOD X ELASTOMER

With innovative use of injection molded elastomer, we are able to create a slim wood wallet with all the desirable function of a minimalist wallet. The Union wallet measures 9mm (0.35") thick. With width and length of 71mm (2.8") and 101mm (4.0") respectively.

RFID SHIELDING

The Union wallet is fitted with an RFID blocking aluminium plate below the wood surface - to help shield your RF contactless cards from skimmers.

TIMELESS

Wood being one the planet's oldest raw material will age gracefully, unlike the familiar tired old leather.

SECURE & EASY ACCESS

The Union wallet is designed to securely hold your cards even as you're pulling them out. We love minimalist wallet but dislike fumbling through the stack of cards, and on rare occassions dropping the mess on the floor.

MEET CHERRY & WALNUT

Our two wood selections. Warm cherry and dark walnut, are well known for their durability and resistance to decay. More importantly our wood is harvested from responsibly managed and sustainable forests.

PERKS

RESPONSIBILITY

We believe in our (and your) responsiblity for the planet. With every Union wallet sold, we will be planting a tree with the good folks at plantabillion.org - to help offset carbon footprints created in manufacturing and distribution. Our packaging will be made from paper/cardboards, so at the other end you'll be able to do your part - and recycle every bit of unwanted packaging.

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

After a few months of intensive prototyping, we have arrived at a finalised form/function that we are satisfied with. With a successful demand at Indiegogo, we will rapidly move to manufacturing plans and delivery.

  • May: Final product refinements.
  • June: Finalise manufacturing requirements & place order.
  • July: Quality control procedure.
  • August: Final QC checks and delivery.

RISK & CHALLENGES

We have dedicated countless of hours working together with our experienced manufacturer, trying to mitigate as much risks in all aspects of the product. Although we understand that there will be unexpected challenges along the way, we are confident that we will be able to deliver as per our projected plan. We will keep things transparent and inform our supporters of any hurdles/delay along the way.

FAQ

How do I select the wood type for my wallet?

After selecting one of the pledges, please send an email to holler@madera.com.au

  1. Make sure you use or mention the Paypal/Credit card credential you use to pledge with.
  2. With the subject line: Union Wallet Supporter: My [Walnut or Cherry] Wallet.
  3. We'll send confirmation email of your selection.
  4. Wait in excitement for the Union wallet!

I forgot to add shipping cost. What do I do?

You can still contribute shipping cost on top of your current pledge by clicking the pink ‘CONTRIBUTE NOW’ button and add the $8 on top of your current contribution. Easy!

THANK YOU

Shout out to everyone who has supported The Union wallet with the many ways possible. Special thanks to my partner, Winifred Ng - the creative force behind the amazing photographs and video.

COMMENTS, QUESTIONS, PRESS ENQUIRIES

For supporters please directly comment or ask on the comment thread. For any other enquiries: chris@madera.com.au

Wait in excitement for the Union wallet!

story:
WHY WEAR AURZA?

96% of women believe that what they wear significantly affects how confident they feel. Yet on a daily basis over two thirds of us can never find the perfect outfit that makes us feel amazing. We constantly compromise.

We aim to give women a real alternative with utterly fabulous custom-made dresses designed by us and perfected by you to suit YOUR style, personality and shape

  • Classic styles – timeless wardrobe classics that never go out of fashion
  • Fully customisable – highlight the parts you love, hide the bits you don’t
  • Over 300,000 combinations - making every dress unique
  • 3 size options– Off the rack, mix and match & fully customized
  • Fun interactice technology– it’s so easy anyone can be a designer
  • No hidden costs – all customisations included in the price
  • Exceptional service – free remakes & 30 day returns 

What’s more we are giving everyone who supports us here on IGG, 10% off retail price, free shipping to UK/HK and guaranteed gift voucher delivery for Christmas.



THE COLLECTION

We have a range of sassy silhouettes which can be customised to suit your individual style. Choose from 5 tailored dresses,  6 tops & skirts and 3 luxe silks.

THE TAILORED DRESSES

 

The Coco - The impeccably tailored cut of the sheath dress flatters your curves by defining your waist and highlighting your calves to give you a perfect hourglass shape

The Audrey - Our classic bodice with a full swing skirt for a dramatic Audrey Hepburn effect gives you curves in all the right places.

The Kate - A twist on the classic sheath dress with perfectly positioned ruffles to draw the eyes to all the right places and flatter your middle area.

The Alexa - Our classic fitted bodice with a hip skimming skirt for maximum curves and comfort.

The Christina - A loose fitting bodice matched with all skirt types for a casual elegance.


THE SEPARATES

The Flare skirt - Both flattering and easy to wear, a fitted skirt with a kick.

The Swing skirt - A fuller skirt which glides when you walk and pulled in at the waist for maximum curves.

The Pencil skirt - Simple lines that are chic and glamorous and never out of style.


THE LUXE SILKS


The Eddie - Cut for maximum style, the shift skims the top of your body whilst flaring out to the thighs.

The Elle and The Claudia - Casual, sophisticated and incredibly versatile shirt dresses for all occasions and body shapes.


THE FABRICS


OVER 300,000 COMBINATIONS

The process is simple. All you do is choose your favourite silhouette from our collection, change the neckline, sleeves or skirt. Choose the colour of the fabric and details like a belt or faux leather trim. With over 300,000 unique combinations we are sure there is a style for you.


CUSTOMISE:

  • Neckline – bodices to suit all body shapes
  • Sleeves – sleeveless, short cap, elbow length, 3/4 length
  • Length –short, knee and long length or specify your own length
  • Colour – choose a solid dress colour or mix/match the sleeves, bodice & skirt.
  • Trim – faux leather neckline trim, a leather obi belt, a peplum, a broach

Create and visualise your design on our prototype design builder before you pledge. We will ask for your detailed design once the campaign is finished.


    

A BETTER FIT

57% of us don’t know what size to order, are left disappointed with off the rack fit but are filled with dread at taking our own measurements and having something custom made.

So we have developed 3 sizing options to cater for everyone.

  1. AURZA STANDARD SIZES from UK 8-20. Thanks to our 5% stretch and clever 3D pattern development we think that this will be a great solution for the majority of women. Our size charts will guide you but if you are still unsure you can just send us a full length picture of yourself  with your height and we can tell your size (See FAQ).
  2. AURZA MIX AND MATCH tops and skirts for those that want a separates look or have very different top and bottom body shapes
  3. AURZA CUSTOM SIZING provide your measurements (with our guidance) and we will make you a unique size dress


WHY WE NEED YOU

For the last 12 months we’ve been working with manufacturers, testing materials and finalising samples to develop our current range of dresses and sizes.

We now need your help to extend the range of sizes from 8 to 20 (UK) and to optimise our 3D design builder. Please help us to make this a reality!


THE PERKS

(see top right of page for what you can buy!)

Our collection dresses are the main rewards you can invest in. Donors will be able to claim their rewards, design their own garments and choose the right size solution on our website once the campaign has ended.  Each donor will be provided a unique code which they can redeem on the site for their product(s).

 

LEATHER OBI BELT - $60 USD (approx £37)



YOUR PERFECT SKIRT or TOP - $140 USD (approx £85)

 


YOUR PERFECT SILK DRESS - $210 USD (approx £130)


YOUR PERFECT TAILORED DRESS - $235 USD (approx £145) 


YOUR PERFECT SILK MAXI DRESS - $290 USD (approx £180)


THE ULTIMATE GIFT BOX - $290 USD (approx £180)

 


THE BUNDLES 


----- UPDATE ----- NEW BUNDLES

----- UPDATE ----- STRETCH GOALS

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

Any questions? Please drop us a line at stephanie@aurza.com or jessica@aurza.com


Thanks for your support and for checking out AURZA dresses!



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  1. When do I design my Dress/skirt? We'll send you a link at the end of the campaign when you can submit your design to us from our dress designer. While you wait, you can work on your design here.
  2. How do I choose my size? Again we'll send you a link at the end of the campaign when you can choose from our different size options which will be explained fully at this stage.
  3. I forgot to add international shipping, what do I do? Don't worry, we'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to sort it out.
  4. When will my PERK be delivered? We will send out gift vouchers immediately at the end of the campaign so that they are with you in time for Xmas. All the dresses, skirts and tops will be delivered by the end of January.
  5. Why is delivery not the normal 3 weeks? Delivery is longer than the normal proposed length as these are our first production orders.
  6. If I want you to tell me what size I am, what do I do? You need to take 2 full length photos of yourself eg using your phone, in close fitting clothes (so that we get a good idea of your shape).  One from the side, one from the front ensuring we can see your whole body from head to toe. Finally let us know your height and we will do the rest.
  7. If I want to buy something what do I do? You click on the perk at the side and you choose to pay for that perk or give a donation. You can then pay with PAYPAL or a credit card, ensuring you give us the correct shipping address.Once approved you will get an automatic email from Indiegogo confirming your purchase. We will update you on our progress throughout the campaign and at the end of the campaign we will send you a code and link to the design builder where you can create your dress and order your design on line.
  8. Why are you using Indiegogo and not just launching your website? Good question - click here to look at our blog post that we wrote a couple of weeks ago for a clear explanation of the benefits of using Indiegogo for Aurza. 
  9. Is this your website? No this our INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN PAGE. Our website is  www.aurza.com and will 'go live' when our campaign finishes. However until then you can play with our prototype design builder so start to visualise your designs.
story_txt:
WHY WEAR AURZA?
96% of women believe that what they wear
  significantly affects how confident they feel. Yet on a daily basis over two thirds of us can never find the perfect
  outfit that makes us feel amazing. We constantly compromise.
We aim to give women a real alternative with
  utterly fabulous custom-made dresses designed by us and perfected by you to suit YOUR style, personality and shape



Classic styles – timeless wardrobe classics that never go out of fashion


Fully customisable – highlight the parts you love, hide the bits you don’t


Over 300,000 combinations - making every dress unique


3 size options– Off the rack, mix and match & fully customized


Fun interactice technology– it’s so easy anyone can be a designer


No hidden costs – all customisations included in the price


Exceptional service – free remakes & 30 day returns 

What’s more we are giving everyone who supports us here on IGG, 10% off retail price, free
  shipping to
  UK/HK and guaranteed gift voucher delivery for Christmas.


THE COLLECTION
We have a range of sassy silhouettes which can be customised to suit your individual style.
  Choose
  from 5 tailored dresses,  6 tops & skirts and 3 luxe silks.
THE TAILORED DRESSES

   
The Coco - The impeccably tailored cut of the sheath dress flatters your curves by defining
  your
  waist and highlighting your calves to give you a perfect hourglass shape
The Audrey - Our classic bodice with a
  full swing skirt for a dramatic Audrey Hepburn effect gives you curves in all the right places.
The Kate - A
  twist on the classic sheath dress with perfectly positioned ruffles to draw the eyes to all the right places and
  flatter your middle area.
The Alexa - Our classic fitted bodice with a hip skimming skirt for maximum curves and
  comfort.
The Christina - A loose fitting bodice matched with all skirt types for a casual elegance.

THE SEPARATES

The Flare skirt - Both flattering and easy to wear, a fitted skirt with a kick.
The Swing skirt -
  A fuller skirt which glides when you walk and pulled in at the waist for maximum curves.
The Pencil skirt -
  Simple lines that are chic and glamorous and never out of style.

THE LUXE SILKS



The Eddie - Cut for maximum style, the shift skims the top of your body whilst flaring out to
  the thighs.
The Elle and The Claudia - Casual, sophisticated and incredibly versatile shirt dresses for
  all occasions and body
  shapes.

THE FABRICS
OVER 300,000 COMBINATIONS
The process is simple.
  All you do is choose your favourite silhouette from our collection, change the neckline, sleeves or skirt. Choose the
  colour of the fabric and details like a belt or faux leather trim. With over 300,000 unique combinations we are sure
  there is a style for you.



CUSTOMISE:


Neckline – bodices to suit all body shapes


Sleeves – sleeveless, short cap, elbow length, 3/4 length


Length –short, knee and long length or specify your own length


Colour – choose a solid dress colour or mix/match the sleeves, bodice & skirt.


Trim – faux leather neckline trim, a leather obi belt, a peplum, a broach


Create and visualise your design on our
  prototype design builder before you
  pledge. We will ask for your detailed design once the campaign is finished.


      
   
A BETTER FIT
57% of us don’t know what size to order, are left disappointed with
  off the rack fit but are filled with dread at taking our own measurements and having something custom made.
So we have developed 3 sizing options to cater for everyone.


AURZA STANDARD SIZES from UK 8-20. Thanks to our 5% stretch and clever 3D pattern development we think that this will be a great solution for the majority of women. Our size charts will guide you but if you are still unsure you can just send us a full length picture of yourself  with your height and we can tell your size (See FAQ).


AURZA MIX AND MATCH tops and skirts for those that want a separates look or have very different top and bottom body shapes


AURZA CUSTOM SIZING provide your measurements (with our guidance) and we will make you a unique size dress


WHY WE NEED YOU
For the last 12 months we’ve been
  working with manufacturers, testing materials and finalising samples to develop our current range of dresses and
  sizes.

We now need
  your help to extend the range of sizes from 8 to 20 (UK) and to optimise our 3D design builder. Please help us to make
  this a reality!
THE PERKS
(see top right of page for what
  you can buy!)
Our collection dresses are the main rewards you can invest in. Donors will be able to claim
  their
  rewards, design their own garments and choose the right size solution on our website once the campaign has ended.
   Each donor will be provided a unique code which they can redeem on the site for their product(s).

story:
YATBOL  Vision:

 -Yatbol is a Lifestyle label, from the Counter Culture.  We are based in Hawaii, using music, art, and surfing for inspiration!  Yatbol designs are printed on top-quality fabrics, for those with unique self-expression.  Since 2009 Yatbol has been distributed among music festivals, friends, and family.

YATBOL  Mission:

 -Using conscious apparel to promote positive thoughts and world peace, Yatbol is starting to thrive.  Profits from the apparel line will be used to create a Non-Profit Public Art Funding Platform.  Our focus will be in fund-raising for large  sculptures and exhibits in Public Areas, for the up-and coming Artist. 



$8,080 Donation Analysis         

 - Our Goal of creating an inventory large enough for commercial distribution will become a reality!   

 

 $11,000  Donation Analysis (What your money is funding)

 -4 Shirt Designs @ 200 pieces per design =$8,800

 -Yatbol  Fitted Cap w/Embroidery Cost Approx $11-$15 for  Manufacturing+shipping.  50 hats @ $15 =$750.00

 -Yatbol Fractals Swim Wear:  Approx Cost = $10-14 for manufacturing + shipping= $17 per piece.  50  @ $17 =$850

 -Yatbol  Hoodies and Jackets: Approx Cost= $20-30 for manufacturing and shipping.  30 pieces  @ $30 = $900  

 -Yatbol Yoga Goddess Line:  Approx Cost= Blank/endless….too much info..  

 -Operating Expenses:  Digital Remastering, Web Design, Travel Expenses, and Festival Fees.  Can’t forget the Grassroots Campaign, which entails gifting and advertising via Promotional Parties and events.  As one can see the cost of starting a clothing line add up quick.


$20,000 + (Stretch Goal Funding)

 -Yatbol 2013/2014 Full Clothing Line:  Funded

 -1st Yatbol Organization Public Sculpture:  Funded !!!! (see rewards)


                                            Y YATBOL ?

 We feel our customers will enjoy wearing clothes that promote positive progress in the human evolution.  Using Yatbol’s Apparel proceeds for funding art installations,  buyers will support the Art Community!  This IndieGoGo campaign is essential for boosting the Yatbol image, and acquiring the quality products needed to launch our on-line stores.  In return the public will be responsible for the success and take part in the Art Renaissance.  


                                            Art Rewards 

                                                              by  Archer Ray

                

                                                           "Joyful Greeter"

                             Sculpture Design for Yatbol's 1st  Public Art Funding


                       

                                                                "Surfnaut"


                                  

                                                                  "Soaren"



FAQ:  Frequently Asked Questions?

How do i choose my color and size?  We will send you a response e-mail to confirm your order after the campaign.  Once the garments are finished we will send a selection for you to choose from.  Color, Size, Men's or Women's orders will be processed then.. Essentially this is a Pre-Sale Campaign.


When will we receive our packages?  Yatbol will get to work once we receive funds from IndieGoGo.  Being out in the middle of the Pacific makes shipping take longer.  So we are giving ourselves until the New Year to create the quality Yatbol Apparel you are investing in.  Shortly after the New Year you will be styling in some Yatbol.

Is Shipping Included?  Prices on Packages include shipping in the U.S.  Outside U.S please add $15.00 to your package price.

.

story:
Connect with us on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter

Top Questions:

How do I choose my choice of design?
You can use comments section to provide us with your selection.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost?
Yes! Please add $15 to your order for international shipping for one watch or if you choose more, check other perks.

Media Coverage:

Trendhunter: Worn with a t-shirt and jeans or a suit jacket and tie, the watches from the WC Sport Watch collection are setting the standard for sporty chronographs that balance masculine strength with natural beauty.

DesignYouTrust & GadgetFlow: These watches appeal to both casual and formal settings. WC Watches by Waves Collection are new brand of watches inspired by nature and finer things in life.

Indiegogo Special Replacement Warranty: 

In next 2 years if anything happens to your watch which causes it to stop working (Even an Accident!!), you'll be eligible to get a new WC Sport Watch for only $89, we'll let you even choose a different model of WC Sport (6 Designs). This is available ONLY for Indiegogo Supporters. So Spread the Word! and Support our Campaign! 

Note: This is in addition to our regular warranty which covers manufacturing defects.


Inspired by the vibrant colors of wood and modern sporty styles the WC Sport Watches are the perfect combination of Elegance and Master Craftsmanship. With different combination of natural wood and solid Stainless Steel, and a all natural Bamboo Case, the WC Watches offer designer quality features at a price affordable to everyone. Sporty Chronographs with Date & Stop Watch functionality offers completely original dial and Steel band designs with two fine wooden inlays which no other wood watch in the world offers at a price we are offering here.

We're here on Indiegogo to introduce the WC SPORT Watches, first watch in our collection of WC Watches. Our goal is to produce a production run of these watches for delivery timeframe of Nov-Decr 2013! We hope you enjoy learning about the watches!

Thanks for stoping by!  -WC Team

Final WC SPORT Collection

Blackwood/Silver

Rosewood/Silver

Maplewood/Black

Blackwood/Black

Rosewood/Black

Greenwood/Black

Our Story

We love Sports watches and we know many you will agree all sports watches available in the market today look the same when it comes to material used or in terms of looks. We are big fans of wood products and we have seen other wood watches out there. They are very nice looking and trendy but we found 2 problems with them:

1. Either they are too light weight and don't give a real watch feel when you put them on wrist Or

2. They are too bulky (Newer ones), feels too big on the wrist.

We wanted some middle ground, without these 2 problems, so we decided to design our own Sporty Chronograph Watch that would feel right on the wrist. Watch we could wear both in casual and professional setting and still be distinctive.



Our Goal

When we set out to create our first collection of watches, our goal was simple: Create a good quality watch that makes a unique style statement and has a Sporty look. So we started working with our in house designers and professional watch designers. The design of WC Sport has been created entirely from ground up by our team of designers. We are collaborating with a very reputed manufacturer to create our initial prototypes who we'll be using for our production run as well. 

We are proud to say we are on the path of achieving what we were looking for with our first model “WC SPORT" prototypes. We incorporated the contemporary appeal of natural wood detailing and infused the weight and strength of stainless steel for a durable and fully functional design. The weight of the watch had to be the right weight so it was critical to have the right size bezel, inlays in the links had to be perfectly sized as well. In order to achieve this we decreased the width of band to 22mm (Most other had 24mm) with two 4mm wood inlays and bezel size to 8mm.

All watches in our collection will be made out of all natural wood and stainless steel. WC SPORT will come with a Japanese Chronograph movement, first of its kind double wood inlay stainless steel band, battery life of approx. 5 years, 5ATM (50 meters/160feet) Water Resistant and 2 year warranty. 

Watch Specifications:

  • Case Material: Stainless Steel
  • Case Dimension: 52 mm (Lug to Lug)
  • Face Diameter: 43 mm
  • Case Thickness: 11 mm
  • Band Material: Stainlesss Steel with 100% All Natural Wood inlays
  • Band Width: 22 mm
  • Band Length: 230 mm (Adjustable)
  • Clasp: Butterfly Double Press Clasp
  • Clasp Material: Stainless Steel
  • Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
  • Display: Chronograph with Date function
  • Movement: Seiko Chronograph
  • Water Resistant: 5ATM (50 meters/160 feet)
  • Battery Life: 5 Years (Approx.)

We have spent over a year sketching various designs, working with various designers and experts from watch industry to create our initial prototypes. We went through numerous iterations to get the prototypes right.

We decided to go with reliable and precise Seiko Chronograph movement with date function and having battery life of approx. 5 years.

We even redesigned the concept of having wooden inlays in Stainless steel bracelet where each link will comprise of 2 finer pieces of wooden inlays giving this collection a unique and elegant style.


We decided to create 2 different kinds of bands one with Wood and Glossy Stainless Steel and second with Matte Black Stainless Steel.

WC Sport Silver Collection

This model in our collection features a Glossy Stainless Steel bracelet. It will have beautiful contrasting black Chronograph sub-dials. This model will be available in Black Sandalwood and Rosewood finish.


WC Sport Black Collection

This model features Matte black stainless steel bracelet and contrasting Chronograph subdials. This model will be available in Black sandalwood, Green Sandalwood, Maple wood and Rosewood.


All our watches will come with a stylish & extremely elegant all natural oil injected bamboo Case.

 

 

Watch Features:

Why Wood?

We chose wood in our designs to bring uniqueness to each watch.

For thousands of years people have been fabricating things out of wood because of its versatility and beauty. No other material is as deeply embedded in our history and culture as wood, yet every single piece of wood is unique.

Wood represents elegance and luxury. Wood is also strong, light weight and flexible. Think about it….wood is the original carbon fiber. 

With all the plastics and artificial stuff in our lives, it’s nice to be able to incorporate some organic.

Waves T-Shirt Design:

Where are we?

Our designs and prototypes are finalized; we have a reliable and reputable manufacturing partner chosen; we are ready to launch these amazing watches but we need your help and support.

We Need Your Support

100 percent of the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be used for WC Sport's first round of production. After more than a year of designing with our designers with different backgrounds, and working with an experienced manufacturer, we have completed the prototype. 

WC SPORT is ready for production! We need your support to meet the minimum order quantity to bring this exciting project to life.

Production Timeline: 

Mid Sept~ End Of September : Startup initial Production & Final QA for initial Production 

Start of October~ Mid November: Initiate our commercial production & QA our commercial Production. Lead time for production and QA for commercial production is 45 days.

Mid November ~ Start of December: Products will be shipped out to us in mid November, and it shouldn't take more than 7~10 business days for us to start shipping those products to our Indiegogo Backers worldwide.


What'll be the rewards?

As for the rewards you’ll be first in the world to wear these watches. Be sure to check out all rewards to the right of your screen. Estimated Retail price of these watches is esimated at $249. We are really excited to offer them for only $115 for first 100 people who pledge their support and for $125 for next 200 supporters. 

There are other exciting rewards, please check them out on the right side.

The weight of the watch had to be the right weight so it was critical to have the right size bezel, inlays in the links had to be perfectly sized as well. In order to achieve this we decreased the width of band to 22mm (Most other had 24mm) with two 4mm wood inlays and bezel size to 8mm.
All watches in our collection will be made out of all natural wood and stainless steel. WC SPORT will come with a Japanese Chronograph movement, first of its kind double wood inlay stainless steel band, battery life of approx. 5 years, 5ATM (50 meters/160feet) Water Resistant and 2 year warranty. 
Watch Specifications:


Case Material: Stainless Steel

Case Dimension: 52 mm (Lug to Lug)

Face Diameter: 43 mm

Case Thickness: 11 mm

Band Material: Stainlesss Steel with 100% All Natural Wood inlays

Band Width: 22 mm

Band Length: 230 mm (Adjustable)

Clasp: Butterfly Double Press Clasp

Clasp Material: Stainless Steel

Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass

Display: Chronograph with Date function

Movement: Seiko Chronograph

Water Resistant: 5ATM (50 meters/160 feet)

Battery Life: 5 Years (Approx.)

We have spent over a year sketching various designs, working with various designers and experts from watch industry to create our initial prototypes. We went through numerous iterations to get the prototypes right.
We decided to go with reliable and precise Seiko Chronograph movement with date function and having battery life of approx. 5 years.
We even redesigned the concept of having wooden inlays in Stainless steel bracelet where each link will comprise of 2 finer pieces of wooden inlays giving this collection a unique and elegant style.



We decided to create 2 different kinds of bands one with Wood and Glossy Stainless Steel and second with Matte Black Stainless Steel.
WC Sport Silver Collection
This model in our collection features a Glossy Stainless Steel bracelet. It will have beautiful contrasting black Chronograph sub-dials. This model will be available in Black Sandalwood and Rosewood finish.



WC Sport Black Collection
This model features Matte black stainless steel bracelet and contrasting Chronograph subdials. This model will be available in Black sandalwood, Green Sandalwood, Maple wood and Rosewood.



All our watches will come with a stylish & extremely elegant all natural oil injected bamboo Case.
 

 

Watch Features:

Why Wood?
We chose wood in our designs to bring uniqueness to each watch.
For thousands of years people have been fabricating things out of wood because of its versatility and beauty. No other material is as deeply embedded in our history and culture as wood, yet every single piece of wood is unique.
Wood represents elegance and luxury. Wood is also strong, light weight and flexible. Think about it….wood is the original carbon fiber. 
With all the plastics and artificial stuff in our lives, it’s nice to be able to incorporate some organic.
Waves T-Shirt Design:

Where are we?
Our designs and prototypes are finalized; we have a reliable and reputable manufacturing partner chosen; we are ready to launch these amazing watches but we need your help and support.



We Need Your Support

100 percent of the funds we raise on Indiegogo will be used for WC Sport's first round of production. After more than a year of designing with our designers with different backgrounds, and working with an experienced manufacturer, we have completed the prototype. 
WC SPORT is ready for production! We need your support to meet the minimum order quantity to bring this exciting project to life.
Production Timeline: 
Mid Sept~ End Of September : Startup initial Production & Final QA for initial Production 
Start of October~ Mid November: Initiate our commercial production & QA our commercial Production. Lead time for production and QA for commercial production is 45 days.
Mid November ~ Start of December: Products will be shipped out to us in mid November, and it shouldn't take more than 7~10 business days for us to start shipping those products to our Indiegogo Backers worldwide.

What'll be the rewards?
As for the rewards you’ll be first in the world to wear these watches. Be sure to check out all rewards to the right of your screen. Estimated Retail price of these watches is esimated at $249. We are really excited to offer them for only $115 for first 100 people who pledge their support and for $125 for next 200 supporters. 
There are other exciting rewards, please check them out on the right side.

story:
THANK YOU TO ALL OF OUR SUPPORTERS!
We didn't meet our funding goal but we are working hard to ensure a launch in Spring 2014.  We continue to accept donations through our website:
http://non-stopmedia.org/donate/

We're proud to introduce our ADVISORY BOARD:



Please continue to visit our Facebook/ShirzananGlobal page for updates. 


NON-STOP MEDIA is the manager and publisher of the non-profit project SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION.  NON-STOP MEDIA is a 501(c)(3) public charity  dedicated to the freedoms of expression and media.  We fight for free information by fighting against censorship. 


ATTENTION DONORS:

Please contact us at info@non-stopmedia.org or contact support@indiegogo.com with any problems donating.  We regret the ongoing difficulties with the donation system.  THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.  Please try again...and again until your transaction is successful.



OUR MISSION

We respectfully request your support to fuel the Spring 2014 launch of SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION.

Our campaign is focused on raising the first $50,000 of funding to cover start-up costs – including the development of a highly interactive website. 

SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION will be a bigger, bolder, better version of the first Iranian women's magazine published online from 2007-2009 that had 400,000 unique visitors in its final year and more than 6.5 million total hits to its website.

We recognize female participation in sports as a HUMAN RIGHT and we emphasize sports as both a source to EMPOWER females and to IMPROVE health through physical fitness.

The publication will be presented in English and will promote STRONG, POSITIVE ROLE MODELS through reports, profiles and photographic images which imprint and inspire girls to their limitless potential.

We believe sports are a means of CULTURAL REFORM and the breakthroughs in participation and competition reflect incremental CLAIMS OF FREEDOM.

We're poised to make history and YOU can help by supporting TEAM SHIRZANAN in any number of ways.

FOR AND ABOUT SHIRZANAN

Are there SHIRZANAN who inspire(d) you?  Have sports had an impact on your life or that of your mother, sister, wife, daughter or friend?  All people deserve role models to respect and emulate.  Visit our Facebook page in the upcoming days and weeks to see who we name as our SHIRZANAN.  We'd love to know your SHIRZANAN, too.

Whether or not you donate, you can help by generating awareness among your family, friends and teammates.  Like Us on Facebook, Follow us on Twitter and Connect to us on LinkedIn.  We will show these numbers to potential donors as evidence that we have community support behind our mission and project.   

Plus, spreading the word can be a WIN-WIN SITUATION.  You can be part of our team by using the Indiegogo sharing tools and joining our referral rewards system.


OUR PERKS

CONTACT US at info@non-stopmedia.org with any problems donating, making arrangements to donate by check or other inquiries.

IMPORTANT:  We will contact you by email as soon as the campaign ends to confirm your perk, style, color and/or size.  We will also verify your shipping address. 

NOTE:  If you wish to make an anonymous donation or decline the perk, those options are available when you place your order.

Donations are TAX-DEDUCTIBLE by U.S. Citizens.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!!

$5 - CHEERING SECTION

We sincerely appreciate your support!  To thank you, we'll send an e-mail or a shout out on Facebook.  We'll also include your name on the SUPPORTER PAGE of our new website.

$10 - BIGGEST FAN

Downloadable e-cards:  HONOR YOUR SHIRZAN(AN) with your choice from four original photos and messages.


$10 - PEP TALK

Downloadable screensaver:  MOTIVATE YOURSELF with an image from the original Shirzanan photo gallery.


Here's a preview:

$25 - TEAM PLAYER

T-SHIRTS and TANK TOPS:  Show off our logo by wearing one of the T-SHIRTS or TANK TOPS displayed below.  They are all made using high-quality cotton and produced in Brooklyn, New York.  Yo, Brooklyn!  We offer sizes S-XXL. 

Please add $5 for international shipping.

$50 - BALL HOG
BUNDLE: T-SHIRT or TANK TOP, CELLPHONE + LAPTOP DIGIWIPE and ONE DOWNLOAD.  You want it all - and so you shall have it. 

Please add $5 for international shipping.

$100 - MVP
SATISFACTION:  Make a donation in this or any amount and decline all incentives.  We know the satisfaction is in helping others.

$100 - WINNING SHOTS
SOFTCOVER PHOTO BOOK:  Shirzanan:  Rare Images of Iranian Female Athletes. Original photos by Shirzanan photographers.  Details:  8.5" x 11" (21.59 x 27.94 cm; full color on white paper.

Please add $10 for international shipping.


$200 - GRACE UNDER PRESSURE

HARDCOVER PHOTO BOOK:  Shirzanan:  Rare Images of Iranian Female Athletes. Original photos by Shirzanan photographers. Details:  8.5" x 11" (21.59 x 27.94 cm); full color on glossy paper.

Please add $10 for international shipping.



$250 - TEAM EFFORT
TEN PACK OF T-SHIRTS OR TANKS FOR YOUR TEAM!  You can mix styles and sizes.

Please add $20 for international shipping.


$500 - HEADLINE-MAKING PLAY
WEBSITE RECOGNITION: You will be featured on our website with your name, logo and link.



$750 - PLAY BOOK
SKYPE CALL:  Spend one hour speaking with Founder Solmaz Sharif.




$1,000 -  VICTORY LAP
GOODY BAG (featuring a combination of the above) and TWO TICKETS to the SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION LAUNCH PARTY featuring celebrity shirzanan and international athletes.  To be held in Spring 2014 in New York City.  Airfare and Hotel are not included.  We will contact you to customize the GOODY BAG.




$2,500 - WINNERS' CIRCLE

GOODY BAG (featuring a combination of the above)  and FOUR TICKETS to the SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION LAUNCH PARTY featuring celebrity shirzanan and international athletes.  To be held in Spring 2014 in New York City. Airfare and Hotel are not included.  We will contact you to customize the GOODY BAG.

$5,000 - CHAMPIONS' PODIUM

GOODY BAG (featuring a combination of the above)  YOUR OWN TABLE at the SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION LAUNCH PARTY featuring celebrity shirzanan and international athletes.  To be held in Spring 2014 in New York City.  Airfare and Hotel are not included.  We will contact you to customize the GOODY BAG.


OUR MOTIVATION:

SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION will fill the media void which under-reports, and often misrepresents, female athletes in the media. 

There is an audience awaiting such coverage.  The original SHIRZANAN attracted nearly 400,000 unique visitors during its final year, 2,000 email subscribers and over 6.5 million total website hits - largely attributed to the rare photo images of female athletes representing role models and reinforcing the idea: “If you can see it, you can be it.”

Solmaz is contacted periodically by athletes and media seeking her guidance and expertise. In July 2013, Iranian swimmer Elham Asghari sought advice to contest a 20 km swimming record and expressed the necessity for a media outlet, such as Shirzanan, where both the struggles and successes of females could be exposed, debated and celebrated accordingly.  The reputations of Solmaz and Shirzanan remain strong in the Muslim athletic community and its established supporters.

See more about Elham Asghari here: 
https://www.change.org/petitions/international-swimming-federation-demand-iran-register-elham-s-swimming-record

We highly recommend the following video and article published by Women’s Sports Foundation and written by Sarah J. Murray.  The article details Muslim Women and Sports while the video features journalist Christiane Amanpour discussing the value of sports:

http://www.oocities.org/mutmainaa/food/muslim_women_games.html

http://vimeo.com/3732337


OUR GOAL:

We hope to surpass our goal of $50,000 by December 17.  Additional funds will be applied towards the salaries of the editors, reporters and photographers.  The editorial headquarters will be based in New York, and the reporters and photographers will operate remotely from the country(ies) they are covering.

OTHER WAYS TO HELP US (TO RECAP):

  • Encourage others to support us;
  • Use Indiegogo sharing tools to spread awareness about our campaign through email, Facebook, Twitter;
  • Join our referral rewards program; and

  • Inquire with your employer about matching contributions for tax-exempt organizations (we're a 501(c)(3) public charity).

Visit our NON-STOP MEDIA. website for additional details about SHIRZANAN GLOBAL EDITION  and our international translation project at 

http://non-stopmedia.org/projects-list/shirzanan-global-edition/

http://non-stopmedia.org/projects-list/iran-dar-jahan/


OTHER WAYS TO HELP OTHERS:

We understand if you don't share our interests.  But, don't leave the Indiegogo website.  Consider browsing the other Indiegogo projects until you find one that's right for you.  (This is a great place to buy gifts.)

We wish you and yours a joyful and triumphant holiday season! 

ANY PROBLEMS DONATING OR IDEAS TO SHARE, PLEASE CONTACT US:

We may be reached at info@non-stopmedia.org.

Sincerely,

TEAM SHIRZANAN

story:
It's about time !

The Flight Deck watches project

Cockpit Company needs to raise funds to answer the wishes from many fans of its first collection of aviation watches. We have all shared an old wish to indeed have a watch which would resemble part of a cockpit panel. More than just a name ... it is about creating the look and feel for a passion and to enable you to wear it.

Aviation watches from Cockpit Company ... Just Plane Cool !

It's about time ... an aviator's watch should look like an aviator's watch. Most watch companies use aviation as their marketing platform even though their watches themselves have nothing to do with aviation. We have decided to use the real instruments designs as the base for our watches so that the many fans of aviation can wear, show and enjoy their passion all day long. 

With your help, our upcoming watches will be a combination of the two popular watches below ... the Attitude and the Altimeter watches with the addition of the Directional indicator.

 

We also believe in reasonable, accessible pricing for all without sacrificing on quality.

It's about time ... An aviators watch should look like an aviators watch ! 

A unique occasion to get a $100 watch for only $50 !

We will use the funds to :

  • Create the mold for this new and unique, copyrighted watch.
  • Create the first production run to reward the early contributors.
  • Should we get enough funds, create additional stock to supply our partners.
  • Should our goal not be reached, we will simply order fewer watches. 

Our current collection has been selling rather well through our partners listed below (very reputable companies in the aviation world). You can find our watches on our web site at www.cockpitcompany.com  or on our wholesalers web sites:

  • Sportys
  • Pilotmall
  • Aircraft Spruce
  • Tailwinds
  • SimMarket Europe
  • My Pilot Store
  • V1shop Russia
  • Seattle Museum of Flight
  • Planes of Fame museum

While we are very grateful to the companies listed above, cash flow caused by payment terms makes it difficult for Cockpit Company to advance the funds needed for the creation of new designs and new stock. 

Your contribution will help us solve this issue and get you a very unique item you will no doubt brag about for a long time.

You will get the ultimate perk:  a unique Flight Deck watch for a unique price.

If you are one of the many fans the aviation world counts, then you will have to have this watch. If not, it is highly probable you know someone who is a fan and who would love to receive this Flight Deck watch as a gift.

Reserve one now before they go on sale for $100, still a reasonable amount but double the amount of our perks. You have the 2 models below to chose from:

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  Stainless Steel
Case Length: 58 mm
Case Width: 45 mm
Strap: very comfortable silicone
Dial Window Material: Crystal Glass
Display: Analog
Movements: Japanese Quartz

Date Function

Water Resistant: 3 ATM


 

Shipping

  • USA and Canada: when you chose a $50 watch, delivery is included to both the USA and Canada in that price.
  • Worldwide: when you chose a $60 watch, delivery is included to any other country in the world.

So there is no need to add any other cost in our already low pricing.

Our future .... together ?

We want to create a full collection of aviation watches that stay at an AFFORDABLE cost. So why don't you join us on this journey and be a part of it every step of the way?  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information. 

During the whole campaign, do not hesitate to make your own suggestions for new designs. We might produce one of those, in which case, the originator of the idea would receive the first one out of production for free.

We want to create an ongoing relationship with our backers, not only because we feel indebted to you but because we would like you to share your own wishes and dreams with us. 

Who is behind it all ?

Started initially as a hobby by myself a few years ago, then discontinued due to a lack of funds, I have recently re-initiated the collection with the fresh and creative help of my son, Alex. 

We have shared a keen interest for aviation our entire lives and decided to materialize our interest into something tangible, useful, attractive and accessible to all. 

Our interest in the exciting world of aviation was triggered by aviation stories from my father, Alex's grandfather, a decorated WW2 aviator. He can be seen at the link below:

http://www.b26.com/marauderman/jean_annez_de_taboada.htm

That is why we have also released a limited edition of WW2 watches, the Cockpit Belle and the Sack Time, to honor his wartime accomplishments.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, you can still help by:

  • Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
  • Remembering to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your involvement .... 

The Cockpit Team

Started initially as a hobby by myself a few years ago, then discontinued due to a lack of funds, I have recently re-initiated the collection with the fresh and creative help of my son, Alex. 
We have shared a keen interest for aviation our entire lives and decided to materialize our interest into something tangible, useful, attractive and accessible to all. 
Our interest in the exciting world of aviation was triggered by aviation stories from my father, Alex's grandfather, a decorated WW2 aviator. He can be seen at the link below:
http://www.b26.com/marauderman/jean_annez_de_taboada.htm
That is why we have also released a limited edition of WW2 watches, the Cockpit Belle and the Sack Time, to honor his wartime accomplishments.  






Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t contribute, you can still help by:

Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
Remembering to use the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you for your involvement .... 
The Cockpit Team

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Adam Swartz and I am the owner of Green Dream Clothing Co. We are a lifestyle brand that plants a tree for every article of clothing sold. I started Green Dream as a freshman at Indiana University but was never able to fully devote my time to the brand, due to something called homework. As you can see, this video was made just over a year ago, but was held back by classes and projects. Just 2 days after graduation at IU, I packed my car and headed west. Boulder, Colorado is now home and I need some help expanding the brand in this new area. Green Dream Clothing Co. is important to me because with your help, we can plant trees all around the world while supplying quality goods at affordable prices. As a contributor you will help me reach my dream in taking this brand to new heights while making the world you live in a healthier place.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am hoping to receive $1,800 in funding over a 36 day period. This capital will be used for supplies that could not fit in my car during the move. A sewing machine, ironing board, fabrics, shipping supplies, and marketing materials are needed, and really make this brand run from the inside out.
  • All donations will receive some perks ranging from stickers to tees, and everything in between!

The Impact

  • Not only are you supporting a small business, but you are planting trees.
  • We have planted over 1,000 trees already, but have many more 0's to add to that number. With your help, we can make Earth a happier and healthier place.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • There are plenty of ways to help besides donating! Social media is critical in the growth of Green Dream. Feel free to tweet, post, or put up a pic describing why your friends and family should support Green Dream too!

story:
*All donor details such as size, style, and color will be gathered after campaign completion*

A simple tee can help fuel a new era in American clothing manufacturing! Choose between:

1. Thompson Tee Classic - $10

Limited edition specially marked premium handcrafted undershirts that EVERY Man can wear! Available in White or Black and Crew or V-neck. (Scroll down to see pictures & additional info)

2. Thompson Tee with Hydro-Shield Sweatproof Technology - $20

A special handcrafted undershirt for Men AND Women that blocks underarm sweat and odor, preventing embarrasing wet marks and yellow stains - Gauranteed! Available in White or Black and Crew, V-neck or Deep V-neck. (Scroll down to see pictures & additional info)

"No one is making undershirts in America anymore..."

I heard this repeatedly when trying to find a U.S. supplier. So we had no choice but to start from scratch!

Now we're making undershirts in America and Guys across the country are asking for MORE!

Starting from scratch allowed us to use higher quality materials that aren’t found in your typical undershirt. Because of this, Guys started asking for a 'regular' Thompson Tee to wear on occasions they didn't need the extra protection!

THE PROBLEM:

We have a product that solves a global need. We've turned down investment offers requiring us to move production overseas. Funding is needed to expand domestic operations and product options. We believe in American manufacturing and the ethical treatment of garment workers, so we're looking for your help to stay here!

The U.S. undershirt market is comprised of 65 million people and not a single major brand is made here. Outsourced unregulated foreign sewing contractors takes a huge toll on jobs in America, human lives abroad, and global pollution.

THE SOLUTION:

Raise the funds to expand our existing domestic operations and product offerings. We need at least $25,000 to cover the material minimums and labor to launch the Classic Tee and expand our colors to include Black.

For every 2,000 shirts we make each month, one job will be added to our supply chain!

Ultimately, our goal is to evolve into a true, classic American lifestyle brand made entirely in the U.S.A. and it can all start with a simple Tee!

THE REWARDS:

Aside from helping an American Co on its way to becoming a global brand supported by domestic manufacturing and the ethical treatment of humans, in exchange for supporting our campaign, you'll also receive your choice/combination of:

Limited edition specially marked premium Thompson Tee Classics for Men - $10

 

  • Available in Crew or V-neck.
  • Made from the same material as those $50-$60 designer tee's!  100% premium ring-spun, combed, preshrunk cotton: super soft with natural stretch.
  • Available in White or Black
  • Tagless lay-flat collar.
  • Extra length added to the bottom, helping it stay tucked in.
  • Broader shoulder cut for superior comfort, making it the tee of choice for men around the world!

According to Tug from undershirtguy.com, the world's undershirt expert, “…the undershirt (Thompson Tee) is incredibly comfortable. It’s made with a super soft, 100% combed cotton that has a bit of a stretch to it. I really love the fact that it has a good amount of natural stretch, without needing to use lycra/spandex. The shirt feels great to wear and has a great overall fit…I’d love to see a version without the hydro-shield underarm protection for those of us that do not need it.”

 

Premium Thompson Tees with Hydro-Shield Sweatproof Technology - $20

(if you need these sooner, White is available now for normal purchase at www.thompsontee.com)

  

 

   

  • Available in White or Black and Crew, V-neck, or Deep V-neck.
  • Specially designed clinical-grade sweatproof barrier completely blocks armpit sweat from passing through, while allowing body heat and moisture to escape as vapor
  • Integrated design provides a sleek and consistent look and feel.  (It’s not just a patch sewn over top or inside a regular undershirt.  The sweat proof barrier is built into the undershirt)
  • Anti-microbial (fights odor) and Hypoallergenic
  • Machine washable and dryer safe
  • 100% Premium ring spun, combed, preshrunk, ultra soft, lightweight cotton (exclusive of Hydro-Shield)
  • Tagless lay-flat collar.
  • Stay tucked with extra length added to the bottom
  • Environmentally friendly, our specialized textile process does not contain or emit any VOS

Hear what people are saying about our sweatproof technology...

"This is the first time I have ever thanked a clothing company. Wow this is the first time in 10 years I have been able to leave the house without a jumper, hoodie or jacket on and it is all down to the t shirt I just received. It is amazing thank you so much I have tried everything on the market and this is the only thing that has worked! You guys are awesome!!"  - Tim

“I just have to say thank for making an awesome product. You have literally changed my life. I work as a banker so I'm required to wear a suit all day. Before you're shirts I was never able to take off the suit jacket without having sweat show on the dress shirt. Now I never have to worry about that. So again, thank you.” - Hunter G.

Many more testimonials available on our website (http://www.thompsontee.com/Testimonials_s/1824.htm) and throughout the web!

Simply, it will be one of the BEST undershirts you've ever worn!


 

There's no denying that manufacturing can lead the recovery of the U.S. economy, but we need help empowering our consumers with high-quality, yet affordable, American-made products.

Thank you for your consideration in supporting the Thompson Tee. Every single effort helps, so please send this to as many friends and family as possible. Everyone could use an extra T-shirt – especially one that will make a difference!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

*all discount codes resulting from this campaign will expire 1 year from issue date.

story:
There seemed to be some interest in getting these scarves made but this is the only way I'd be able to afford it. I'm basically thinking that it's like a pre-order in order to raise the money to get them made.

 

I'm asking for a little bit more than cost and there are two reasons for this:

1. To cover shipping costs for fans who are far away

2. So that we can reach the goal with fewer contributors. This allows us to order them without having pre-sold every unit. (so that if only 33 people give $15, we can still get the scarves as opposed to needing 50 at $10)

 

I'm not trying to make money off this venture--any amount of money made over the inital cost will be donated to the 107IST.

 

If I get pre-purchases for more than the minimum of 50, I'll order as many as needed.

 

Here's a link to a picture of the scarf:

Big Hearts, Brass Balls

story:
I'm tall - six feet tall in fact - and by no means thin. They don't always make hot styles for my kind so I'm often relegated to wearing the basics. But...add big hoop earrings, a necklace, a bracelet or two or ten and a pair of shoes that take your breath away and you go from bland to grand! So I scour the internet for hours at a time looking for fresh little luxuries that I haven't seen a million times or in a million places, and use those pieces to bring my look to life. Then, when I hear the compliments and "that is soooo cute" and "OMG where did you get that?" I feel great. It reaffirms my sense of style, makes me feel special and makes me proud. Queens of Fancy will bring this feeling to our customers. Our ladies will know that when they visit our site they will find something they love and their watchers will take note. This swanky online shoppe will feature eclectic, eye-popping women's fashion accessories and the assortment, presentation and customer experience are our primary focus. We specialize in "Urban Opulence", a phrase we've coined to describe extravagant, trendsetting style and limited edition items that are tightly distributed and procured directly from the artisans. Queens of Fancy - beyond the ordinary.

I feel like I have been preparing for this my whole career, my whole life even. With nearly 15 years of professional experience in retail and ecommerce, a keen eye for desirable product and merchandising and the right timing, Queens of Fancy is the next critical play. It was last June when the idea really started to take shape. I hit the ground running on the road from a mere spark to a bona fide retail concept. Now, it's execution time! Your contribution will help breathe life into this adventure and aid the launch of QueensofFancy.com.

A lot must happen between now and the launch of the site in April. Since this is an online business we need powerful computer hardware, a versatile ecommerce platform with advanced functionality, packing and shipping supplies, systems for managing financials and inventory, and well, inventory! My personal financial investment plus the funds raised through this campaign will cover these start-up costs and help us maintain positive cash flow throughout the year.

What do YOU get out of this? Well think about it...Nasty Gal was started on eBay in 2006 by a woman who just wanted to sell some of her vintage finds online - now it is a profitable $100 million business! Threadless was started in 2000 by two guys with $1,000 and an idea to sell cool T-shirts. Today it is a multi-million dollar business shipping over a hundred thousand T-shirts each month! Wouldn't you love to be part of a story like that?! Help us out and you will have this story to tell. The amount doesn't matter - every single dollar brings us a step closer to the goal and I thank you. All donors will be recognized on a dedicated donor page on the site* and receive an exclusive promo once we launch. And if you choose to help out with one of our signature pledges (to the right) you will get some other phenomenal perks** courtesy of Queens of Fancy!

Again, any and all contributions help and are deeply appreciated, but if you can't contribute financially you can still help. Contribute socially by helping spread the word about Queens of Fancy! Share our campaign link, watch and share our videos, follow us on Twitter (@queensoffancy), Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest and stay tuned to Indiegogo for updates on our campaign. Most importantly be sure to visit us this Spring when we launch online. I guarantee you'll see something you like, whether for yourself or for a Queen of Fancy in your life ;)

With sincerity,

Bridgette

*The donor page will remain on the site for three months

**Business names, web addresses and Twitter handles are subject to approval and must be deemed appropriate for posting on the site

story:
Val Garland has created looks for every major fashion magazine and fashion brand in the world, from Vogue to i-D, MAC to Lanvin. Now she is giving a select 1000 artists the chance to receive the skills and opportunities to do the same.

This is an unrivalled opportunity to get insider insight into the fashion world from one of the world's most respected make-up artists.

My name is Tatiana Donaldson, and I secured a place in The Val Garland School Of Make-Up! 

There's no "I" in Team!

I successfully completed step 1: Showcasing  my love, passion, and talent; now I am asking for your love and support! 

For the past three years my life has been dedicated to makeup artistry. In 2012 I had a dream of moving to New York to grow at becoming a successful makeup artist. Of course I know that this doesn't happen over night but I was passionate, dedicated, and eager to embark on this journey of not only finding myself but understanding my true potential as an artist. Instantly I realized that this was going to be a career and I was not going to look back. I left school and moved to NYC. I am a free spirit and deliberate creator! I will never stop at what makes me happy and what I feel in my spirit, and in my heart.

Since then I have freelanced for many modeling agencies in New York, I currently also freelance for Makeup Forever. I am so passionate, and committed to artistry. It is my life. It is everything that surrounds me, it is breathe, the reason why I have sacrificed so much, and why I have taken so many risks. 

This is what I want. I want to grow, learn, and excel. I want to be extraordinary and I know that in due time I will grow into that. I am hungry and eager. These past three years have been the best years thus far because I am doing what I love, what makes me happy, while learning and growing. I have been blessed to learn from the best. Words cannot express how happy and humbled I am by this opportunity. I am  beyond overwhelmed and ecstatic. Thank you. 

I am campaigning to raise the remainder of my tuition $1000.00.  Whether I reach the entire goal or not, each and every contribution goes directly towards The Val Garland School of Make-Up tuition. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity that has been offered to me. I am truly thankful and grateful for every donation. Thank you, thank you!!!

With Love, 

Tatiana

I understand that not everyone can contribute financially. There are many ways you can help!!

  • Make some noise and spread the word about the my campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.!!!
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to promote my campaign on social media! 

Thank you for your love and support! 

xoxo
