story:
Our Story

Tableau D'Hôte Theatre has always placed great importance on the value of strong set, costume, lights, and sound designs in our productions.  Despite the fact that we are a self-financed independent operation, we have strived to provide our designers with resources to create universes that transport our audiences, often making them forget the venue they are actually in.


Our production of Humans, which opens in February, is being produced only two months after our least successful box-office production in 6 years. As such, we need an extra boost of cash flow to help our designers bring their world to life.


The Impact

Lara Kaluza, set dseigner for Humans, received a Montréal English Critics' Circle Award for her design of our March 2010 production of 'A Line In the Sand'.  She is a brilliant up-and-coming designer and without your help the world she has dreamed up for Humans would be greatly compromised.


Noémi Poulin has been designing for Tableau D'Hôte Theatre since 2006. As our artist-in-residence, she has played a huge role in overseeing the visual artistic integrity and synergy of 16 productions. 


Your contribution would directly aid in the creation of a beautiful homogeneous design. A work of art that exists for the world of 'Humans' but also stands as a work of art in and of itself. 


What We Need & What You Get

The set design for Humans is estimated to cost close to $3,000.  Some of the costs include:


Risers: $140
Moveable Block: $340
Cardboard Boxes: $125
Cyc Rentals: $600
Projectors Rentals: $300
Paint: $200


While every donation helps (even a single dollar!), we have also included various perks to heighten the deal. Check 'em out on the side!

Other Ways You Can Help

Our Recent 'Tableau D'Hôte Theatre Fundraising Drive' campaign was a smashing success due entirely to the fact that it was DIWO. Do. It. With. Others.


Dozens of people shared the information about the campaign on their facebook wall, tweeted about it, blogged about it, and with their help we raised over $3, 250 that allowed for us to pay off debt and have some cash-flow for Humans.


It is with your referrals that crowdfunding works. We are stronger together than we are alone.
story_txt:
Our Story
Tableau D'Hôte Theatre has always placed great importance on the value of strong set, costume, lights, and sound
designs in our productions.  Despite the fact that we are a
self-financed independent operation, we have strived to provide our
designers with resources to create universes that transport our
audiences, often making them forget the venue they are actually in.

Our production of Humans, which opens in February, is being produced only two months after our least successful box-office production in
6 years. As such, we need an extra boost of cash flow to help our
designers bring their world to life. 

The Impact
Lara Kaluza, set dseigner for Humans, received a Montréal English Critics' Circle Award for
her design of our March 2010 production of 'A Line In the Sand'.  She
is a brilliant up-and-coming designer and without your help the world
she has dreamed up for Humans would be greatly compromised. 

Noémi Poulin has been designing for Tableau D'Hôte Theatre since
2006. As our artist-in-residence, she has played a huge role in overseeing
the visual artistic integrity and synergy of 16 productions.  

Your contribution would directly aid in the creation of a beautiful
homogeneous design. A work of art that exists for the world
of 'Humans' but also stands as a work of art in and of itself.  

What We Need & What You Get
The set design for Humans is estimated to cost close to $3,000.  Some of the costs include:

Risers: $140Moveable Block: $340Cardboard Boxes: $125Cyc Rentals: $600Projectors Rentals: $300Paint: $200

While every donation helps (even a single dollar!), we have also included various perks to heighten the deal. Check 'em out on the side!

Other Ways You Can Help
Our Recent 'Tableau
D'Hôte Theatre Fundraising Drive' campaign was a smashing success due
entirely to the fact that it was DIWO. Do. It. With. Others. 

Dozens of people shared the information about the campaign on their
facebook wall, tweeted about it, blogged about it, and with their help
we raised over $3, 250 that allowed for us to pay off debt and have
some cash-flow for Humans.

It is with your referrals that crowdfunding works. We are stronger together than we are alone.

story:
Xircado Berlin Design Jewelry is the world's first magnetic jewelry with pendants you can design yourself - 8.000 color combinations to mix and match your style - handmade in Berlin from finest materials. INFOS AUF DEUTSCH

 

While on vacation in Italy I came across colorful and high quality resin-based components for art and crafts.

Immediately I thought "those would make great pendants!"

As the geek that I am, I did not want to do just another necklace, I wanted to do an innovative necklace with the ability to let the customer decide with colors to choose from.

I am proud to present to you the result of my effort: the Xircado Berlin Design Jewelry.

Xircado is a new kind of fashion jewelry where you can design pendants to mix and match your own style. The mix and match jewelry is a new and innovative, like you have never seen before.
Key factors:
  • You select the colors of your pendants (2 included) - 8.000 combinations!
  • Innovative magnetic locking mechanism
  • Nylon-coated necklace Titanium wire - virtually indestructable
  • Comes with storage pouch in 3 beautiful colors
  • Handmade with love and dedication in Berlin, Germany

 http://www.Xircado.com/selector
 


Each Early Bird, Starter Pack and Swarowski limited Editions contain the items listed here:

  • 2 pendants where you choose a unique color combination
  • 1 necklace wire (3 different lenghts to choose from)
  • 1 felt pouch in red, black or charcoal
  • worldwide shipping with no additional charges

Mum and Me Combos have 2 necklaces, 2 pouches and 4 pendants, Awesome Pack has 3 necklaces, 3 pouches and 6 pendants.

The necklace comes with exchangable pendants - each pendant consists of the outer ring, the inner ring and the pearl in the center. There are 20 colors for each of the 3 which totals in 8.000 unique combinations you can choose from.
 
 
What makes Xircado special is the magnetic locking mechanism intergrated in the pendant. No more itching clasps, no fiddling, sits perfectly. The magnets used here are epoxy-coated, safe for your skin and strong enough for a secure fit.

Xircado also features a delicate but durable wire made from Nylon-coated Titanium - which is super-strong, yet lightweight and almost kink-free. There are 3 lenghts you can choose from.
 
Xircado comes with a beautiful pouch made of felt which is available in different colors. Everything is handmade in Berlin, Germany, with high quality materials from ltaly and the USA.
 
Xircado is suitable for many occasions, because you can mix and match it to your wardrobe and it never goes out of style.

May it be Casual, Sports, Party, Business or formal dinner - Xircado pendants are always your stylish companion.

  • innovative design
  • 20 colors = 8.000 combinations
  • match your wardrobe
  • match your style
  • match the occasion
  • innovative design
  • lightweight and durable
  • magnetic lock
  • never goes out of style

 

Really. :)

With 20 colors each for the outer ring, the inner ring and the pearl in the middle, there are 8,000 color combinations to choose from. I have set up a color selector where you can combine all of the colors for your personal taste online (you can even select a wardrobe color):

 http://www.Xircado.com/selector

 

  • $ 5,00 - POSTCARD FROM BERLIN

You will receive a beautiful postcard from Berlin. I send you a stamped and signed original postcard from Berlin, Germany - the city in which all Xircado products are designed and created by hand.

  • $ 18,00 - ONE XIRCADO PENDANT

Notice: You'll need a Xircado necklace for this. To complement your collection this perk buys you a single Xircado pendant which you can use in addition to the Xircado necklace you already have - mix and match your style - complement your wardrobe. Free shipping WORLDWIDE (up to 4 pendants per package). Multiply the amount to order more than one of this perk.

  • $ 20,00 - ONE EXTRA POUCH

This perk buys you a single Xircado pouch for storage or travel of your Xircado necklace you already have. Comes in beautiful red or charcoal or black color design felt. Worldwide shipping included (up to 3 pouches per package). Multiply the amount to order more than one of this perk.

  • $ 55,00 - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL (limited to 55)

This is for our first 55 early-bird backers only! Thanks for helping us getting started! You will receive the Xircado starter pack which consists of 2 pendants (you select one from 8.000 color combinations) one nylon coated titanium ribbon necklace - all in a beautiful red, black or charcoal color felt pouch. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING included. When those are gone, they are gone.
ONLY 55 AVAILABLE.

  • $ 69,00 - XIRCADO STARTER PACK

You will receive the Xircado starter pack which consists of 2 pendants (you select one from 8.000 color combinations) one nylon coated titanium ribbon necklace - all in a beautiful red, black or charcoal color felt pouch. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING included.

  • $ 89,00 - LIMITED SWAROWSKI® EDITION (limited to 30)

Xircado Bling! Edition - LIMITED to 30 backers. You will receive the Xircado starter pack which consists of 2 pendants (you select one from 8.000 color combinations) one nylon coated titanium ribbon necklace - all in a LIMITED EDITION deep black color felt pouch with original SWAROWSKI® ELEMENTS Crystals as logo. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING included. When those are gone, they are gone. ONLY 30 AVAILABLE.

  • $ 120,00 - MUM AND ME COMBO

You will receive TWO Xircado starter packs (2 necklaces + 4 pendants + 2 felt pouches) - one for you and one for your child! Mother and daughter - the most stylish pair we've ever seen! Thats 4 pendants from 8.000 color combinations! Both starter packs consists of 2 pendants, a nylon coated titanium ribbon necklace - all in a beautiful red, black or charcoal color felt pouch. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING included.

  • $ 159,00 - AWESOME VALUE PACK

You get 3 starter packs (that's 3 necklaces + 6 pendants + 3 felt pouches) - so you have all you need to complement your wardrobe - from sporty to business to formal dinner! As always you can choose the pendants from 8.000 color combinations! Each starter pack (3 included here) consists of two pendants, one nylon coated titanium ribbon necklace - all in a beautiful red, black or charcoal color felt pouch. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING included.

 

Each Xircado necklace is produced locally in Berlin. Handmade in Germany.

  • How are you're going to use the Funds?

The raw materials like magnets, the colorful elements used for the pendants (made in Italy) and the Titanium wire (made in the USA) do not come cheap. On all these items, minimum order quantities apply - and we can only surpass these with your support.

Other than that, some of the proceeds are necessary for marketing and to buy materials for production and packaging.

  • When can I expect to get my Xircado Necklace?

We know you want receive your Xircado Necklace yesterday! We are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. However, we will not send you anything but the highest quality product!

The plan is to get the Early Bird Special and Limited Swarowski editions shipped within ten to twelve weeks after this campaign has ended successfully. All the other perks are scheduled to get manufactured and shipped in summer.

  • I have a metal allergy, is this a problem?

Not at all. Xircado does not have any exposed metal. The magnets used to close the pendants are epoxy-encased and the titanium wire is nylon-coated.

  • Are magnets save for my body?
The magnets used here are epoxy-coated, so the material is save for your skin. Generally, magnets are considered to do your body good, but patients with pace makers or implants should not use jewelry with magnets at all.
  • What's the size of the pendants?
The pendants have diameter of 26 mm (+/- 1 mm). The pearl is 8 mm.
  • What do you mean by "handmade"?
All the Xircado Necklaces are produced locally in Berlin, Germany from the several components we buy. Also the pouches are produced by our team. No industrial production, each and every item is made by hand! We have developed a small production line and have developed the methods used ourselves.
  • How can I select the colors of my pendants?
When this campaign has ended successfully I will send out personal links to each backer so you can choose your individual style in the color selector and save your combination. Please make sure you still use the same email address as with your initial contribution, otherwise we cannot add your color code.
  • Worldwide free shipping?
Yes, worldwide free shipping is included in our perks. There are certain export controlled or embargoed countries, entities and persons where we probably cannot ship at all, so if you are located in a country listed on the website below, please don't buy one of our perks: http://www.treasury.gov/resource-center/sanctions/Programs/Pages/Programs.aspx
Import fees and duties are not included.
 
 

1.
Buy one Xircado Necklace! With your purchase you help make this a reality.

2.
Please spread the word! Please share information on Xircado through Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Pinterest or the social media of your choice to spread the word. Please share the charm of Xircado to media and distributors in your neighborhood.

Together, we can make it happen!

                                                                          Scan to send an email:

                          

Send a Tweet right now:

Or copy and paste (emails, facebook, blogs):

Please help to crowdfund Xircado, the world's first magnetic jewelry with pendants you can design yourself - 8.000 color combinations - via Indiegogo: www.igg.me/at/xircado

Thank you for watching the video and reading about this project. We look forward to sending you your Xircado Design Jewelry very soon. Together, we can make it a reality!

 

Xircado ist eine neue Modeschmuck-Linie, die einige innovative Ansätze bietet:

  • Du kannst bei den 2 Anhängern Deine Lieblingsfarben aus 8.000 Farbkombinationen selbst aussuchen - passend zu Deinem Outfit
  • Das Design ist zeitlos und keinem Modetrend unterworfen
  • Statt eines separaten Verschlusses hat Xircado einen magnetischen Verschluss, der direkt in die Anhänger integriert ist. Dadurch verrutscht nichts, und alles bleibt an seinem Platz (außerdem nervt der Verschluß nicht)
  • Die Kette besteht aus Nylon-überzogenem Titan-Draht, ist dadurch super-leicht, trotzdem extrem stabil, zudem fast knick-frei
  • Das ganze kommt in einem coolen Etui aus Filz in drei Farben - versandkostenfrei!
  • Xircado ist eine Idee von Carsten Ussat, hergestellt in Handarbeit in Berlin

Vielen Dank für Deinen Support!

story:
Our Mission:

At Effin Shop we believe that all designers deserve an applause for their ingenuity. Startup designers often get their start by selling their products next to millions of other designers through online marketplaces.  With pieces so creative and unique, they deserve to be in the spotlight.  This is where we want to help.  We are spending countless hours digging to find the most trendy and original designers whose styles are suitable to our customers.  We plan to have 50% of our products come from start-up designers and the other 50% come from established brands.  The established brands will create traffic to our site and allow the startup designers to expand their market and increase their brand awareness.  

While this benefits all the designers we will work with, it will also bring new and original products to our customers that they won't find anywhere else.

What do we need funding for?

-Development of our website to showcase designers and accept payments

-Packaging and shipment fees 

-Legal startup fees

-Storage space

-Marketing towards all of the designers we will work with, as well as targeting our customers

 

Have a question?

Email us at: info@effinshop.com

story:
So, a couple of Saturdays ago as I lay in bed, my apartment exploded.  It was very Fight Club.  I lost everything - which is very cathartic, until you need clothes. Or really, anything else. Help!

So anyway... as I was saying I lost everything,  I'm asking for your help to get me back on my poor burned feet and begin replacing some of what I've lost.  Oh, and find a new apartment, And buy eyeglasses with my current prescription in them... Yup, forgot to grab those too.

Any amount you can give will be greatly appreciated.  In return, I'll find some way to thank you - cook you dinner, serenade you with a song on the ukulele...  Ok, I'm describing a bad date now... But seriously, if you are in the NY area, or if I am visiting where you are, call in a favor.  I'll babysit for free.  References available.

story:
WHY CANT YOU LOOK GOOD IN  SUMMER AND  WINTER?!  DON'T WAIT UNTIL SUMMER TO WEAR YOUR CUTE CLOTHES! ITS ONLY HOT 4 MONTHS OUT OF THE YEAR!!! EMBELLISHED SCARVES ALLOW YOU TO LOOK STYLISH AND CUTE WHEN ITS COLD! YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR SCARF IN THIS WINTER! PLAN AHEAD!

WHEN YOU PLACE THE ORDER CHOOSE WHICH SCARF YOU WANT TO RECEIVE FROM PICTURES BELOW

the collection:

Sick of boring scarves? tired of your rhinestones and other additives to your clothing falling off?

Introducing- EMBELLISHED SCARVES. our scarves come with removable rhinestones and pins that you are able to remove and replace! no more spending hours sewing things back to your clothing. no more worrying about things on your clothing falling off in the wash.!

our pins and embellishments vary in size and color . our scarves are super soft and long lasting. made by me with love and care

our pins vary from 18k gold plate to snowflakes and glass crystals

scarves are cashmere wool blend


your scarves will be delivered to you in OCTOBER -ready -to -wear

GRAY SCARF WITH LARGE RHINESTONE

NAVY BLUE WITH MEDALLIONS

BLACK SCARF WITH 18K GOLD PLATE GOLD STUD

CREAM SCARF WITH SNOWFLAKE


NAVY SCARF WITH 18K GOLD PLATED EMBELLISHMENT ARROWS


BEAUTIFUL WAYS TO STYLE YOUR SCARVES


OUR INTERVIEW WITH APPAREL1977MAGAZINE

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm KahunaDrew and I started the Johnny Kahuna surfwear brand out of a love for all things surf and beach related. I've always loved surfing/skateboarding and I want you to be a part of the brand.

The Details:

 The shirts are screen printed/laser printed, tagless 100% , cotton (Blue, Black, White) and  50/50 Blend (Neons) and 50/50 Blend Tanks (Neons) All the shirts weigh 4.4 oz. and are 30 singles for superior softness and nice fit.

We will be shipping to your  shirts to be delivered to you by June 28th (KahunaDrews Birthday present to you right before the big July 4th vacation week).

Together we will grow  the Johnny Kahuna brand and you will reap the rewards.--Be a part of something!

Surf, Sand, Kahuna!

 

This link is my personal story and why the Johnny Kahuna brand is important to me.

http://youtu.be/U46_tOCK5Rk

story:
Short Summary

 My Collection has been admitted by the Plitzs NYC Fashion review board for the 2015 Show during the New York City Fashion Week. This is a great opportunity for emerging designers. With this great opportunity I would like to bring with me a team of Native Youth/Student Individuals that will gain great experiences during the Fashion Week and bring back to there perspective communities and influence other youth and students to advance themselves in the modeling, photography, design and journalism career fields.

What We Need & What You Get

 We are seeking funding to help with the travel, room and board costs of each youth individual that participates in the JG Indie Pay It Forward Fashion Campaign.  

The Impact

 The JG Indie Pay It Forward Fashion Campaign will definitely grant Native Youth Individuals the opportunity to travel to New York City's 2015 Fashion Week, with a guarantee to sit in along side the Plitzs NYC Fashion Weeks elite spectators, ranging from professional photographers, journalists, designers, models/modeling scouts and post secondary career promoters.

Risks & Challenges

 Our main hurtle is gain enough donations to help accommodate each individual. Perspective participants come from economically stricken communities, much like the community I myself come from. I want to set the example that it does not matter what sort of community you come from, as long as you have a dream and goal, GO for it. With your generous donation My team as well as myself will be able to make the JG INDIE Fashion Show & Campaign a great success in NYC and have our very own appreciative Native Youth and Students spectate the amazement of NYC Fashion week as well as make some great networks.

Other Ways You Can Help

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this great opportunity for Native Youth and Students in the Arts.

story:
What is BattleShop?

  • BattleShop is a hybrid between an online scavenger hunt and online “fantasy shopping.”  BattleShop engages shoppers in passionate competition to outdo each other via the fashion they love and are about to love.  It connects style-conscious brands with consumers who shop for love and bloodsport.   It is, in short, a fantasy league for the rest of us.

  • BattleShop takes the competition-based nature of fantasy sports and makes online shopping fun, social, and competitive with a game that gives power shopping a whole new meaning.  BattleShop is a place where women can let their inner fashion fierceness free on the only field that matters. The exhilaration of kicking a ball through the uprights is nothing compared to kicking someone out of the way for the right pair of Manolos.

  • Players will BattleShop for the chance to win great prizes and bragging rights. 

  • The mission is to provide an online environment where players can use the site and mobile app for multiple purposes simultaneously: gameplay, registry/wish list generation, and shopping research for staying on trend and on budget. 

  • BattleShop isn't the product of a tech empire - we are a small group of 6 everyday people, friends and family with experience across publishing, digital media, sales, and IT/IS.  We've had a fast learning curve, and we are fortunate to be surrounded with a great network of people willing to offer feedback and assistance.  We never thought of ourselves as budding entrepreneurs -- we just had an idea and we ran with it.   And here we are! 

What We Need & What You Get

All funds raised by this campaign will be used directly on the site and app development.  In order to make BattleShop successful, we need to do a couple of different things, all of which can be accomplished if we meet or exceed our goal:

If we raise less than $25,000:   Secure more programmer and graphic designer hours to finish additional features and enhancements to site during and post beta testing; secure additional web hosting resources 

If we raise more than $25,000:  Start building our app!  Hire an app developer (while we will launch with a mobile web-optimized site, we feel an app would greatly enhance the online experience).  Apps are expensive!  Should we not meet or exceed our goal, we won't be able to secure an app or deliver the badge perks associated with it.  


The Impact

BattleShop is taking already existing trends -- fantasy shopping, online shopping, and online personal collection and curation -- and creating an entirely new game online. BattleShop will appeal to women who are fantasy sports-lovers and -haters alike -- it channels the spirit of competition and the thrill of victory!   Add in serious bragging rights and real prizes, and you have what we hope is a fun, engaging, and addictive game.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that everyone can't contribute, even if they want to.  But, there are other ways you can help BattleShop!   You can share our campaign using Indiegogo's sharing tools, and you can follow us across our social media and spread the word about us.  

Our social media:  Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, and our Blog.

story:
Short Summary



My name is Margee, and I am passionate about boobs.  I have been working as a professional bra fitter for several years now for a large retail store, and I am wanting to branch out on my own.  Bras alone don’t make a viable business, so I am going to work in the whole range of fashion.  I am specializing in plus sizes, since I see this size range have the most difficulty finding appropriate pieces.

You might also like to know that I have a bachelors degree in accounting, and that I have had the entrepreneur spirit for as long as I can remember.  I remember selling "bookmarks" I made in the 1st grade for a nickle each!

My business, Margee's Trendy Plus, is a consulting firm that 1. helps clients sort out their current wardrobe, 2. helps clients learn what shapes and styles work best for their bodies, and 3. takes clients shopping to complete their wardrobe. And every great wardrobe starts with the right foundation garments.

In addition to our main consulting operations, we will also sell plus sized clothing on our website that is hand picked by me to be high quality and flattering on a plus frame. 

With the help of your contribution, I hope to reduce the number of large ladies posted on www.peopleofwalmart.com



What We Need & What You Get

$1244 will cover all of my start up costs that I haven’t paid for already, and it will cover my operating expenses for 6 months. 

  • Web hosting 5.99 month

  • Accounting software 26.95 month

  • Web shopping cart 29.99 month

  • Cell phone 50.00 month (I am having to get a special phone for the business, I am not trying to get y’all to pay for my personal phone!)

  • Storage 61.00 month

  • Assorted supplies $200 (clothing racks, ticket gun, steamer, clothing rack for my car, etc.)

Not included is the $106.73 that I have already spent on my domain.  Also not included is the $232.95 I paid to become a LLC and get all of my business licenses.  Don't tell my husband, but I have also spent around $600 for wholesale clothing to sell on my website. (I REALLY need that accounting software to keep track of my spending!)



Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you donate or not, I would greatly appreciate you sharing my campaign.  Also, if you live in the NWA area and are plus sized, you can donate clothing that you no longer need/wear.  Used clothing that I accumulate gets sold at a local consignment shop to go towards my expenses.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ilze Anna, and welcome to the IndieGoGo campaign page for OtakuPolish, nail polish made just for anime lovers! OtakuPolish is Big 3-Free, Handmade with love, and ALWAYS cruelty free.
OtakuPolish started as a middle-of-the-night flash of inspiration just as I was falling asleep - what a great idea - POLISH INSPIRED BY ANIME!

Three months later, OtakuPolish is in it's current iteration! I have my own Etsy, twitter, tumblr, and website (in progress) on my own domain (!), and I have successfully made (and sold out of!) my first line.

Unfortunately, the school year has started again, and I am unable to fund the creation of any more polish. I'm a poor college student who goes to school full time, and I'm currently trying to move out of an awful apartment (I get woken up every day at 6AM, and hear banging till 11PM or later at night, with a manager who won't do anything to help me.) Between regular bills, upkeep on my car, and groceries, it's tough to say I'll even have a chance to move, even though my grades and health are suffering from the stress and lack of sleep. This is where YOU come in. Yes, you, my wonderful reader! :3

With the help of a successful campaign, I will be able to:

  • Make more polish! 
  • Make not just mini bottles - full size bottles as well!
  • I will be able to take enough time off work to make polish AND do my homework, AND pay my bills - and maybe even move too!
  • Make more than one line at a time, and keep a bigger stock than I've ever had before!
  • I will be able to even do things like giveaways and promotions, coupons, etc, to pass on savings to my customers! ^_^
  • Properly prepare for and stock up for the holiday season
  • Expand my sights and look into selling in other locations such as
    • the anime club at my university
    • Anime Conventions and similar meetings
    • Beauty trade shows and industry events
    • "Japanese lifestyle" stores

This is the reason I have set my deadline to relatively soon - I would love to be able to try and stock up for the holiday season, because I've heard from many that my polish would be great as a gift, thanks to my packaging. :3

Currently, I have four lines planned, each with four polishes- with recipes!, and many many more jotted down as drafts!

Neon Genesis Evangelion
Asuka Line
Eva Line

Studio Ghibli
Totoro Line
Howl's Moving Castle Line

See down for descriptions of each line!

I also have many, many more lines in various stages of planning. However, the funding I am asking for would allow me to create at least these. There might be minor changes from the drawing board to reality, however I know what I want to see in each polish, and how I want to try to best capture each character, creature, or item so pivotal to the world in which it resides. 

 

What I Need & What You Get

My Goal: $1000

I am asking for $1000, in flexible funding. 

"Flexible funding" means that even if I do not reach my goal, I still receive the money I have been donated till then. (However, the percentage taken by IndieGoGo is more than twice as high if I do not meet my goal. That is a risk I am willing to take. :c)

I realize that this can seem like a daunting number, but allow me to put it in perspective! If just 77 people donate $13, I will reach my goal! That's not so hard, right? :3 

I am planning to use the funds I receive to make 16 of each polish colour in minis (7ml), and 4 of each polish in full size (15ml) for each line (2 Eva lines and 2 Ghibli lines.)
This translates into 16 mini bottle four-packs, and 4 of each full-size color sold individually, PER LINE.
In total, this will be 256 mini bottles of polish and 64 full size bottles.

My Planned Lines:

Neon Genesis Evangelion 

Asuka Line (I had made this already - and it Sold Out!) - Four polishes featuring my favorite anime character

  • Asuka 001 - The Fiery Redhead (Asuka her wonderful self!)
    • Red and copper micro glitter with blue, copper and gold accents
  • Asuka 002 - The Yellow Dress (Her softer side... it exists!)
    • Pale golden micro glitter with blue, pink, and gold accents
  • Asuka 003 - Big Red Doll (Her sometimes-cooperative Evangelion)
    • Red micro glitter with green, and black&white matte diamond accents
  • Asuka 004 - Basic Thermodynamics (The infamous "Swimsuit Scene" ^_~)
    • Red and white glitter top coat, produces a dot-like effect

Eva Line - Four polishes featuring major characters/plot devices in the anime

  • Eva 001 - Child of the Moon (Because who doesn't love Ayanami Rei??)
    • Pale blue glitter with white and red accents
  • Eva 002 - Captain Katsuragi (Our favorite outgoing drunk with a dark past)
    • Deep plum glitter with red, teal, and silver accents
  • Eva 003 - A Mother's Love (Unit 01 themed polish, ooh spoiler(?) name!)
    • Bright purple glitter with lime, yellow, black, and red accents
  • Eva 004 - School of Pilot Children (A polish inspired by the girls' school uniforms)
    • Teal glitter with white and red accents

Studio Ghibli

Totoro Line - Four polishes inspired by arguably Studio Ghibli's most popular work

  • Totoro 001 - Keeper of the Forest (Totoro his big, cuddly flying self)
    • Pale and dark grey glitter with loads of sparkly accents
  • Totoro 002 - Cat Bus (Everyone's favorite mode of transportation!)
    • Deep yellow and copper glitter with gold and brown accents
  • Totoro 003 - Tsukamori (The magical forest in which Totoro and his chibi-selves reside)
    • Deep green and light green glitter with green and more green accents. Green!
    • Totoro 003 - Mei (The little sister, still innocent to the ways of the world)
    • Bright coral/salmon glitter with yellow and gold accents

Howl's Moving Castle Line - Four polishes inspired by my (second) favorite Ghibli film

  • Howl 001 - Radish Head (My favorite character. I can't deny it. He's adorable.)
    • Black glitter with pale grey, blue, and deep blue glitter accents
  • Howl 002 - Demon With A Heart (A polish inspired by everyone's favorite energy source, the demon Calcifer)
    • Red, orange, and gold glitter with gold and orange accents. It will look like flames!
  • Howl 003 - Beautiful Magician (The brilliant and beautiful Howl himself.)
    • Pink and grey glitter with light and deep blue accents
  • Howl 004 - Field of Flowers (Inspired by his favorite place to go.)
    • Bright blue and green glitter with pink, yellow, white, and orange accents

An important note: I have specific plans and recipes for each and every polish. They are all going to have different shapes and sizes of glitter in them - some large, some small, some tiny, some hexagonal, some square, some jagged - some even in special shapes, like stars, hearts, moons, or flowers! I hope you will all forgive me for not mentioning details, as I'd like to keep the individual recipe specifications secret until I have a chance to present them! ^^;; It's also for the sake of brevity, and as a sort of insurance plan, just in case!
If you donate, and want to know details about the polish(es) you choose - you can e-mail me at otakupolish@yahoo.com and I will tell you everything you want to know! <3

 

The Cost Breakdown:

  • New bottles for mixing (mini size, 7ml): $53.00 for 260 count
  • New bottles for mixing (full-size, 15ml): $32.00 for 88 count
    • Bottle total not including shipping, taxes, or fees: $85.00
      • Bottle total including shipping estimate: $100.00
  • Glitter order for "standard" glitter colors: $6.00 x 20 = $120.00
  • Glitter order for "premium" glitter colors: $4.00 x 22 = $88.00
  • Glitter order for "specialty" glitter colors: $6.25 x 5 = $31.25
  • Glitter order for "accent" glitter colors: $3.50 x 22 = $77.00
    • Glitter total not including shipping, taxes, or fees: $316.25
      • Glitter total including shipping estimate: $400.00
  • Standard polish base - for mini (7ml) bottles: $7.00 x 5 = $35.00
  • Standard polish base - for full-size (15ml) bottles: $7.00 x 3 = $21.00
  • Specialty polish base - for mini (7ml) bottles: $19.00
  • Specialty polish base - for full-size (15ml) bottles: $19.00 x 2 = $38.00
    • Polish base total, not including shipping, taxes, fees: $113.00
      • Polish base total, including shipping estimate: $130.00
  • Listing price for items on etsy: $00.20 x 80 = $16.00
  • Shipping cost for each four-pack: $4.00 x 64 = $256.00
  • Shipping cost for each individual full-sized bottle: $2.00 x 16 = $32.00
  • Total for all polish materials, and shipping: $934.00
  • This leaves me with $66.00 for things like polish boxes, labels, printer ink, shipping boxes and packing materials.

Please note that I have already researched prices, taxes, fees, and shipping for all products. 
I strive to find the best quality ingredients for the lowest prices - I do not buy excessive or overpriced materials, but I also never cut corners. OtakuPolish is my pride, and I want that to reflect in my products. My customers are more important to me than anything, and I want them to be happy!

If I do not reach my goal, I will make as much polish as I can with the funds that were raised.

The first line I will be making is the Totoro line. In order to maximise the return my investors get, I will be making as many of the Totoro line until I reach my initial goal of making 16 four-packs and 4 full-size bottles of each color. If I have enough to reach that goal, I will move on to the Eva line, until I have that same total. Similarly, I will expand to the Howl's Moving Castle line. If I succeed in raising my full amount, I will of course make everything!

Donor Perks: 

  • Please note that all polish descriptions are intentionally vague generalizations. I have specific recipes for each polish, and they will all contain a huge variety of glitter
    • Some glitters will be hexagonal, some square, some diamond. Some will be large, some small, some tiny. Some will be holographic, some shiny, some matte. Some will even have special shapes like hearts, stars, moons, or flowers!
      • If you are a donor, and you want to know the specific recipe for a particular polish, please feel free to e-mail me at otakupolish@yahoo.com and I will tell you everything you want to know! The descriptions were kept vague for the sake of brevity, and as a sort of insurance policy. Thanks for understanding!
  • Donors may mix and match perks as they see fit!
    • For instance, if the perk is for two 4-packs of polish or 2 full-size bottles, the donor may choose instead to get four 4-packs or 4 full-size bottles - it is entirely up to you! Similar options exist for all other multi-polish perks 
    • For $13, you can get EITHER a 15ml bottle, OR 2 minis (7ml)!
    • For $25, you can get either a 4-pack of minis, or two full-sized polishes, or two mini bottles and one full-sized polish! :)
    • For $50, you can get two 4-packs, or four full-sized polishes, or one 4-pack and two full-sized polishes. Whatever combination you like! You also get a drawing by me with this perk! (See below!)
    • For $100, you can get ALL FOUR 4-packs, my entire line! Or you can get eight full-sized polishes! Or, you can get three 4-packs and 6 full-sized polishes, or two 4-packs and and 4 full-sized polishes, or three 4-packs and 2 full-sized polishses. :) It really is completely up to you! You also get a drawing by me with this perk (see below!)
    • For $200, you get the rights to my soul. No lie. You get everything you've ever wanted and more! ALL the four 4-packs, PLUS 2 full-sized polishes, PLUS a custom polish DESIGNED BY YOU. You are the Grand Poobah and I your willing servant. You also get a drawing, and my eternal love and gratitude, and a limited (VERY LIMITED) edition spectraflair polish made by me! Yes, I have spectraflair in it's pure powdered form! ^_^
  • Regarding the drawings:
    • I'm not bad, I promise! :3
    • They will be in pencil, possibly lightly colored with colored pencils or watercolors
    • Tell me what you'd like to see and I'll do my best. Please keep it reasonable and SFW. :3
  • Once my supplies have arrived, I will get in touch with all the donors to confirm color choices and selections. 
  • I will try my hardest to get all bottles shipped out as fast as humanly possible, and will be in contact with all donors as soon as my supplies arrive.
  • I will do my best to make sure all polishes arrive before December 10th, in case they are gifts.
    • If you are planning to give someone your perk as a holiday gift, please let me know so I can try to make arrangements accordingly!
    • Please note that the larger perks *will* take longer. I will always keep you updated with your status and am *always* available to answer questions!

The Impact

I love nail polish, and I love anime. I know that there are plenty of otakus out there who would love to wear polish inspired by their favorite characters - the awesome array of anime-inspired nail art proves it! The internet has welcomed The Age Of The Geek, and I love it for that. Where else would I find other people who love polish, and anime, just as much as me?! I hope to bridge the gap between the two camps, and reach out to all the otakus painting Totoros on their nails and reblogging every Naruto gif on tumblr ever.

I also love the indie nail polish community. It's a truly awesome thing to see the amazing inventions that people come up with, and the creativity is just spectacular. I would love to add my humble shop to the mix, and hopefully carve out a niche for myself.

I have already proven myself to be a successful polish-maker. I have sold out of my first line and received only positive feedback. I have had my polish reviewed by several bloggers, all of whom were enthusiastic and excited to see more. I have so many ideas I would love to get to making, and it's frustrating to not have the funds to get started. With your help, I can make not just the lines outlined above, but more still! The world of anime is huge and unexplored, and I have plenty I'd love to see made into nail polish.

Some ideas for future lines include:

  • Naruto
  • Cowboy Bebop
  • Sailor Moon
  • Love Hina
  • Inuyasha
  • 5cm Per Second
  • Gundam Wing
  • Chobits
  • Honey & Clover
  • Ah! My Goddess

With your help, I'll be able to make all these and more! 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand if you can't contribute. Trust me, I know how tough it is in this economy! However, that doesn't mean you can't help!

I would love it if you would take the time to spread the word about my campaign. Use the share tools on the page, blog about it, tweet it, "like" it, whatever! The internet is wonderful because it connects us all, and every voice sharing reaches hundreds more! 

Be sure to "Like" my facebook page as well, for updates, photos, and random odds and ends. My website is under construction as well, but soon it'll be up and running and keeping everyone up to date.

Thank you for taking the time to read (if you got this far!) I cannot express how much your support means to me. Even if all you can do is share, you have my deepest thanks. You are excellent!

Have a great day!

Sincerely,

-Ilze Anna
Founder & Creator
OtakuPolish
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Ilze Anna, and welcome to the IndieGoGo campaign page for OtakuPolish, nail polish made just for anime lovers! OtakuPolish is Big 3-Free, Handmade with love, and ALWAYS cruelty free.OtakuPolish started as a middle-of-the-night flash of inspiration just as I was falling asleep - what a great idea - POLISH INSPIRED BY ANIME!
Three months later, OtakuPolish is in it's current iteration! I have my own Etsy, twitter, tumblr, and website (in progress) on my own domain (!), and I have successfully made (and sold out of!) my first line.
Unfortunately, the school year has started again, and I am unable to fund the creation of any more polish. I'm a poor college student who goes to school full time, and I'm currently trying to move out of an awful apartment (I get woken up every day at 6AM, and hear banging till 11PM or later at night, with a manager who won't do anything to help me.) Between regular bills, upkeep on my car, and groceries, it's tough to say I'll even have a chance to move, even though my grades and health are suffering from the stress and lack of sleep. This is where YOU come in. Yes, you, my wonderful reader! :3
With the help of a successful campaign, I will be able to:

Make more polish! 
Make not just mini bottles - full size bottles as well!
I will be able to take enough time off work to make polish AND do my homework, AND pay my bills - and maybe even move too!
Make more than one line at a time, and keep a bigger stock than I've ever had before!
I will be able to even do things like giveaways and promotions, coupons, etc, to pass on savings to my customers! ^_^
Properly prepare for and stock up for the holiday season
Expand my sights and look into selling in other locations such as

the anime club at my university
Anime Conventions and similar meetings
Beauty trade shows and industry events
"Japanese lifestyle" stores



This is the reason I have set my deadline to relatively soon - I would love to be able to try and stock up for the holiday season, because I've heard from many that my polish would be great as a gift, thanks to my packaging. :3
Currently, I have four lines planned, each with four polishes- with recipes!, and many many more jotted down as drafts!
Neon Genesis EvangelionAsuka LineEva Line
Studio GhibliTotoro LineHowl's Moving Castle Line
See down for descriptions of each line!
I also have many, many more lines in various stages of planning. However, the funding I am asking for would allow me to create at least these. There might be minor changes from the drawing board to reality, however I know what I want to see in each polish, and how I want to try to best capture each character, creature, or item so pivotal to the world in which it resides. 
 
What I Need & What You Get
My Goal: $1000
I am asking for $1000, in flexible funding. 

"Flexible funding" means that even if I do not reach my goal, I still receive the money I have been donated till then. (However, the percentage taken by IndieGoGo is more than twice as high if I do not meet my goal. That is a risk I am willing to take. :c)
I realize that this can seem like a daunting number, but allow me to put it in perspective! If just 77 people donate $13, I will reach my goal! That's not so hard, right? :3 
I am planning to use the funds I receive to make 16 of each polish colour in minis (7ml), and 4 of each polish in full size (15ml) for each line (2 Eva lines and 2 Ghibli lines.)This translates into 16 mini bottle four-packs, and 4 of each full-size color sold individually, PER LINE.In total, this will be 256 mini bottles of polish and 64 full size bottles.
My Planned Lines:
Neon Genesis Evangelion 
Asuka Line (I had made this already - and it Sold Out!) - Four polishes featuring my favorite anime character

Asuka 001 - The Fiery Redhead (Asuka her wonderful self!)

Red and copper micro glitter with blue, copper and gold accents


Asuka 002 - The Yellow Dress (Her softer side... it exists!)

Pale golden micro glitter with blue, pink, and gold accents


Asuka 003 - Big Red Doll (Her sometimes-cooperative Evangelion)

Red micro glitter with green, and black&white matte diamond accents


Asuka 004 - Basic Thermodynamics (The infamous "Swimsuit Scene" ^_~)

Red and white glitter top coat, produces a dot-like effect


Eva Line - Four polishes featuring major characters/plot devices in the anime

Eva 001 - Child of the Moon (Because who doesn't love Ayanami Rei??)

Pale blue glitter with white and red accents


Eva 002 - Captain Katsuragi (Our favorite outgoing drunk with a dark past)

Deep plum glitter with red, teal, and silver accents


Eva 003 - A Mother's Love (Unit 01 themed polish, ooh spoiler(?) name!)

Bright purple glitter with lime, yellow, black, and red accents


Eva 004 - School of Pilot Children (A polish inspired by the girls' school uniforms)

Teal glitter with white and red accents


Studio Ghibli
Totoro Line - Four polishes inspired by arguably Studio Ghibli's most popular work

Totoro 001 - Keeper of the Forest (Totoro his big, cuddly flying self)

Pale and dark grey glitter with loads of sparkly accents


Totoro 002 - Cat Bus (Everyone's favorite mode of transportation!)

Deep yellow and copper glitter with gold and brown accents


Totoro 003 - Tsukamori (The magical forest in which Totoro and his chibi-selves reside)

Deep green and light green glitter with green and more green accents. Green!


Totoro 003 - Mei (The little sister, still innocent to the ways of the world)

Bright coral/salmon glitter with yellow and gold accents

Howl's Moving Castle Line - Four polishes inspired by my (second) favorite Ghibli film

Howl 001 - Radish Head (My favorite character. I can't deny it. He's adorable.)

Black glitter with pale grey, blue, and deep blue glitter accents


Howl 002 - Demon With A Heart (A polish inspired by everyone's favorite energy source, the demon Calcifer)

Red, orange, and gold glitter with gold and orange accents. It will look like flames!


Howl 003 - Beautiful Magician (The brilliant and beautiful Howl himself.)

Pink and grey glitter with light and deep blue accents


Howl 004 - Field of Flowers (Inspired by his favorite place to go.)

Bright blue and green glitter with pink, yellow, white, and orange accents


An important note: I have specific plans and recipes for each and every polish. They are all going to have different shapes and sizes of glitter in them - some large, some small, some tiny, some hexagonal, some square, some jagged - some even in special shapes, like stars, hearts, moons, or flowers! I hope you will all forgive me for not mentioning details, as I'd like to keep the individual recipe specifications secret until I have a chance to present them! ^^;; It's also for the sake of brevity, and as a sort of insurance plan, just in case!If you donate, and want to know details about the polish(es) you choose - you can e-mail me at otakupolish@yahoo.com and I will tell you everything you want to know! <3
 
The Cost Breakdown:

New bottles for mixing (mini size, 7ml): $53.00 for 260 count
New bottles for mixing (full-size, 15ml): $32.00 for 88 count

Bottle total not including shipping, taxes, or fees: $85.00

Bottle total including shipping estimate: $100.00




Glitter order for "standard" glitter colors: $6.00 x 20 = $120.00
Glitter order for "premium" glitter colors: $4.00 x 22 = $88.00
Glitter order for "specialty" glitter colors: $6.25 x 5 = $31.25
Glitter order for "accent" glitter colors: $3.50 x 22 = $77.00

Glitter total not including shipping, taxes, or fees: $316.25

Glitter total including shipping estimate: $400.00




Standard polish base - for mini (7ml) bottles: $7.00 x 5 = $35.00
Standard polish base - for full-size (15ml) bottles: $7.00 x 3 = $21.00
Specialty polish base - for mini (7ml) bottles: $19.00
Specialty polish base - for full-size (15ml) bottles: $19.00 x 2 = $38.00

Polish base total, not including shipping, taxes, fees: $113.00

Polish base total, including shipping estimate: $130.00




Listing price for items on etsy: $00.20 x 80 = $16.00
Shipping cost for each four-pack: $4.00 x 64 = $256.00
Shipping cost for each individual full-sized bottle: $2.00 x 16 = $32.00
Total for all polish materials, and shipping: $934.00
This leaves me with $66.00 for things like polish boxes, labels, printer ink, shipping boxes and packing materials.
Please note that I have already researched prices, taxes, fees, and shipping for all products. I strive to find the best quality ingredients for the lowest prices - I do not buy excessive or overpriced materials, but I also never cut corners. OtakuPolish is my pride, and I want that to reflect in my products. My customers are more important to me than anything, and I want them to be happy!
If I do not reach my goal, I will make as much polish as I can with the funds that were raised.The first line I will be making is the Totoro line. In order to maximise the return my investors get, I will be making as many of the Totoro line until I reach my initial goal of making 16 four-packs and 4 full-size bottles of each color. If I have enough to reach that goal, I will move on to the Eva line, until I have that same total. Similarly, I will expand to the Howl's Moving Castle line. If I succeed in raising my full amount, I will of course make everything!
Donor Perks: 

Please note that all polish descriptions are intentionally vague generalizations. I have specific recipes for each polish, and they will all contain a huge variety of glitter

Some glitters will be hexagonal, some square, some diamond. Some will be large, some small, some tiny. Some will be holographic, some shiny, some matte. Some will even have special shapes like hearts, stars, moons, or flowers!


If you are a donor, and you want to know the specific recipe for a particular polish, please feel free to e-mail me at otakupolish@yahoo.com and I will tell you everything you want to know! The descriptions were kept vague for the sake of brevity, and as a sort of insurance policy. Thanks for understanding!




Donors may mix and match perks as they see fit!

For instance, if the perk is for two 4-packs of polish or 2 full-size bottles, the donor may choose instead to get four 4-packs or 4 full-size bottles - it is entirely up to you! Similar options exist for all other multi-polish perks 
For $13, you can get EITHER a 15ml bottle, OR 2 minis (7ml)!
For $25, you can get either a 4-pack of minis, or two full-sized polishes, or two mini bottles and one full-sized polish! :)
For $50, you can get two 4-packs, or four full-sized polishes, or one 4-pack and two full-sized polishes. Whatever combination you like! You also get a drawing by me with this perk! (See below!)
For $100, you can get ALL FOUR 4-packs, my entire line! Or you can get eight full-sized polishes! Or, you can get three 4-packs and 6 full-sized polishes, or two 4-packs and and 4 full-sized polishes, or three 4-packs and 2 full-sized polishses. :) It really is completely up to you! You also get a drawing by me with this perk (see below!)
For $200, you get the rights to my soul. No lie. You get everything you've ever wanted and more! ALL the four 4-packs, PLUS 2 full-sized polishes, PLUS a custom polish DESIGNED BY YOU. You are the Grand Poobah and I your willing servant. You also get a drawing, and my eternal love and gratitude, and a limited (VERY LIMITED) edition spectraflair polish made by me! Yes, I have spectraflair in it's pure powdered form! ^_^


Regarding the drawings:

I'm not bad, I promise! :3
They will be in pencil, possibly lightly colored with colored pencils or watercolors
Tell me what you'd like to see and I'll do my best. Please keep it reasonable and SFW. :3


Once my supplies have arrived, I will get in touch with all the donors to confirm color choices and selections. 
I will try my hardest to get all bottles shipped out as fast as humanly possible, and will be in contact with all donors as soon as my supplies arrive.
I will do my best to make sure all polishes arrive before December 10th, in case they are gifts.

If you are planning to give someone your perk as a holiday gift, please let me know so I can try to make arrangements accordingly!
Please note that the larger perks *will* take longer. I will always keep you updated with your status and am *always* available to answer questions!



The Impact
I love nail polish, and I love anime. I know that there are plenty of otakus out there who would love to wear polish inspired by their favorite characters - the awesome array of anime-inspired nail art proves it! The internet has welcomed The Age Of The Geek, and I love it for that. Where else would I find other people who love polish, and anime, just as much as me?! I hope to bridge the gap between the two camps, and reach out to all the otakus painting Totoros on their nails and reblogging every Naruto gif on tumblr ever.
I also love the indie nail polish community. It's a truly awesome thing to see the amazing inventions that people come up with, and the creativity is just spectacular. I would love to add my humble shop to the mix, and hopefully carve out a niche for myself.
I have already proven myself to be a successful polish-maker. I have sold out of my first line and received only positive feedback. I have had my polish reviewed by several bloggers, all of whom were enthusiastic and excited to see more. I have so many ideas I would love to get to making, and it's frustrating to not have the funds to get started. With your help, I can make not just the lines outlined above, but more still! The world of anime is huge and unexplored, and I have plenty I'd love to see made into nail polish.
Some ideas for future lines include:

Naruto
Cowboy Bebop
Sailor Moon
Love Hina
Inuyasha
5cm Per Second
Gundam Wing
Chobits
Honey & Clover
Ah! My Goddess

With your help, I'll be able to make all these and more! 


Other Ways You Can Help
I understand if you can't contribute. Trust me, I know how tough it is in this economy! However, that doesn't mean you can't help!
I would love it if you would take the time to spread the word about my campaign. Use the share tools on the page, blog about it, tweet it, "like" it, whatever! The internet is wonderful because it connects us all, and every voice sharing reaches hundreds more! 
Be sure to "Like" my facebook page as well, for updates, photos, and random odds and ends. My website is under construction as well, but soon it'll be up and running and keeping everyone up to date.
Thank you for taking the time to read (if you got this far!) I cannot express how much your support means to me. Even if all you can do is share, you have my deepest thanks. You are excellent!
Have a great day!
Sincerely,
-Ilze AnnaFounder & CreatorOtakuPolish

story:
My Story

My name is Hallah, and I'm a fashion merchandiser born and raised in Los Angeles. I started working in the fashion industry at age 15, and over the last ten years, I've worked for some of the biggest names in the designer and retail industry, as well as every major buy/sell clothing store in the country. With ten years of knowledge and training under my belt, I am ready to pursue my dream of opening my own recycled vintage and designer clothing store.


The purpose of Ruby SoHo is simple: to provide shoppers with the ability to purchase expensive designer merchandise at the same prices they would pay at a Goodwill. With the economy in a negative state, shoppers have been scared away from expensive department stores and are finding new ways to get their fashion fix for less. For many people, the solution has been thrift shopping.


Now, imagine walking into a store to the sound of your favorite song pumping through an old school speaker system. You approach the closest rack, and find yourself sifting through a wall full of pants by companies such as Da Nang, Seven For All Mankind, Escada, Gucci, Derek Lam, Tsubi, Marc Jacobs, and Phillip Lim, along with some cute vintage Levis. When you reach for the price tag, you assume the store owner is either completely insane, or has no knowledge of what she is selling...$8?! That is unheard of. Imagine walking into a secondhand store and knowing you won't have to spend hours going through racks to find one or two items you like.




With Ruby SoHo, I want to incorporate the flavor of the 1990's in a way that takes shoppers back to that moment: Pearl Jam blasting on the speakers, a True Romance poster on the fitting room wall. I want my customers to leave the store ecstatic to have just purchased two whole outfits for under $50, and grinning from ear to ear because they have just experienced a wonderful sense of nostalgia!


My short term goal, which is why I have started this campaign, is to open a successful online store, with a one year goal of opening a storefront in the Los Angeles area. Any contribution that is made if and after the goal is reached will go towards the opening of the Ruby SoHo storefront and design.




The Impact

Your contribution to the store will change my life. Seriously. It has taken me many years to get to this level of buying ability, but with your help, I can finally pursue my ultimate life passion, and in the process, make many peoples lives a little bit more wonderful by providing them with the ability to own quality designer items at very little cost. In contributing, you are also helping to reduce the amount of waste and over-production of new textiles, and allowing otherwise forgotten goods to be recycled for potentially many more years.


If I can find 100 people to donate $20, I can reach my goal and execute the crap out of this operation! What is $20, really?


The cost of parking downtown for three hours.

A few Starbucks trips.

That one top you bought from that one store that ripped after you wore it that one time.

Dinner on a bad date.

The cover charge at a shitty nightclub.

One Yankee Candle. Just one.


OR, $20 is a HUGE push towards helping this girl make her dream into a reality.


What Ruby SoHo Needs & What You Get

Your contribution goes towards the bulk purchasing of more wonderful one of a kind fashion for the online store.

Your contribution goes towards the purchase of digital photo equipment for listing all merchandise.

Your contribution goes towards the hiring of an online web designer.

Your contribution goes towards the reconstruction of our online store headquarters, where all merchandise is processed, photographed, listed online, and shipped from.

Your contribution goes towards changing my life & putting a major smile on my face! :)


Check out the perks, which include coupons for savings on your first purchase, a thank you video, a personalized thrift shopping experience to teach you about thrift shopping on a budget, gift certificates, and more! Don't like any of those perks? Message me! I'm happy to take suggestions on other creative ways to say THANK YOU :)


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily at this time, please help me by spreading the word to your friends about this campaign! If we all work together, there is no limit to the impact this campaign can have.


Please feel free to share this link with your friends, and visit Ruby Soho on Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/rubysohola


You can also find us on Twitter, tweeting away about the latest trends and how to create them for less: https://twitter.com/RubySohoLA


Thank you SO MUCH for taking some time out of this beautiful day to check out my campaign, and a HUGE EXTRA SPECIAL thank you to everyone for contributing!
