story:
We are a team of professional women who believe the words 'figure flaws' should be eliminated from our collective consciousness.  We know that all women, in all stations of life and in every corner of the world are valuable—no matter her size, shape, heritage or hue.  We are ethical in our business practices.  We know that success is measured by the people we help along the way, not the purses we carry or the shoes we wear, but we still like that stuff, too.  We want to accelerate the concept that women should be listened to, respected, and invested in.

You can help us with our mission:

INVEST in us.  Even if you can't personally use our product, you are telling everyone that women are worth supporting.

BUY our product. When you pre-order our product, it gives us a sense of scale so we can properly order and not run out when you need our support most.

SHARE our campaign. Please use your social media posts, good friends and great contacts to share our mission.  When you share our stuff, you help us change the world for women. 

While Bra-Less Bra was designed for women who are DD-N cups, our sizing goes all the way down to a B-cup. You’ll notice a shift in some of our branded materials as we have responded to those smaller-busted women who wanted more clarity in our packaging. Rest assured, we are the only product coming to market that can boast a size-span from B to N cup. And we are currently testing to see if we can go even larger. Woooo hoooo!

 

Bra-Less Bra has smart, innovative technology that begs the question, Why didn’t I think of that?  Its invisible features provide 100% customization for women from B-N cups.  It provides superior lift, separation and support.  It’s specially engineered for larger-busted women by providing superior strength for more voluminous flesh, while being fully customizable to fit any breast size fighting gravity.  

Looks can be deceiving.  Bra-Less Bra looks like just tape, but this is not just tape.

Our ingenious design allows women to re-sculpt their cleavage line so they can have that smooth appearance of separation in the middle of their chest while suspending voluminous breast tissue on a near-invisible ‘shelf’. Once you get the knack of it, it takes between 15 to 30 seconds per breast to apply. The results… well, you can see them on our beautiful buxom goddesses and know, these can be your results, as well.

Mariam Frei  @itsmariamfrei is an L.A. based blogger, lifestyles thought-leader and champion of women. When she learned about Bra-Less Bra she knew it was something special and important to women and so she immediately signed on as our newest goddess. Mariam is an E-cup and achieved a total of 5 inches of lift per breast with Bra-Less Bra.

 

Whether your skin tone is the color of caramel candy, or alabaster or coal—if you are pretty paper bag brown, peach or olive—with Bra-Less Bra there is no need to figure it out.  We believe in one race—the human race.  And we believe in only one skin color and that’s sheer.

We know that women want to look great in a variety of clothing and when you lift your boobs you lift your spirits.  With Bra-Less Bra you can look and feel beautiful inside and out.   

Don't wait for a dress-up occasion.  Whether you're meeting friends for lunch, going on a first date, wearing a slightly risque blouse under your suit for an important meeting or dancing the night away on the town, wear Bra-Less Bra for extra support beneath your bra or dare to go bare with invisible support all the way to an N-cup.

Except for the use of Bra-Less Bra, all models are bra-less in these photos.  Results may vary.

I remember the first time someone made me feel badly about my body.  I was swinging on the monkey bars at my elementary school.  I was twelve years old.  A little boy poked me in the chest through my sweatshirt and teased me because I had breasts and the other little girls didn’t.  I was humiliated.

It started my self-esteem roller coaster ride.

I started taping my breasts in college.  Scotch tape.  Masking tape.  Duct tape.  Athletic tape.  Surgical tape.  I didn’t care that it was ripping the skin off my body, as long as I looked great in my clothing.  As long as I could wear what the other girls were wearing and fit in, I was fine with it.  That is, until during a routine physical when I was asked if I was in an abusive relationship.  My physician thought I was being battered because of all of the scars, bruises and scrapes around my breasts.

At that moment, I came to the realization that I was abusing myself to look good in clothing.  At that very moment, I vowed that I never wanted another girl or teen or woman to feel like I did—a wild emotional and physical swing from covering and concealing to bruising and abusing for the sake of fitting into the fashion world.

If you’ve ever felt like your bra dictates your fashion choices, I get it and I’m saying enough is enough.  I know your plight.

For years the size of my bust-line was a constant source of shame and misery that plunged me into bouts of low body image. I hated my breasts and my body.

I got tired of my bra straps digging into my shoulders. I hated my bra telling me what I could and could not wear. I was sad about not being able to go bra-less in low-cut, backless, strapless garments and bathing suits. And if you have experienced this, I know you're sick of it, too. That’s why I invented Bra-Less Bra.

Bra-Less Bra is a specially designed bust-tape for girls with big girls. Bra-Less Bra is  sweat-proof and water resistant. It’s completely customizable and it works for women with big, beautiful, bodacious boobs. Wear it underneath an existing bra for an extra boost, or dare to go completely bra-less in most garments with superior and reliable lift, separation and support.

Bra-Less Bra will not only raise your breasts but your self-esteem, too.

Bra-Less Bra is powered-up by Zuke-iT, a company completely women-owned and operated seeking solutions to literally support women. We don’t believe in figure flaws, we believe in figure aspects and we know the time is now to fire your bra as your fashion consultant.

Love yourself even more. Love your body even more. Love your look even more... with Bra-Less Bra, Instant Cleavage Sculpting Solution.

 

Lola brings nearly 30 years of experience in brand management, marketing and data management to Team Zuke-iT.  She is a 2011 SBA business consultant of the year.  Lola is also the mother of two and a devotee of yoga.

 

Elle is the alter-ego of our inventor/ Creator-Preneur who is wildly and outrageously right-brain.  As a professional in the communications sector, she lives part of her life as a wife and step-mother who believes in social justice and the other part of her life writing, raising orchids and inventing products that make our lives better and more interesting.  Because of her current contractual obligations, she cannot go public at this time.

 

Michele holds degrees in business, finance, accounting and law with a specialty in business law and business efficiency.  She's a numbers girl who chews on financials for breakfast.  She wears dual hats as official numbers cruncher and general counsel for Zuke-iT.

 

Patty’s expertise spans from sales, to marketing to franchising.  Patty is a top seller for a well-known independent fashion line, with millions of dollars in sales beneath her belt, she juggles motherhood of four children, including twins.

 

Carolyn is the co-founder, co-manager and general partner of Belle Capital Management.   She is also the President and CEO of Michigan Women Forward.  She believes in women and women owned-businesses and she spends her time, expertise and wisdom helping women shine.

 

Dr. Bobbi is the team-dermatologist and consultant for Zuke-iT.  Dr. Bobbi is a well-known dermatologist in the Detroit suburb of Southfield.  She has a private practice and also holds licenses to practice in Maryland, Illinois, Washington, D.C.


 

You don’t have to be Einstein to know that larger-busted women spend a great deal of energy trying to figure out how to manage their cleavage with today’s ever-shrinking fashions. We’re talking about two units of mass that need magical support at the speed of light.

Our game-changing design pairs gravity-fighting strength with common-sense customization with engineering ingenuity to provide a tape that’s not just a tape. And when you use this patent-pending product, it assists in changing your appearance in 4 specific ways. Oh, and that’s not including the lift in self-esteem. That comes from within.

You don’t have to have an apple fall on your head to know that whomever successfully fights gravity—wins.

 

 See how our product improves your posture…

 

Hear how Steffie says Bra-Less Bra improved her posture...

See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channel 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ

 

 

Bra-Less Bra can be used with every body type. Even smaller busted women fighting gravity or wanting a rounder, fuller breast shape will benefit from the use of Bra-Less Bra. However, Bra-Less Bra is specially designed with the larger busted woman in mind. That’s because the breast-tape industry largely ignores women who are larger than a G cup. And there are a lot of us.

Bra-Less Bra is the product. Zuke-iT is the company which is a 100% women-owned, women-operated enterprise headquartered in Detroit, Michigan. So far, in the last three years, we have raised and operated on approximately $200,000. We need a minimum of $51,500 towards a down payment on our first production run. That’s where you come in. Every dollar we raise from everybody’s body goes into product production.

We encourage Every Body to join us. Men, women, tall, short, big-busted, small-busted. This is a product that literally supports the idea that every woman is a goddess.

 

We have chosen women from all walks of life to represent our brand, because our brand represents all types of women. From a PhD to housewives, to a product specialist, a chemical engineer analyst and entrepreneurs. Our goddess' bust-lines range from barely boobs to really big boobs. Our product can give everyone a lift who is fighting gravity. We have pageant-girls and girls who never thought they’d hear the word goddess. All are women who have struggled with their breast size and fashion. All are goddesses to us and are helping us redefine real beauty.

All photos are unretouched. Results may vary.

 

Vanessa's 'big lift' brings out her outer Goddess...

See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ

 

Bra-Less Bra breast-tape is manufactured in the U.S.A. All materials for our tape are sourced, secured and manufactured on our home soil. Our product is produced in a clean-room in the Heartland of America.

Yes, it would be cheaper to manufacture in other countries, but we wanted to be able to keep a close eye on our processes and make sure that all the way down the line, workers are being treated fairly, honestly and ethically.  We also love supporting other U.S. businesses, especially small businesses.

We have been testing our product for nearly three years under the watchful eye of our Team-Dermatologist, Dr. Bobbi Edwards of Southfield, Michigan. We wouldn’t be able to do that, if we were manufactured offshore. We have faith in our product because of personal relationships with the people who are assisting us as we build our brand.
 

 See how Bra-Less Bra changed Kelly’s opinion of herself… 

See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ
 
 

We are a 100% women-owned, women-run company. The leadership—from the inventor to our mentor is comprised of smart, courageous, professional women. 

The four charter members of Team Zuke-iT have an ownership stake in the company. All have donated time, monies, resources and talent for more than three years without salaries drawn from the company. Our first reward is getting this product to market and seeing the response from women who will feel our support all over the country and all over the world.

 

Raechel explains how Bra-Less Bra works for all sizes fighting gravity…

See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ
 
 

By making your pre-order or supporting our  campaign you are green-lighting our manufacturing. Our total manufacturing cost for the first run is $350,000. Your pre-order will go towards our first down-payment. We have a pretty healthy line-of-credit from a major funding source. What we don’t raise here, we can cover in other ways. 

Your support helps us with funds to handle our lead-time to get Bra-Less Bra manufactured and shipped with an expected delivery of late spring/early summer. 

We appreciate everybody and Every Body supporting us, as we work to support every body type.

Every woman can benefit from a little lift, some more than others. Industry statistics indicate that 75% of the bra-buying population is a D-cup or larger, yet the fashion industry largely ignores women with bigger cups sizes. While larger busted women are sent to ‘specialty’ boutiques to get bras that actually fit them, the statistics show that larger-busted women are the norm, not the exception. Yet, larger busted women are penalized in a variety of ways. Moreover, we have fewer choices, and those choices, generally cost more money.

Many products on the market claim to fit up to a G-cup. At Bra-Less bra, we start our product strength matrix at DD-cup. That means, not only is it designed to hold up voluminous flesh, but it’s also engineered to be as gentle as possible on the skin. Our patent pending, specially designed breast-tape has been successfully tested on women as large as an N-cup. 

That means women, who could never before even consider going completely bra-less in most garments, can now expand their wardrobe choices to match their sexy, sensual fashion sense.

Bra-Less bra can be worn beneath most garments to provide, lift, separation and support. Or, if you wish, wear Bra-Less Bra beneath an existing bra for extra support and definition. By wearing Bra-Less Bra beneath an existing bra, those menacing bra-straps that dig into your shoulders will melt away and give your shoulders and back a much-needed break.

 

We want to hear from you. We know it’s time for a change. We know it’s time to fire your bra as your fashion consultant. Join our movement for change as we literally support women of all shapes and sizes. Use the hashtags: #BraLessBra #Loveyourlook #FireYourBra and #TellUsYourStory on Instagram @BraLessBra.

 

 Help us build a community of support with your stories… 

Tell us your story and tag us on Instagram @BraLessBra
https://www.instagram.com/bralessbra/
 
 

Team Zuke-iT is proud to have the support and endorsement of the Michigan business community.  Their seal of approval means we are  serious about our work and that we will stand behind our product and our  processes.  It also means that you will get your order because we keep  our promises.  The endorsement of people serious about entrepreneurs  means that our business plan has been reviewed, our financial practices  have been scrutinized and our manufacturing processes have been vetted.   All this means you are good to go when you pledge your support to us.

 

 

MICHIGAN WOMEN FORWARD https://miwf.org/ 

 "As an investor, mentor and lender to women owned businesses, I see hundreds of startups every year.   This company and this team was different from the beginning and I wanted to sign on immediately as their business mentor.  The members of this team have impeccable character, an exceptional work-ethic, are all very coachable, and have demonstrated the proven ability to take an idea from the drawing board to the production-line.  I have personally invested in this company and stand behind this team with the full endorsement of Michigan Women Forward.   Please join us!"

- Carolyn Cassin/ CEO, Michigan Women Forward

 

DETROIT DEVELOPMENT FUND https://www.detroitdevelopmentfund.com/

"At Detroit Development Fund, we are well aware that it is more difficult for women entrepreneurs to obtain funding and we are pleased that 54% of our loan fund companies are women owned businesses. After we met this team, we knew we wanted to support the efforts of this company. They were well prepared, had done their homework, with a management team totally committed and strong enough to handle the challenges of a new business.  At DDF we are proud to partner with Team Zuke-iT in the exciting new venture."

- Ray Waters/President, Detroit Development Fund

 

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel, enjoy and share.

 

  • Because of current professional contractual obligations, Elle is not able to go public, at this time.

  • Goddess Treatment Package travel arrangements includes (1) coach ticket or equivalent on the carrier of our choice. Room for 1 at a Downtown Detroit Hotel of our choosing. (2) meal vouchers to any Detroit Metro-Airport participating restaurant. Night on the town with Team-Zuke-iT includes dinner and personal tour of Detroit. One exclusive, limited edition Joseph Lease poster, suitable for framing. Trip will originate late summer of 2020 with a TBA at a mutually agreeable time. For international travelers, travel for this reward must originate from anywhere within the U.S.A. Travel will be initiated on a Friday afternoon and return flights initiated the following Sunday afternoon.

  • Bra-Less Bra, Instant Cleavage Sculpting Solution works with most garments but the results vary depending on bust-size. Bra-Less Bra does not always work well beneath light-weight silks, satins and knits depending on your bust size.
  • Bra-Less Bra is patent-pending. Our logos are registered trademarks. Please do not reproduce our intellectual property.
  • Customer assumes the costs of shipping, handling, duties and customs.

support beneath your bra or dare to go bare with invisible support all the way to an N-cup.Except for the use of Bra-Less Bra, all models are bra-less in these photos.  Results may vary.I remember the first time someone made me feel badly about my body.  I was swinging on the monkey bars at my elementary school.  I was twelve years old.  A little boy poked me in the chest through my sweatshirt and teased me because I had breasts and the other little girls didn’t.  I was humiliated.It started my self-esteem roller coaster ride.I started taping my breasts in college.  Scotch tape.  Masking tape.  Duct tape.  Athletic tape.  Surgical tape.  I didn’t care that it was ripping the skin off my body, as long as I looked great in my clothing.  As long as I could wear what the other girls were wearing and fit in, I was fine with it.  That is, until during a routine physical when I was asked if I was in an abusive relationship.  My physician thought I was being battered because of all of the scars, bruises and scrapes around my breasts.At that moment, I came to the realization that I was abusing myself to look good in clothing.  At that very moment, I vowed that I never wanted another girl or teen or woman to feel like I did—a wild emotional and physical swing from covering and concealing to bruising and abusing for the sake of fitting into the fashion world.If you’ve ever felt like your bra dictates your fashion choices, I get it and I’m saying enough is enough.  I know your plight.For years the size of my bust-line was a constant source of shame and misery that plunged me into bouts of low body image. I hated my breasts and my body.I got tired of my bra straps digging into my shoulders. I hated my bra telling me what I could and could not wear. I was sad about not being able to go bra-less in low-cut, backless, strapless garments and bathing suits. And if you have experienced this, I know you're sick of it, too. That’s why I invented Bra-Less Bra.Bra-Less Bra is a specially designed bust-tape for girls with big girls. Bra-Less Bra is  sweat-proof and water resistant. It’s completely customizable and it works for women with big, beautiful, bodacious boobs. Wear it underneath an existing bra for an extra boost, or dare to go completely bra-less in most garments with superior and reliable lift, separation and support.Bra-Less Bra will not only raise your breasts but your self-esteem, too.Bra-Less Bra is powered-up by Zuke-iT, a company completely women-owned and operated seeking solutions to literally support women. We don’t believe in figure flaws, we believe in figure aspects and we know the time is now to fire your bra as your fashion consultant.Love yourself even more. Love your body even more. Love your look even more... with Bra-Less Bra, Instant Cleavage Sculpting Solution. Lola brings nearly 30 years of experience in brand management, marketing and data management to Team Zuke-iT.  She is a 2011 SBA business consultant of the year.  Lola is also the mother of two and a devotee of yoga. Elle is the alter-ego of our inventor/ Creator-Preneur who is wildly and outrageously right-brain.  As a professional in the communications sector, she lives part of her life as a wife and step-mother who believes in social justice and the other part of her life writing, raising orchids and inventing products that make our lives better and more interesting.  Because of her current contractual obligations, she cannot go public at this time. Michele holds degrees in business, finance, accounting and law with a specialty in business law and business efficiency.  She's a numbers girl who chews on financials for breakfast.  She wears dual hats as official numbers cruncher and general counsel for Zuke-iT. Patty’s expertise spans from sales, to marketing to franchising.  Patty is a top seller for a well-known independent fashion line, with millions of dollars in sales beneath her belt, she juggles motherhood of four children, including twins. Carolyn is the co-founder, co-manager and general partner of Belle Capital Management.   She is also the President and CEO of Michigan Women Forward.  She believes in women and women owned-businesses and she spends her time, expertise and wisdom helping women shine. Dr. Bobbi is the team-dermatologist and consultant for Zuke-iT.  Dr. Bobbi is a well-known dermatologist in the Detroit suburb of Southfield.  She has a private practice and also holds licenses to practice in Maryland, Illinois, Washington, D.C. You don’t have to be Einstein to know that larger-busted women spend a great deal of energy trying to figure out how to manage their cleavage with today’s ever-shrinking fashions. We’re talking about two units of mass that need magical support at the speed of light.Our game-changing design pairs gravity-fighting strength with common-sense customization with engineering ingenuity to provide a tape that’s not just a tape. And when you use this patent-pending product, it assists in changing your appearance in 4 specific ways. Oh, and that’s not including the lift in self-esteem. That comes from within.You don’t have to have an apple fall on your head to know that whomever successfully fights gravity—wins.  See how our product improves your posture…

 
Hear how Steffie says Bra-Less Bra improved her posture...


See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channel 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ
 
 Bra-Less Bra can be used with every body type. Even smaller busted women fighting gravity or wanting a rounder, fuller breast shape will benefit from the use of Bra-Less Bra. However, Bra-Less Bra is specially designed with the larger busted woman in mind. That’s because the breast-tape industry largely ignores women who are larger than a G cup. And there are a lot of us.Bra-Less Bra is the product. Zuke-iT is the company which is a 100% women-owned, women-operated enterprise headquartered in Detroit, Michigan. So far, in the last three years, we have raised and operated on approximately $200,000. We need a minimum of $51,500 towards a down payment on our first production run. That’s where you come in. Every dollar we raise from everybody’s body goes into product production.We encourage Every Body to join us. Men, women, tall, short, big-busted, small-busted. This is a product that literally supports the idea that every woman is a goddess. We have chosen women from all walks of life to represent our brand, because our brand represents all types of women. From a PhD to housewives, to a product specialist, a chemical engineer analyst and entrepreneurs. Our goddess' bust-lines range from barely boobs to really big boobs. Our product can give everyone a lift who is fighting gravity. We have pageant-girls and girls who never thought they’d hear the word goddess. All are women who have struggled with their breast size and fashion. All are goddesses to us and are helping us redefine real beauty.All photos are unretouched. Results may vary. Vanessa's 'big lift' brings out her outer Goddess...See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channelhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ Bra-Less Bra breast-tape is manufactured in the U.S.A. All materials for our tape are sourced, secured and manufactured on our home soil. Our product is produced in a clean-room in the Heartland of America.Yes, it would be cheaper to manufacture in other countries, but we wanted to be able to keep a close eye on our processes and make sure that all the way down the line, workers are being treated fairly, honestly and ethically.  We also love supporting other U.S. businesses, especially small businesses.We have been testing our product for nearly three years under the watchful eye of our Team-Dermatologist, Dr. Bobbi Edwards of Southfield, Michigan. We wouldn’t be able to do that, if we were manufactured offshore. We have faith in our product because of personal relationships with the people who are assisting us as we build our brand.  See how Bra-Less Bra changed Kelly’s opinion of herself… See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channelhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ  We are a 100% women-owned, women-run company. The leadership—from the inventor to our mentor is comprised of smart, courageous, professional women. The four charter members of Team Zuke-iT have an ownership stake in the company. All have donated time, monies, resources and talent for more than three years without salaries drawn from the company. Our first reward is getting this product to market and seeing the response from women who will feel our support all over the country and all over the world. Raechel explains how Bra-Less Bra works for all sizes fighting gravity…See other amazing stories of transformation on our YouTube channelhttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg0YQopCzzPWF0yjNMz0axQ  By making your pre-order or supporting our  campaign you are green-lighting our manufacturing. Our total manufacturing cost for the first run is $350,000. Your pre-order will go towards our first down-payment. We have a pretty healthy line-of-credit from a major funding source. What we don’t raise here, we can cover in other ways. Your support helps us with funds to handle our lead-time to get Bra-Less Bra manufactured and shipped with an expected delivery of late spring/early summer. We appreciate everybody and Every Body supporting us, as we work to support every body type.Every woman can benefit from a little lift, some more than others. Industry statistics indicate that 75% of the bra-buying population is a D-cup or larger, yet the fashion industry largely ignores women with bigger cups sizes. While larger busted women are sent to ‘specialty’ boutiques to get bras that actually fit them, the statistics show that larger-busted women are the norm, not the exception. Yet, larger busted women are penalized in a variety of ways. Moreover, we have fewer choices, and those choices, generally cost more money.Many products on the market claim to fit up to a G-cup. At Bra-Less bra, we start our product strength matrix at DD-cup. That means, not only is it designed to hold up voluminous flesh, but it’s also engineered to be as gentle as possible on the skin. Our patent pending, specially designed breast-tape has been successfully tested on women as large as an N-cup. That means women, who could never before even consider going completely bra-less in most garments, can now expand their wardrobe choices to match their sexy, sensual fashion sense.Bra-Less bra can be worn beneath most garments to provide, lift, separation and support. Or, if you wish, wear Bra-Less Bra beneath an existing bra for extra support and definition. By wearing Bra-Less Bra beneath an existing bra, those menacing bra-straps that dig into your shoulders will melt away and give your shoulders and back a much-needed break. We want to hear from you. We know it’s time for a change. We know it’s time to fire your bra as your fashion consultant. Join our movement for change as we literally support women of all shapes and sizes. Use the hashtags: #BraLessBra #Loveyourlook #FireYourBra and #TellUsYourStory on Instagram @BraLessBra.  Help us build a community of support with your stories… 

Tell us your story and tag us on Instagram @BraLessBrahttps://www.instagram.com/bralessbra/  Team Zuke-iT is proud to have the support and endorsement of the Michigan business community.  Their seal of approval means we are  serious about our work and that we will stand behind our product and our  processes.  It also means that you will get your order because we keep  our promises.  The endorsement of people serious about entrepreneurs  means that our business plan has been reviewed, our financial practices  have been scrutinized and our manufacturing processes have been vetted.   All this means you are good to go when you pledge your support to us.  MICHIGAN WOMEN FORWARD https://miwf.org/  "As an investor, mentor and lender to women owned businesses, I see hundreds of startups every year.   This company and this team was different from the beginning and I wanted to sign on immediately as their business mentor.  The members of this team have impeccable character, an exceptional work-ethic, are all very coachable, and have demonstrated the proven ability to take an idea from the drawing board to the production-line.  I have personally invested in this company and stand behind this team with the full endorsement of Michigan Women Forward.   Please join us!"- Carolyn Cassin/ CEO, Michigan Women Forward DETROIT DEVELOPMENT FUND https://www.detroitdevelopmentfund.com/"At Detroit Development Fund, we are well aware that it is more difficult for women entrepreneurs to obtain funding and we are pleased that 54% of our loan fund companies are women owned businesses. After we met this team, we knew we wanted to support the efforts of this company. They were well prepared, had done their homework, with a management team totally committed and strong enough to handle the challenges of a new business.  At DDF we are proud to partner with Team Zuke-iT in the exciting new venture."- Ray Waters/President, Detroit Development Fund Subscribe to our YouTube Channel, enjoy and share. 
Because of current professional contractual obligations, Elle is not able to go public, at this time.
Goddess Treatment Package travel arrangements includes (1) coach ticket or equivalent on the carrier of our choice. Room for 1 at a Downtown Detroit Hotel of our choosing. (2) meal vouchers to any Detroit Metro-Airport participating restaurant. Night on the town with Team-Zuke-iT includes dinner and personal tour of Detroit. One exclusive, limited edition Joseph Lease poster, suitable for framing. Trip will originate late summer of 2020 with a TBA at a mutually agreeable time. For international travelers, travel for this reward must originate from anywhere within the U.S.A. Travel will be initiated on a Friday afternoon and return flights initiated the following Sunday afternoon.
Bra-Less Bra, Instant Cleavage Sculpting Solution works with most garments but the results vary depending on bust-size. Bra-Less Bra does not always work well beneath light-weight silks, satins and knits depending on your bust size.
Bra-Less Bra is patent-pending. Our logos are registered trademarks. Please do not reproduce our intellectual property.
Customer assumes the costs of shipping, handling, duties and customs.

story:
Could you imagine that preparing a simple slice of bread can provide an exceptional experience?

We have turned imagination into reality.

R&D has delivered the solution:

The Spread-IT Heated Butter Knife!


Inspiration came one morning when the food prepared wasn’t really appetizing.

I felt I had to make a change, and shared my idea with my engineer friend. He designed the technical solution to transform my dream into practical reality. 

Finally, Spread-IT was born.

Technical description

The blade is equipped with a unique heater, capable of supplying the necessary heat evenly throughout the surface of the blade.

Constant temperature is guaranteed by the thermal sensor built into the blade, for maximum protection against overheating.

Added safety is provided by the touch sensor, making a switch unnecessary, as it is turned on by the human touch.


Specifications

  1. Stainless alloy blade with heated element
  2. Temperature indicator light
  3. Circuit board, with capacitive touch sensor
  4. 1020mah 3.7v lithium ion battery
  5. Brushed stainless steel casing
  6. Micro USB B connector, with charge indicator light

Charging is done through a micro-USB port with a waterproof plug – Spread-IT is fully waterproof and safe.


What's in the package?

  • Spread-IT - the heated butter knife
  • Instruction manual

  • 110-220V 0,8-1A Micro USB B charger

About our team

Three of us started this project, which allowed our product to be the result of solely in-house planning, development, and design work.

Following 20 months of research and development the technology has been perfected and by now the flawlessly functioning prototype is ready.

At last, we can present you this advanced, unique, and stylish kitchen utensil.


Thank you for helping us in our project! Share, and Spread the love.

story:
Anima- Walk your Souls

Hi! My name is Marcela and this business began out of an opportunity I saw while I went to my yôga classes. For me, there seemed to be no right shoe to go to my practice, wait... let me explain: not actually wearing them while doing yôga, but to go to, and run errands afterward, which at the same time could be chic and comfortable. This is when Anima was born, after two years of working  over the idea, I decided to test it. I noticed not only were they useful for going to my practice but also they were very comfortable and could easily combine with any outfit.The rest is history in the making. 

  • Don't miss seeing the full collection in the Gallery section! 

The Walk your Souls CAMPAIGN

In order to make this opportunity accessible to everyone around the world, I need the support from all of you. The money invested in this campaign will help me achieve my dream: spread the walk your souls around the world.

What We Need & What You Get
The money raised ($7,500) in this campaign will go directly to: 
  • Improve the quality of the product
  • Launch our online website
  • Create a fund for our own workshop
  • Take orders around the world and ship them to your door.
In case we don't reach our entire goal, we want to satisfy our client by improving the quality of our product and shipping your shoes directly to your home. 

The Impact
For the moment, we are relying on a shoe artisan for the production of the shoes, and the capacity and quality of materials are not as high as we expect them to be. Therefore with the money raised, we will outsource our production with a qualified shoe workshop to deliver the expected product. After a solid capitalization, we expect to start our own team of artisans focused in providing jobs to women in a Guatemalan community. 
Risks & Challenges
Because we are working to make this product unique and special for you, we might take a little bit more time than expected to deliver the product.
Although, my main focus is to deliver these orders first, and focus on placing other orders afterward. 

Other Ways You Can Help
  • Feel free to share this campaign with anyone of your friends who you think will love the shoes and the idea. 
  • Write to marcela@walkyoursouls.com for any other questions on the matter.

story:
As you may know, I’m an aspiring jeweler. I also recently dove into stained glass and plan to incorporate that medium into my budding business, Gemheart Jewelry + Glass. My dream is to be creating handmade jewelry + more out of my home studio as a full time gig!  

My 2018 Resolution Word is “Dare”, so I’m challenging myself to pursue this dream through all possible avenues. My immediate priority is to build up my home studio and devote as much free time as possible at my bench.  By the end of the year, I want to reopen my Etsy store and set up shop at 3 art fairs in the DFW area. This means that I will need my studio completely revamped by August, which will give me enough time to get to work for all the fall fairs. 

Two years ago when I started making jewelry as a hobby, I had no idea I was working with so little! After training over a year now as a jewelers apprentice, I’m so much more knowledgeable and so much more CONFIDENT in my abilities. I’m not typically an impatient person so I like to think of this new found impatience as determination! I'm also not typically one to go out on a limb or put myself out there, so deciding to hold a fundraising campaign has been a pretty nerve wracking journey.  If there is one thing I knows, it's that it takes a lot of self discovery and overcoming insecurities to chase your dreams! So here we are.

If you decide to contribute, there are a few perk options available, listed to the right! Since the studio is obviously under construction, physical rewards are not available at the present moment. However, the Etsy shop will be Reopened and Restocked in August, at which point your coupon codes will be made available for redemption! They are good through December, so you can even use them for Christmas gifts :)

Please note -  *Free shipping will especially pay off on stained glass items, as they are larger and need extra care due to their fragility*

Thank you for reading and for all of your support, whether it is monetary support or not!

The comprehensive list of all the things I need is as follows:

  • Flex shaft + attachments 
  • A large, reusable Oxygen tank (as opposed to several disposable ones) and the first fill up
  • Regulators for the gas and oxygen tanks 
  • New hand tools + files
  • Glass Polishing compounds
  • Glass Cleaning solutions
  • Glass organizer

Any donations over the campaign amount will go towards event fees + building up my stock of metal, stones and glass!

story:
We've started shipping sneakers to over half of our backers already! 

If you haven't selected your sneakers, please use the link below to order:
https://sunnysachdev.typeform.com/to/iTRBht


The creativity of the world - on your feet.

Discover sneakers you love, and bring your creative concepts to life with KRAFTKA, the world’s first “crowd-kreated” sneaker brand. We are a new kind of community where you can create your own sneaker designs or choose from the works of artists from around the world.

With KRAFTKA you can even turn your creativity into cash by selling your designs to others in the community.

We are at the forefront of a fashion revolution and it all begins with your feet.

We built KRAFTKA to empower you to set your own trends and push the boundaries of a traditional sneaker brand. It's a global platform that connects people through sneakers, sharing ideas and inspiration.

Our production process is all about 0 waste and 0 footprint. Each pair is produced only when sold and made with environmental friendly inks and processes. Being a brand made by a global community, we put all of our efforts into ensuring that every part of our production is environmentally friendly and sustainable.



Here's a glimpse of some of the sneakers that are already in the Kraftka store, each designed by different people from around the world! 

 

To be a part of it, all you have to do is create a profile page.

Here’s mine:

When your profile page is set up you’ll be able to share your designs in Shoe Racks, and place the sneakers that you love in Wish Racks. 

On our shop page, you can view the community-kreated sneakers. They are displayed alongside their creator's usernames so you can easily recognise and follow your favourite artists.

If you wish to design your own, you’ll start out with blank canvas sneakers. For now we are launching "The Sputnik", and there are plenty more models in the works. Each season, you will be able to determine which items are added to the ever-expanding KRAFTKA Collection.


There are no limits to what you can put on your shoes: photos, illustrations, poems- ANYTHING! Your design and revision options are limitless, and you can post or remove your shoes whenever you like.

Use your drawings or illustrations...this example is by Archan Nair.

Or use your photos...

Or just text!

Your sneakers are published right away. You own your designs, and earn USD 10 per pair sold!


In the beginning, you can publish two pairs of sneakers to your Shoe Rack (buy our UPGRADE perk to publish FOUR). By selling sneakers and interacting with other users, you unlock new features and capabilities. Eventually, earning the privilege to publish as many shoes as you like and to set your own price.

The more active you are, the more your profile will grow organically with your community. Level up to enjoy your very own store! YourName.kraftka.com.

To be truly for the people, by the people, trust is very important. This is why we've created a robust, real time money management system to keep track of your sales. Here, you can see features such as the location of your buyers and your total sales.




THE DESIGNS ARE PRINTED IN SUPER HIGH DEFINITION showcasing the designer's work in all it's glory!


FEATURES OF THE PLATFORM
• Online Sneaker Kreation Tool
• Real-time Sales Tracking through KOLLECT tool
• Individual Profiles and Individual Shoe Racks
• Live notifications
• Seasonal Retail Collections Determined by Top Sellers

THE SPUTNIK
• Durable, super detailed prints that are machine washable
• Premium canvas material and rubber sole
• PU Toe Cap and Heel
• Soft sponge ankle lining
• Red "Kraftka" Inner lining
• Sizes Produced:


Choose from these awesome perks to join us today.

Pre-order your sneakers now, select your designs later. Take advantage of these special deals where you can get sneakers up to 20% off RRP!




 

There are more perks for you to discover. Please have a look at the perks list. 

Our online platform is nearing completion and our final sneaker prototype is waiting production. We've been funding our KRAFTKA dream with our personal savings, and with the help of family and friends. Now, we need your support and the support of the global community. 

Our budget of $15,000 will be used to fund the minimum order amount to manufacture our first collection of Sputnik sneakers.

Please support us by pre-ordering your sneakers. We invite you to be a part of this global movement that will change the face of fashion forever!



• Join the public beta and start creating sneakers now!

• Follow us on Facebook and Twitter

• Tell all of your friends who’d like to get their own pair of one-of-a-kind sneakers.

We are currently in the alpha phase of the Kraftka platform, with the Beta phase planned for launch in March 2016. The platform is being refined every day with our experienced development team. Our biggest risk factor would be delays from the manufacturing side of the equation. This is however, minimised, as we have gone through over 7 months of retooling and sampling with our factory.

**************************************************************************
**************************************************************************Here's how people have already been kreating with the KRAFTKA platform

.



Q. What is Kraftka?

Kraftka is a sneaker brand that is not from one person’s vision, but from the collective vision of the world.

Kraftka is a revolutionary sneaker platform and fashion social media.

A sneakers brand made by everyone.

Aren’t you getting tired of wearing the same sneakers everyone else wears? Do you have ideas of your own that you would like to see on a pair for yourself or your friends? 

Discover sneakers you love, and bring your creative concepts to life with KRAFTKA, the world’s first crowd-sourced fashion brand. We are a new kind of community where you can create your own sneaker designs or choose from the works of artists from around the world. 

With KRAFTKA you can even turn your creativity into cash by selling your designs to others in the community. 

We are at the forefront of a fashion revolution and it all begins with your feet. 

Be a designer. Be a trendsetter. The future of fashion is in your hands.

Q. Where are Kraftka sneakers made?

A. Our first release is “The Sputnik”. This sneaker base is made in China, customized in Thailand, and designed by creative people all around the world. 

Q. What sizes of Kraftka sneakers are there?

A. Sizes EUR 36-46. 

Q. Who can create their own Kraftka sneakers?

A. Everyone can! Even you! Simple go to our KREATE page.

Q. What are the features of the KRAFTKA platform?

A. On Kraftka, you can Kreate your own sneakers, discover sneakers by artists all around the world, follow other people’s profiles and track your sales in real time.

Q Do you ship KRAFTKA sneakers to my country?

Yes, we can reach you almost anywhere on the planet. If you can receive mail, then you can receive KRAFTKA sneakers!

Q. How do I create Kraftka sneakers?

A. Use any photo, drawing, illustration or text! Your creativity is the limit! For best results, your images should be 1700 x 1200 pixels, with an image size limit of 4-megabytes. Any white-coloured areas will use the shoe canvas's natural colour rather than white ink.

Q. How much does one pair of Kraftka sneakers cost?

A. Our first release – The Sputnik - is $89. 

Q. How many sneakers can I create?

A. As a new user, you can create 2 sneakers. To make more, you have to gain higher ranks.

Q. How do I gain higher ranks?

A. You can gain higher ranks by interacting with your fellow artists, gain more followers and sell more sneakers. The higher you rank, the more sneakers you can publish. 

When you reach higher and higher, you can increase your price and have your own personal domain name: yourname.kraftka.com.

Track your rank and progress on your profile page, with the icon under your profile picture.

More details soon.

Q. Are you able to reproduce highly detailed colors and gradients?

A. We can definitely produce highly detailed colors and gradients. Our printing technology is state-of-the-art.

Q. How much money can I get from creating my own sneakers? 

A. You can earn $10 PER PAIR sold. You can send to your bank account or use to buy more KRAFTKA sneakers of your own. The choice is yours. (You have to pay Paypal transfer fees when we send you the money).

Q. How do I know how many sneakers I have sold? 

A. Simply check the KOLLECT page. You can view your sales in REAL TIME and see which countries your customers are from.

Q. Who owns the sneaker design I created?

A. You own 100% of the rights to your design. You maintain ownership of any images that you have produced and uploaded.

Q. Are there any restrictions to the sneakers I can create?

A. If you own the images you uploaded, then there are no problems. Please avoid uploading copyright or offensive images.

Q. How long does it take for my design to appear in the store?

A. Your design appears instantly. You can edit or remove it anytime. The full control is in your hands. 

Q. Can I remove my designs from the SHOP at anytime?

A. Yes, you can add or delete your sneakers whenever you like. Your digital shelf is your own.

Q. How do I get paid?

A. You get paid once a month through PAYPAL.

Q. I am a re-seller/agency, and am interested in buying KRAFTKA shoes wholesale. Can I sell them on my own website?

A. Yes, you can. Contact us at sunny@kraftka.com for pricing options. We are happy to connect you with your KRAFTKA artists for a wholesale purchase.

Q. Can I order my designs on other types of apparel?

A. Not at the moment, but we have plans for additional models of KRAFTKA sneakers, and hope to expand beyond footwear to offer user-designed, custom-made clothing and accessories.



Legal Disclaimer:
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
story_txt:
We've started shipping sneakers to over half of our backers already! 
If you haven't selected your sneakers, please use the link below to order:https://sunnysachdev.typeform.com/to/iTRBht

The creativity of the world - on your feet.Discover sneakers you love, and bring your creative concepts to life with KRAFTKA, the world’s first “crowd-kreated” sneaker brand. We are a new kind of community where you can create your own sneaker designs or choose from the works of artists from around the world.


With KRAFTKA you can even turn your creativity into cash by selling your designs to others in the community.
We are at the forefront of a fashion revolution and it all begins with your feet.
We built KRAFTKA to empower you to set your own trends and push the boundaries of a traditional sneaker brand. It's a global platform that connects people through sneakers, sharing ideas and inspiration.Our production process is all about 0 waste and 0 footprint. Each pair is produced only when sold and made with environmental friendly inks and processes. Being a brand made by a global community, we put all of our efforts into ensuring that every part of our production is environmentally friendly and sustainable.Here's a glimpse of some of the sneakers that are already in the Kraftka store, each designed by different people from around the world! 






















 

To be a part of it, all you have to do is create a profile page.
Here’s mine:


When your profile page is set up you’ll be able to share your designs in Shoe Racks, and place the sneakers that you love in Wish Racks. 
On our shop page, you can view the community-kreated sneakers. They are displayed alongside their creator's usernames so you can easily recognise and follow your favourite artists.

If you wish to design your own, you’ll start out with blank canvas sneakers. For now we are launching "The Sputnik", and there are plenty more models in the works. Each season, you will be able to determine which items are added to the ever-expanding KRAFTKA Collection.



There are no limits to what you can put on your shoes: photos, illustrations, poems- ANYTHING! Your design and revision options are limitless, and you can post or remove your shoes whenever you like.Use your drawings or illustrations...this example is by Archan Nair.
Or use your photos...
Or just text!
Your sneakers are published right away. You own your designs, and earn USD 10 per pair sold!

In the beginning, you can publish two pairs of sneakers to your Shoe Rack (buy our UPGRADE perk to publish FOUR). By selling sneakers and interacting with other users, you unlock new features and capabilities. Eventually, earning the privilege to publish as many shoes as you like and to set your own price.
The more active you are, the more your profile will grow organically with your community. Level up to enjoy your very own store! YourName.kraftka.com.
To be truly for the people, by the people, trust is very important. This is why we've created a robust, real time money management system to keep track of your sales. Here, you can see features such as the location of your buyers and your total sales.






THE DESIGNS ARE PRINTED IN SUPER HIGH DEFINITION showcasing the designer's work in all it's glory!






FEATURES OF THE PLATFORM• Online Sneaker Kreation Tool• Real-time Sales Tracking through KOLLECT tool• Individual Profiles and Individual Shoe Racks• Live notifications• Seasonal Retail Collections Determined by Top SellersTHE SPUTNIK• Durable, super detailed prints that are machine washable• Premium canvas material and rubber sole• PU Toe Cap and Heel• Soft sponge ankle lining• Red "Kraftka" Inner lining• Sizes Produced:





Choose from these awesome perks to join us today.
Pre-order your sneakers now, select your designs later. Take advantage of these special deals where you can get sneakers up to 20% off RRP!

 







There are more perks for you to discover. Please have a look at the perks list. 

Our online platform is nearing completion and our final sneaker prototype is waiting production. We've been funding our KRAFTKA dream with our personal savings, and with the help of family and friends. Now, we need your support and the support of the global community. Our budget of $15,000 will be used to fund the minimum order amount to manufacture our first collection of Sputnik sneakers.
Please support us by pre-ordering your sneakers. We invite you to be a part of this global movement that will change the face of fashion forever!









• Join the public beta and start creating sneakers now!
• Follow us on Facebook and Twitter
• Tell all of your friends who’d like to get their own pair of one-of-a-kind sneakers.

We are currently in the alpha phase of the Kraftka platform, with the Beta phase planned for launch in March 2016. The platform is being refined every day with our experienced development team. Our biggest risk factor would be delays from the manufacturing side of the equation. This is however, minimised, as we have gone through over 7 months of retooling and sampling with our factory.
****************************************************************************************************************************************************Here's how people have already been kreating with the KRAFTKA platform




.

story:
Who I am & Why I'm doing it

My name is Heather Hartz  and I have two great passions- traveling and sewing. With almost a decade of traveling under my belt and 15 years of sewing, I've taken what started as a personal necessity and I'm looking to bring it to you. After three years of designing and product testing I'm ready to embark on another great adventure: starting up a small business, focused on creating  and providing comfortable, cute and durable product. 

Traveling should always be an amazing adventure and my goal is to help contribute to that ideal.

My Product

I've spent the last three years designing my bags and dresses and testing them through rigorous and excessive travel. It started with a need for a backpack that accommodated my rather large sketchbooks, reading books, portable gaming systems, laptop- way more than I should be carrying. And because you can also carry on one personal item- the tote bag was born. Which became home for the items I quickly needed to grab to keep myself entertained in flight. The dresses I began designing after realizing that traveling in pajamas felt amazing, but kinda kept me from going out and exploring as soon as my feet hit the ground. If I landed in a brand new city, I wanted to go exploring, and consume as much coffee and food as I could before meandering to my home base. With all that said- 
I have wallets, a tote bag, backpacks and five dresses all designed, the patterns are made and everything is ready to be sewn! I just need some of the basics.
The Dresses:
The Adventure Dress

                       

TheTeatime Dress

                       

The Daydreamer Dress

                   


                                                      The Wayfarer Dress

                   

The Safari Dress

                     



The Bags:


The World Travels Wallet

Farmer Market Tote

                                                     

                                                      The Adventuring Backpack



The $2,700 Goal

If my goal is reached I'll have all my start up costs covered.

The Breakdown:

$1,000 for my minimum fabric order- In order to buy my fabric at whole sale cost I need to place an order at no less than $1,000. With that I would be able to make roughly 50 dresses, 20 backpacks, 20 tote bags and 50 wallets. More or less each way depending on what's in demand. That would be enough to cover everything listed in the perks and enough to get me started and get my business rolling.
$1,500 for a sewing machine- I love my sewing machine dearly, but it's not durable enough to doing the heavy duty work I need it to, or handle to volume of sewing I would be doing. Why so much for a machine? Sturdy and reliable machines are going to be in the mid price range of sewing machines. That amount would allow me to get a Bernina sewing machine. Beninas are reliable, durable and downright awesome. 
$200 for thread and sewing notions- All important things that make the sewing world go round! Thread for my sewing machine and serger are very necessary, and the cost does build up. Zippers are another critical item, along with snaps, hooks, rings, and more thread! Really, you can never have enough of any of these.

Beyond The $2,700 Goal

I will dance, and sing and sew until there is nothing left to sew! I would have more options for buying a wider range of fabrics and  more needed sewing notions. This would also allow me to expand my advertising options and even fund a subscription to a website such as big cartel or store envy.


What You can do

Every little bit helps! Monetarily or otherwise! Be it choosing one or more or the darn awesome perks to the right, or sharing this campaign on your social media page, or both!! Every little bit is appreciated beyond words! 


Thank you so much for your support! 
Adventure On!

story:
Use of Funds

Goal: $6,000

  • Prototype development
  • Design consultation
  • Manufacturing costs

    Risks & Challenges

    • Educating the customer on how to use the Soliza container
    • We may have to schedule more design consultations than we anticipate
    • We only have an estimated cost per unit for our product, since there is no other product like ours on the market

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Help us get the word out about our campaign! Here are some ideas on how you can do so:

    • Tell your friends and family to check us out!
    • Publish an article, blog, video, or another form of media to help us promote our campaign!

    We really appreciate all that our supporters do for us, and we are extremely grateful for every dollar that we receive. Thank you so much!

story:
you can still pre order a switcher at:

www.superswitcher2.com



SuperSwitcher 2 :

The SuperSwitcher 2 is a programmable switching system for guitar, bass and any applications that require smart loop routing.

The unit includes the most advanced features built for a switcher inside a compact design enclosure, allowing the player to have, for the first time ever, a smart programmable device that can be placed in almost any size pedalboard and include all the features players need: 

  • Audio loops
  • Relay switches (to control amp channels & reverb)
  • Midi In & Out to control presets and other midi applications
  • Switchable audio buffer
  • Basic Internal tuner (Tuner Out is also available)
  • The option to choose only the modules and features you need (custom)

For the first time ever, we managed to build a smart modular design, allowing the players to order exactly what they want and have their own custom switcher without paying $2000 for it.



The modular design is built from 2 types of modules - mandatory modules that come with any switcher, and optional modules. The default setup of modules we choose includes all the features that we feel are the best combination for most players - these are the specs for our standard SuperSwitcher 2:

  • 8 Audio loops for pedals (7 mono and 1 mono send/stereo return loop)

  • 2 relay switches -you can control amp channels, turn on the reverb in your amp and basically use anything that requires a latching switch with just one standard PL stereo cable.

  • Midi in & out - controls presets on your digital pedals and all other midi applications your setup has, Including an expression pedal jack!
  • Switchable audio buffer at the input of the switcher - keep the spark of your guitar signal that you lose with long cables with this high quality buffer.
  • FX Loop module - allows you to break the connection between loops in order to have "in from amp pedals" and "fx loop pedals" setup, When ordering you will have the option to choose where to "break" the connection for you - after 4 loops or after 6 loops. For example - loops 1-6 will include wah , filter and distortion pedals, which will be sent to the amp Input. From the amp's FX loop of your amp you will send the signal back to the FX loop module of the switcher in order to have delay & reverb pedals at loops 7-8.
  • Internal tuner - that's right! We have a basic guitar tuner built into the switcher! We also include a tuner out jack, if you want to use your own, more advanced tuner (signal is muted when using the tuner feature so no one in the crowd hears you tune).
  • Stereo outputs L&R
  • 99 Banks with 5 presets on each bank.
  • GND lift switch (in custom switchable outputs only)

    If you choose the custom module order you will have some options to choose and change from our default setup:

    • Remove the FX loop module in exchange for 2 additional relay switches
    • Remove the midi module in exchange for 2 additional relay switches (and keeping the FX loop module.
    • Exchange loops 7 and 8 for 2 stereo loops***
    • Exchange tuner out for A\B selectable inputs***
    • Exchange stereo outputs for A\B selectable outputs***

    ** see more info below

      *** those features will be available only if we reach a specific amount of funding - see IF WE REACH section

        The advanced MCU processor inside the switcher allows you to have 99 banks with 5 presets in each bank. Each preset can include any combination of turning on certain loops, switching amp channels and sending midi commands-all in one click!

        The switcher also has Manual Mode which allows you to turn on a couple of pedals inside any presets. For example, set switches 1-4 in bank A as presets, and switch 5 as a manual switch for loop 8 (let's say a delay pedal). Now you can kick the delay pedal in and out with switch 5 within any of the  1-4 presets!

        Another mode we have is the Silly Mode, which cancels all presets and makes the switcher act as a standard true bypass looper (switch 1 will turn loop 1 on, etc.).

        The MCU also allows wireless features, USB connectivity, iPhone control via Bluetooth and many more advanced features***
        *** These features will be available only if we reach a specific amount of funding - see IF WE REACH section.

        The SuperSwitcher 2 is built from the best parts and components we can find, including high quality, military-grade aluminum chassis and parts from Alpha switches, Neutrik jacks, Bourns, Omron Relays, Davies USA made knobs, Microchip MCUs and more! We as a company believe in making the best quality products without saving money on parts!





        What is the difference between the first 45 units for $279 batch to the regular $299 units?

        The first 45 units are the first prototypes units that we already purchased their enclosures so they will look exactly like in the video - this is why they will ship sooner, the regular batch ($299 + shipping units) will be the first version units, they will look the same and have the same size but may feature different text or words on the layout depend on the later changes that we will make on the software. both options will come with full warranty.

        When the perks will be shipped?

        All small perks related to merchandise only will be shipped about 3-4 weeks after the indiegogo project time is done, banners however will be uploaded a few days after time is done, all other perks have an estimated time detailed at the perks section on the right.

        What type of power supply do I need for the switcher?

        A standard 9V DC 500mA negative center power supply is required, the actual power consumption is depend on how many loops are turned on the same time – for a normal use of about 4-5 loops per preset, the switcher will use about only 200mA.

        Do I need to add more money for shipping?

        All perks include free shipping or include the shipping costs so no additional money is needed.

        Can I control presets with CC and PC midi commands on my Strymon\line 6\other digital effects?

        Yes, the switcher can send midi commands up to 5 devices on the same time (or more in OMNI mode), include CC and PC commands so you can control %100 of midi features.

        Can I set a preset to turn on couple of pedals, switch amp channel and also send midi on the same preset?

        Yes, the switcher (with the default module combination) can turn on up to 8 pedals, use 2 relay switchers and also send midi at the same time all in one click!

        What risk do I have when ordering the switcher?

        There is no risks at all! The switcher is %90 ready, we just need the funding for ordering the minimum quantities of parts in order to sell it cheap in the future, by funding us know we will allow you to get the switcher in such a low price compared to the future retail price.

        If you will reach above $25K, how can i choose the larger switcher?

        After the indiegogo time is up, we will contact each one and offer an upgrade to the larger version with small additional fee that will be applied.

        If you will reach above $50k, will the switcher be delayed?

        There is a good chance the switcher will be delayed as we will need to upgrade the software and hardware, rest in sure that it will be worth it! :)

        What are the warranty terms?

        1 year of full warranty on all parts and repairs in our lab, shipping expenses are on the costumer, Full warranty terms are listed on our official website.

cable.

Midi in & out - controls presets on your digital pedals and all other midi applications your setup has, Including an expression pedal jack!

Switchable audio buffer at the input of the switcher - keep the spark of your guitar signal that you lose with long cables with this high quality buffer.
FX Loop module - allows you to break the connection between loops in order to have "in from amp pedals" and "fx loop pedals" setup, When ordering you will have the option to choose where to "break" the connection for you - after 4 loops or after 6 loops. For example - loops 1-6 will include wah , filter and distortion pedals, which will be sent to the amp Input. From the amp's FX loop of your amp you will send the signal back to the FX loop module of the switcher in order to have delay & reverb pedals at loops 7-8.
Internal tuner - that's right! We have a basic guitar tuner built into the switcher! We also include a tuner out jack, if you want to use your own, more advanced tuner (signal is muted when using the tuner feature so no one in the crowd hears you tune).
Stereo outputs L&R
99 Banks with 5 presets on each bank.

GND lift switch (in custom switchable outputs only)





  


If you choose the custom module order you will have some options to choose and change from our default setup: 
Remove the FX loop module in exchange for 2 additional relay switches
 Remove the midi module in exchange for 2 additional relay switches (and keeping the FX loop module.
 Exchange loops 7 and 8 for 2 stereo loops***
Exchange tuner out for A\B selectable inputs***
Exchange stereo outputs for A\B selectable outputs***

** see more info below 

*** those features will be available only if we reach a specific amount of funding - see IF WE REACH section

  

The advanced MCU processor inside the switcher allows you to
have 99 banks with 5 presets in each bank. Each preset can include any combination of turning on
certain loops, switching amp channels and sending midi commands-all in one click!
The switcher also has Manual Mode which allows
you to turn on a couple of pedals inside any
presets. For example, set switches 1-4 in bank A as
presets, and switch 5 as a manual
switch for loop 8 (let's say a
delay pedal). Now you can kick the delay pedal in and
out with switch 5 within any of the  1-4 presets!
Another mode we have is the Silly Mode, which cancels all presets and makes the switcher act as a standard true bypass
looper (switch 1 will turn loop 1 on, etc.).The MCU also allows wireless
features, USB connectivity, iPhone control
via Bluetooth and many more advanced features***
*** These features will be available
only if we reach a specific amount of funding - see IF WE REACH section.
  

The SuperSwitcher 2
is built from the best parts and components we can find, including
high quality, military-grade aluminum chassis and parts from Alpha
switches, Neutrik jacks, Bourns, Omron Relays, Davies USA made knobs, Microchip
MCUs and more! We as a company believe in making the best quality products without saving money on parts!






















What is the difference between the first 45 units for $279 batch to the regular $299 units?
The first 45 units are the first prototypes units that we already purchased their enclosures so they will look exactly like in the video - this is why they will ship sooner, the regular batch ($299 + shipping units) will be the first version units, they will look the same and have the same size but may feature different text or words on the layout depend on the later changes that we will make on the software. both options will come with full warranty.
When the perks will be shipped?
All small perks related to merchandise only will be shipped about 3-4 weeks after the indiegogo project time is done, banners however will be uploaded a few days after time is done, all other perks have an estimated time detailed at the perks section on the right.
What
type of power supply do I need for the switcher?
A standard
9V DC 500mA negative center power supply is required, the actual power consumption
is depend on how many loops are turned on the same time – for a normal use of
about 4-5 loops per preset, the switcher will use about only 200mA. 
Do I
need to add more money for shipping?
All
perks include free shipping or include the shipping costs so no additional
money is needed. 
Can
I control presets with CC and PC midi commands on my Strymon\line 6\other
digital effects?
Yes,
the switcher can send midi commands up to 5 devices on the same time (or more
in OMNI mode), include CC and PC commands so you can control %100 of midi
features.
Can
I set a preset to turn on couple of pedals, switch amp channel and also send
midi on the same preset?
Yes,
the switcher (with the default module combination) can turn on up to 8 pedals,
use 2 relay switchers and also send midi at the same time all in one click!
What
risk do I have when ordering the switcher?
There
is no risks at all! The switcher is %90 ready, we just need the funding for
ordering the minimum quantities of parts in order to sell it cheap in the future,
by funding us know we will allow you to get the switcher in such a low price compared
to the future retail price.
If you will reach above $25K, how can i choose the larger switcher?
After the indiegogo time is up, we will contact each one and offer an upgrade to the larger version with small additional fee that will be applied.
If you will reach above $50k, will the switcher be delayed?

There is a good chance the switcher will be delayed as we will need to upgrade the software and hardware, rest in sure that it will be worth it! :)What are the warranty terms?

 1 year of full warranty on all parts and repairs in our lab, shipping expenses are on the costumer, Full warranty terms are listed on our official website.

story:
Our main focus is to create a wave of change in every music scene. We donate a portion of our proceeds from every line to an appropriate foundation depending on each cause. Our first line, called Not Your Show, deals with the subject of sexual harassment, assault, and general misconduct in music. Proceeds from this line go to the Joyful Heart Foundation, to help sexual assault victims. We’re here to promote mutual respect for all walks of life and make our music scene a safer place.

Any sort of support is helpful, so just taking the time to check this out means the world. If you like what we have to say and think there needs to be some changes made in music scenes everywhere we’d love to hear it! We’re looking to generate some more noise and attention for our brand so we can get everyone's orders out as soon as possible and make a substantial change.

story:
*We already have the funds to start this fantastic project: we offer you a chance to be part of the project before the production begin! Be with us!!!


All spinning discs have a mysterious behavior. They act like they are defying some law of physics.

BTR Innovations designed a precision ball bearing Gyroscope that refers to a supersonic aircraft passing through the sound barrier; it will amaze and mystify you, your friends and family!


The Perks:


SPINNING SURFACE REWARD:
For those who would like to add the spinning surface to their reward, just add 12$ to your pledge and we will sort it out at the end in the survey!


GIMBAL REWARD:
Show the effect of angular momentum to your friends, family or students with the new sonic boom Gimbal. You can easily unscrew the gyroscope by hand to show other tricks. You can add the Gimbal to your actual reward, just add 65$ to your pledge, or choose the reward at 119$ including ceramic bearings and gyroscope (color of your choice)

BRASS VERSION:



HISTORY:

It is amazing to see that kids, engineers and scientists are still wondering how their behaviors are possible!

Do you know that Gyroscopes are used in many high technology things like spacecraft and airplane navigation systems, mobile phones, radio controlled toys, and remote controller like the Wii, IPhone and more? 

Most of us had their first contact with them when we were kids playing with inexpensive toys made of plastic, metal or wood: do you remember all the fun?!


DEVELOPMENT:

We worked on a fantastic design, making sure that it will be unique. We made no compromise on material quality: only the best, anodized aircraft grade aluminium, stainless steel, and brass were used.

You can customize your color choice  - Example, you can order a blue gyro, silver stand and green pull handle.

These beautiful objects are built to last a lifetime. Just leave it on your work desk, on a shelf or in a bookcase and see how your friends and family member, young or not, will be drawn to it!

Every gyroscope are carefully finished and inspected before leaving the factory. We take seriously the satisfactions of our customers. We want to make sure to achieve a high level of quality and surface finish.


PRODUCTION PLAN:

For this project we are updating our shop to produce every parts; we are sure that you will have your Sonic Boom Gyroscope in time.

We are ready for a small or a big first order! Our goal is to offer you best quality gyroscopes at the best price possible. We are sure you will love your Sonic Boom Gyroscope for many year!


SHIPPING:

Shipping will start in September: follow us on Facebook to get all the update about our projects evolutions!
