story:
Perk Highlights 

Custom T-shirt for the Gals and Guys

                  

                   

Limited Edition Reflective Spoke Card 

3M Diamond reflective Bike Beautiful spoke card

Want your spoke card for free? 

Share your referral link and if someone your know contributes, we'll throw in this spoke card for free! Only 250 made total and only 100 available in this campaign. Read more details on how this works here. 



Please note this pant contains 7% spandex, which allows for about a ½” of give in the fit, if not more. If you are between sizes, we recommend purchasing the size down as the stretch accommodates more shapes and body types.


What’s the story behind the Pearl Revolver?

ILADORA adopted the Pearl Revolver as a symbol for the brand due to an inspirational woman in history. In 1894 Annie Londenderry became the very first woman to bike around the world, carrying only a change of clothing and her pearl revolver. She finished her journey in 1895 and was documented as being a true athlete, entrepreneur, mother and traveler. Her journey was extraordinary and unprecedented for a woman, especially at that time. Annie’s story is one that we connected with as an expression of our motivation to never stop challenging ourselves. 


Who is ILADORA?

For us, this project is a personal one.  We knew there was a void in women’s apparel and believe we can fill it. ILADORA Apparel is representative of who we are and the clothing we want to wear. We sourced the highest quality of eco-friendly and durable fabric for this pant and are working with a local manufacturer in San Francisco to have it produced.


Connect with ILADORA Apparel 


Where is your money going?

We’ve invested over $5,000 of our personal funds up to this point for product development and testing. Next steps are to purchase materials and get the product to manufacturing.

If we hit our fundraising goal we can get The Perfect Bike Pant into production and into your hands, and allow Iladora to continue to create apparel for the female bike commuter.

Shipping/Delivery Schedule

Our first run is limited due to our initial order of fabric. We wanted to make sure we had the materials in hand to manufacture. If we surpass our goal we will open up new perk levels for second run of later shipping. The campaign will end early October and production will begin in mid-October. Items will ship in late November.

Risks and challenges

The team has spent a lot of time building relationships with our vendors and an experienced manufacturer to plan our production schedule with as few risks as possible. Even so, the unexpected can happen. We believe in transparency and clear communication, if anything changes you’ll know first.

FAQ

I’m in SF, can I try these on?

We have only a small size range of prototypes. If you are concerned with the sizing, please email us with specific questions and we can help you choose the size that is best for you. Email team@iladora.com.

How much is shipping?

If in the US shipping is included. If outside of the US please add $30 to your order during the checkout process. This is a flat fee for international shipping.

Do you do international shipping?

Yes we ship internationally. Please add $30 to your order during the checkout process. This is a flat fee for international shipping.

How do I order my size?

When the campaign is over we will contact you to capture your correct size information. If you are between sizes we recommend ordering the size down. Please use our fit guide as a resource and specifically the hip measurement, keeping in mind that the pant has a nice amount of stretch.

If my size doesn’t fit can I exchange it?

Yes, of course you can exchange your size. We are all about keeping our customer happy! If you follow the fit guide you really should not have a problem, but just in case, please let us know quickly so that we can make sure you are the next in line for the correct size.

How do I order the color I want?

You pick your color based on the IndieGoGo perk - each level has a choice for Folsom Black or Sansome Grey.

Can I contribute a larger amount?

Of course you can and we encourage you to do so. That is the beauty of Indiegogo. We may even throw in something special for you.

Do you make sizes smaller than 0 or larger than 14?

Currently our size range is 0-14. If we receive overwhelming requests from our customers to increase our size range, we will definitely do that for our next run in manufacturing.

Where can we buy your product when the campaign ends?

When the campaign ends you can purchase our new products on www.iladora.com.

story:
History

I am a professional woman who participates in many different activities
during the

day, these include family, social or business activities, and I love to look
stylish for each of these, but it is also important to have accessories that
are both practical and versatile.

On a trip I made to New York, I asked myself, why the world has lost the
true concept of luxury and after being invited to several seminars about this
subject, I decided to create a Chilean luxury brand where I have included
traditional factors that most brands considered luxurious have ceased to
include.

These factors are:

The use of natural and refined materials;

Classic designs that have endure;

Products that are intensive in specialized craftmanship and Production with an intensive sense of social and environmental responsibility

This is how the creation of the brand “Maria Gallo” began, which in its first
stage was only sold in New York using exotic leathers like ostrich.

Later on, we would open up to the production of all fine leathers of
every kind, leaving the ostrich line only for very exclusive articles, in which
the models may be the same, but no two products are ever alike.

In order to confirm the acceptance to these products, I participated in
the Global Summit of Women 2013 which took place in Malasia, where 1,100 women
from 72 countries participated. I was the only Chilean who participated in the
encounter.

Another great motivation for the creation of this brand is that we
always refer to

recycling raw materials, but no one ever mentions recycling labor, which in
this case is the rescue of artisans work that is highly qualified and trained
by the international company, Gucci, which for a long period of time, had a
large portion of their production in Chile. However, due to a policy of cost
reduction and following the world trend, many companies moved their production
to other countries, especially those in Asia, leaving all that valuable and
meticulous labor without a work source. The brand “Maria Gallo” has meant for these
artisans a new opportunity and a valuation of their skills.

We need :

I am requesting funding for purchasing the machinery necessary for optimization of the leather cutting process.

     The objective is to liberate the craftsmen’s time in the cutting process,
     therefore allowing them to apply their knowledge to the other areas of
     production of each specialized piece and optimizing the use of their
     production time.

You are collaborating in three different ways:

1st. Helping people that are valuable skilled to get back their jobs, maintaining the craftsmanship legacy.

2nd Helping the environment by supporting a natural material production.

3rd You are making a long term investment in your image,because the beauty of each creation have meant that each article that carries the brand “Maria Gallo” has been denominated by experts to be a “Piece of jewelry made in leather”.
Therefore, the concept of luxury does not end at the purchase, but continues
with the privilege of using it.

Please take advantage of the perks by signing up for any of our products
on the righthand panel (the images below this text are not shopping links, but
faithful portrayals of the different perk options that you can access on the
righthand panel).

Thanks for helping us keep luxury and tradition alive!

María Cecilia Gallo Cabrera


The following are some of the perk-related products. To see a complete
list, please visit: http://mariagalloleather.tumblr.com/

If you you want to see others mdels and colors, please visit our website. www.mariagallo.com

HISTORIA

En un viaje a Nueva York, me pregunté del porqué ya casi no se fabricaban en Chile artículos de buena calidad y que este era solamente un privilegio de unas cuantas marcas de lujo. Para rescatar esta capacidad de producción local de artículos de cuero de primera calidad, nace la marca  "María Gallo", la que tiene como fundamento 4 factores  que deben tener toda marca y producto para que pueda ser considerado de lujo.

Estos factores son:

  1. Uso materiales naturales y finos,
  2. Diseños clasicos que permanezcan en el tiempo,
  3. Producción con alto contenido de mano de obra especializada, y
  4. Alta responsabilidad social y empresarial, en todo su proceso de fabricación y comercialización.

Por otra parte, pude notar que en el mercado que hay pocas carteras que se puedan usar para varias ocasiones y que siempre luzcan bien, vale decir, poder ir con ellas a una cena, al supermercado, o en diferentes circunstancias, y que aun así, siempre sea un accesorio que aporte estilo y elegancia a una tenida.

Otro aspecto que pude observar es que siempre se menciona el hecho y necesidad de reciclar materiales, pero poco o casi nada se dice del concepto de reciclar mano de obra y de darle así una segunda oportunidad a personas que tienen un alto grado de especialización y tradición cultural, y que, por politicas de producción de bajo costo, no nos damos cuenta que se pierden en el tiempo y luego no podremos ya rescatar.

 

Lo que pido  en esta campaña.

Los recursos que solicito en esta campaña, son para comprar una maquina de corte de cuero, que optimiza el tiempo de producción de los artesanos.

En resumen.

Al aportar en esta campaña, que puede ser eligiendo uno de los productos desde USD $10, o bien sólo aportando, usted obtiene 3 beneficios diferentes:

  • 1°. Ayuda a mantener y recuperar a artesanos valiosos y especializados, rescatando y conservando un legado cultural importante.
  • 2°  Ayuda al medio ambiente al financiar una actividad que prácticamente no contamina y que solamente utiliza materiales naturales.
  • 3°  Ayuda a potenciar su imagen con un producto fino y exclusivo, que le aporta elegancia, protege sus recursos al tener un producto que dura 5 veces más en el tiempo, por calidad y diseño y, sobre todo, porque la belleza de cada creación le ha valido a la marca "Maria Gallo" ser considerada por los expertos como: "Una joya hecha en cuero". Por estos motivos la alegría de poder adquirirlo no termina en en el proceso de adquisición, sino en el privilegio de usarlo y lucirlo.

¿Como colaboro?

En las ventanas del lado derecho encontrarás diferentes productos los cuales puedes elegir y adquirir por esta vía. De de lo contrario, podrás colaborar con aportes de dinero, los cuales van desde un dólar.

Las imagenes de abajo son referenciales de cada producto. Podrás encontrar más productos en la pagina web, o bien contactar al mail de mariagallo@mariagallo.com y preguntar por más opciones de colores y diseños y personalización de productos.

Para ver la lista completa de los artículos que se pueden adquirir en esta pagina, visita por favor el siguiente link: http://mariagalloleather.tumblr.com/

      Gracias por colaborar y permitir que esta capaña se haga realidad. 

    Maria Cecilia  Gallo

     

     

     
    If you  you want to see other models and colors, please visit our website. www.mariagallo.com

1st. Helping people that are valuable skilled to get back their jobs, maintaining the craftsmanship legacy.
2nd Helping the environment by supporting a natural material production.
3rd You are making a long term investment in your image,because the beauty of each creation have meant that each article that carries the brand “Maria Gallo” has been denominated by experts to be a “Piece of jewelry made in leather”.Therefore, the concept of luxury does not end at the purchase, but continueswith the privilege of using it.
Please take advantage of the perks by signing up for any of our productson the righthand panel (the images below this text are not shopping links, butfaithful portrayals of the different perk options that you can access on therighthand panel).
Thanks for helping us keep luxury and tradition alive!
María Cecilia Gallo Cabrera
The following are some of the perk-related products. To see a completelist, please visit: http://mariagalloleather.tumblr.com/
If you you want to see others mdels and colors, please visit our website. www.mariagallo.com
HISTORIA
En un viaje a Nueva York, me pregunté del porqué ya casi no se fabricaban en Chile artículos de buena calidad y que este era solamente un privilegio de unas cuantas marcas de lujo. Para rescatar esta capacidad de producción local de artículos de cuero de primera calidad, nace la marca  "María Gallo", la que tiene como fundamento 4 factores  que deben tener toda marca y producto para que pueda ser considerado de lujo.
Estos factores son:

Uso materiales naturales y finos,
Diseños clasicos que permanezcan en el tiempo,
Producción con alto contenido de mano de obra especializada, y
Alta responsabilidad social y empresarial, en todo su proceso de fabricación y comercialización.

Por otra parte, pude notar que en el mercado que hay pocas carteras que se puedan usar para varias ocasiones y que siempre luzcan bien, vale decir, poder ir con ellas a una cena, al supermercado, o en diferentes circunstancias, y que aun así, siempre sea un accesorio que aporte estilo y elegancia a una tenida.
Otro aspecto que pude observar es que siempre se menciona el hecho y necesidad de reciclar materiales, pero poco o casi nada se dice del concepto de reciclar mano de obra y de darle así una segunda oportunidad a personas que tienen un alto grado de especialización y tradición cultural, y que, por politicas de producción de bajo costo, no nos damos cuenta que se pierden en el tiempo y luego no podremos ya rescatar.
 
Lo que pido  en esta campaña.
Los recursos que solicito en esta campaña, son para comprar una maquina de corte de cuero, que optimiza el tiempo de producción de los artesanos.
En resumen.
Al aportar en esta campaña, que puede ser eligiendo uno de los productos desde USD $10, o bien sólo aportando, usted obtiene 3 beneficios diferentes:

1°. Ayuda a mantener y recuperar a artesanos valiosos y especializados, rescatando y conservando un legado cultural importante.
2°  Ayuda al medio ambiente al financiar una actividad que prácticamente no contamina y que solamente utiliza materiales naturales.
3°  Ayuda a potenciar su imagen con un producto fino y exclusivo, que le aporta elegancia, protege sus recursos al tener un producto que dura 5 veces más en el tiempo, por calidad y diseño y, sobre todo, porque la belleza de cada creación le ha valido a la marca "Maria Gallo" ser considerada por los expertos como: "Una joya hecha en cuero". Por estos motivos la alegría de poder adquirirlo no termina en en el proceso de adquisición, sino en el privilegio de usarlo y lucirlo.

¿Como colaboro?
En las ventanas del lado derecho encontrarás diferentes productos los cuales puedes elegir y adquirir por esta vía. De de lo contrario, podrás colaborar con aportes de dinero, los cuales van desde un dólar.
Las imagenes de abajo son referenciales de cada producto. Podrás encontrar más productos en la pagina web, o bien contactar al mail de mariagallo@mariagallo.com y preguntar por más opciones de colores y diseños y personalización de productos.
Para ver la lista completa de los artículos que se pueden adquirir en esta pagina, visita por favor el siguiente link: http://mariagalloleather.tumblr.com/

Gracias por colaborar y permitir que esta capaña se haga realidad. 
Maria Cecilia  Gallo 
 




 







 If you  you want to see other models and colors, please visit our website. www.mariagallo.com

story:
Support Corinne Monique

I am a young fashion designer and illustrator with a Bachelor's Degree from the University of Alberta and a Diploma in Haute Couture Fashion Techniques from the Paris American Academy, in Paris, France.

I launched my eponymous womenswear fashion line, Corinne Monique, this past February during New York Fashion Week at Rogues Gallery Presents Emerging Designers Showcase.  I was thrilled to be the only Canadian designer invited to attend and grateful for the supporters who stepped up to help fund my sample production costs, runway show, and travel fees.  Showing my Fall/Winter 2013 collection, entitled 'The Year of the Serpent,' in New York City had since opened many doors for me.  

One of these opportunities is another invite, again as the only Canadian, to show my collection during Tobago Fashion Week, May 17-19th, 2013.  As a brand new company, I'm still doing everything that needs to get done all by myself, from cutting and sewing to fielding press calls and advertising.  So why do another runway show?  In fashion, exposure is opportunity.  This opportunity would be really great for my brand, since I've already had a lot of interest from the Caribbean and South America and it would further open my label up to a new market.  But it is an endeavor that is difficult to manage and financially support long-term by myself.  

 

What I Need & What You Get

This isn't just a free vacation for me...I wish!  It's a chance to assist my label in getting to an international platform.  A lot of hard work and planning goes into a 10 minute show!  By reaching my funding goal, I will be able to recoup some of the costs involved in participating in a runway show.  

To show at Tobago Fashion Week, the participation fee is astonishingly low (and is one of the reasons I chose to participate).  It came out to about $250 CAD, plus shipping a piece to the TFW panel, which was another $150.  There is also a retail element to the runway show, so I will be producing a few more samples, besides the runway samples, for sale.  More samples equals more fabric costs upfront.  Labour costs aside, I'll probably need around $500 to cover material costs.  Hopefully I'll recoup some of these costs by selling some pieces.  There will also probably be fees for runway photos after the show is over.

For the trip itself, I will be taking an assistant, since my collection is a full collection and I will need help backstage and at the retail booth from someone who knows my work.  The flight will be around $250 each way, per person = $1000.  Hotels there seem to run about $100/night.  For four or five nights = $500.

I know my totals are more than my funding goal, but I'm really just asking for help. I'll do the rest!  If I don't reach my goal, I'll still be going, it'll just be harder to continue funding myself.

The Impact

By supporting Corinne Monique, you are supporting a showcase of my designs and the continued exposure of up-and-coming designers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any little bit helps!  Whether you're a devout fashionista, a loyal follower or friend, or you simply have a dollar to spare, I'm sincerely grateful.  This is an opportunity to invest in a startup company and make things happen!  I've added some fun and fantastic perks to sweeten the deal for you.  If you can't help by donating, please pass my campaign on by reposting the link and spreading the word!

 Thank You For Your Support!

story:
Welcome, My name is Calvin Hayes Jr. and I am the founder and owner of SoberTruth Clothing. I am currently in Georgia but i am from California Where i founded my buisness in 2011, And since then i have been piecing things together so one day i can give the world a vision that i have.

YOUTH IS THE MISSION!!! The young people of today are the future of tomorrow, and it's been long enough that we look over them. Sober truth breaks down the cancerous mindset youth obtain from listening to certain music, tv shows, society and even  family. We break down those views and expose them to the love of Christ so that their hearts will be won over by their encounter with him.

SOBER TRUTH?

Sober truth draws inspiration from the Holy Spirit and Biblical Truths. Sober Truth is an urban clothing with bold views, outlooks, and concepts. Our desire is to see blind eyes opened, bring the darkness into the light, and bring sobering truth to the minds of people everywhere. Truth is the truth no matter how it's put. If a man walks in the footsteps of Christ he is surely nominated for persecution and martyrdom. Truth is the world hates the church.

I NEED YOUR HELP

 As of right now I am currently in school for Graphic Design and cant save enough to get my goal amount so I am asking for your help and support to further my progress so can start making good quality clothing.

story:
I've created 6 different sublimation shirts. They're bright, bold, and vibrant. Stop wearing boring clothing, and start standing out from the crowd. 

What You Get

Each shirt is 25 dollars (unless you were lucky enough to snag one of the first discounted ones). Shipping is 5 dollars for the continental USA and 10 dollars everywhere else. No matter how many shirts you order you will only pay ONE shipping charge. Once this campaign closes I will be contacting you asking which design(s) you would like and the sizes.

Vibrant Eye Shirts

Our shirts are made from 100% polyester that is soft to the touch and feels like cotton. We use double sided sublimation printing, so they will never fade, crack, or shrink. The design does not weigh down the shirt, and is permanently bonded to the fabric. Because of the fabric we use Vibrant Eye shirts are moisture wicking which will help keep you dry in sweaty situations such as parties, music festivals, raves, and 25 day hikes through the Sahara Desert. Also, unlike other company's sublimation shirts, our shirts have no white lines, no smudges, and no breaks in the design. All shirts are currently unisex. Women's cut and tank tops coming soon.

About

All Vibrant Eye shirts are designed and sold by Paul O'Hair (that's me in the middle). I'm a 22 year old college student living in San Luis Obispo. I'm doing this crowdfunding campaign to help raise funds so I can place an order of my shirts. Thank you for taking the time to check out my campaign, and an even bigger thanks if you ordered one! Email me at paul@vibranteyeclothing.com if you have any questions. 


The Designs

Click here to view high resolution images



Sizing chart is in inches.

story:
After we have launched the brand Mo. in our first campaign Mo.80 successfully in July 2016 , we have continued to strive to make the leather goods that can fit into working women's everyday life with sophistication, yet casual style.

I, Rosalin Chanyasask, the chief designer of Mo. have studied leather craft from Tokyo, Japan. Together with my sister, Narisa Chanyasak, have explored the leather,material and product design direction and her base is in London, UK.  We have successfully launched our second bag project called "Doctor Mo." , the classic Doctor Bag re-invented in year 2017. 


This year 2018, we are excited to announce our new project because we have worked on this project since July 2017. Over these past 8 months, we cannot believe now it's time to launch our crowdfunding project again. We need your support, so we can get going with our new project "Super Mo. Tote"

Super Mo. Tote has been developed with many trials and errors with at least 10 prototypes before we have found the right combination to have the perfection in style & function.

Designed from 100% imported leather and soft luxurious Alcantara lining, Super Mo. Tote can accommodate a full-sized 13 inch laptop, along with all your everyday belongings (even gym clothes and shoes.)   The carrying straps are soft , supple and just the right size for your comfort while carrying. Sophisticated but also casual, Super Mo. Tote is designed for the busy professional on-the-go.

Super Mo. Tote offers these features : 

  • 13-inch laptop cushion padding for protection
  • Water bottle holder
  • Glasses holder with soft Alcantara lining to protect your lens
  • Key Leash seamlessly keeps keys within reach when your arms or bag are full.
  • Pockets for laptop plug , tablets, smart phones, gadgets 
  • Compartment for zipper to put your valuable items
  • Hidden front pocket for magazine or documents to avoid crumpled paper

 
Before the final prototype has come out, we have worked for over 6 months for more than 10 prototypes. The long process of design has made us revisit the purpose of making this special bag. Simplify one's life with one bag, Super Mo. Tote.

 

REASON BEHIND CROWDFUNDING 

We are striving to make the best leather goods with good functional design and high quality materials. We are using premium materials for our customers, so they can have good experience with the products. The cost of these premium materials require a lot of funding to develop and manufacture our first badge, so we are now asking for your support. 

Exterior

  • Imported 100% genuine soft cow leather with grain for for its durability , feel-good tactile, and style. The selected color is dark cool tone gray for its easy to use, mix and match well with all clothes.  

Interior

  •  Soft luxurious Alcantara,  the suede-like material which has been developed by Japanese scientist and now has been distributed by an Italian company called Alcantara S.p.A. 
    • The material is widely used in aircraft and yacht interiors for its durability, stain resistance and flame retardant. 

You will be our very first customer to receive Super Mo. Tote with our special early bird price since you are our very generous supporters. This means so much to us. 

The Vision 

We are a boot-strapped design studio that would like to differentiate our bags with high quality materials, craftsmanship and minimalist design. To have your support would mean so much to us and keep us going in pursuing our own dreams. Our dream is to become world wide recognised leather good brand with minimalist design and sophistication.

  • Super Mo. Tote has been designed to help women live lives with simplicity. Having one bag for all items she needs in her everyday life.  Hassle-free, Worry-free & let Super Mo. Tote take care of the rest. 

Risks & Challenges

The risk of these projects would be to receive the products a little bit behind the schedule, however we have developed an early stage production already, so we hope to get the products within the schedule we have planned which is by the end of May.

 

Warranty & Care

We offer 6 month warranty against defects in metal parts from the day they were shipped, when used under normal conditions and for the purpose intended. We will replace/refund your product as necessary.

This warranty covers faults in unusual materials and workmanship and doesn't apply if damage is caused by unreasonable use, normal wear and tear or if you just change your mind.

Super Mo. Tote purchased through Indiegogo cannot be refunded. However, we will take care of after sale service of your purchased item well.

If you wish to make a claim, or need help with Super Mo. Tote , Please email us at support@mostory.co and kindly attach your receipt.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to our campaign, do not worry. Please simply share our campaign on your social media to make an impact. We THANK YOU so much for your interest and support.


We hope to ship Super Mo. Tote to you soon & hope you love the bag as much as we do! 

 

Best,

Rosalin & Team Mo.

Rosalin & Team Mo.

story:
The story of perfect wallet began in april 2012. I was on the party with friends we were having fun and the morning after I found out that i lost my wallet or someone stole it from me. I always wore it in back of my jeans like 90% population but after this experiance i want wallet that fit into my front pocket or into small packet of shirt. So i looked for this specific wallet and the only wallets i found that fits my needs were from 199$ to 299$ and that is too expensive for something you will use 2-4 years. So in May me and my friends put together ideas for wallet that fits everyone, with packets and sizes you want that means no unnecessary pockets that will create "fat" wallet and in july was born first prototype.

So now we had wallet and we needed material that will suit us for our wallet. Leather was too expensive and its not perfect material. After month of looking i found Tyvek. That was the best material for this. Easy to work with,waterproof,eco-friendly and the most beautiful things is that it's durable. So in November we created almost 30 prototypes for our families and friends. In video we use these prototypes and they are 2 and a half years old :)

Difrent sizes and difrent structure of pockets. In 2013 it was year of testing how durable and good these wallets are. The fedback was amazing even from people that has the wallet olny for 1-2 month. We were quite happy but we knew we had to improve s me things like add more components to choose from, stronger back, RFID, building proces. 

By the end of a year we had everything ready to build a final form of wallet that we wanted. In march 2014 we created wallet that looks and feel like something special and incredible together. After a half year testing this wallet we knew that this was the thing we wanted to create. Perfect in every aspect. And this is the born of Your Wallet.






To achieve our goal and create a perfect wallet, we need your help in two ways: 

  • Ordering Your wallet by clicking on the right side of the campaign to choose the offer you want.
  • Sharing our campaign using the buttons that you can find on the left side of the page. 





  • It's perfect to carry everything you need
  • Strong back of the wallet helps to prevent deformation
  • Select from 3 diffrent sizes to fit you lifestyle
  • It gives you full control over elements
  • No limit for the number of cards you carry ( Unless you like to carry 50 cards, then this is not the best wallet for you.)
  • Never forget your wallet, keys or phone(attachments?)
  • Your Wallet is redesigned but still keeps it slim and low profile
    Fashionable and minimalist
  • Choose componenst you like, no more "FAT WALLET"
  • Make your pants fit better, or your butt look nicer
  • Keeps it simple but in a new


                                              Of course inside ;)

                                                 Normal day.

                                                   Gentleman


On our website you will select what type of wallet you want - small,medium,large

 then the components that fits your selected type of wallet.

                                        Example of components
 OR choose already assembled versions.


 Color is next part of this proces.

 After you have selected everything you want, the last thing is to order Your wallet. Yes it's that simple :)




Ultra-thin at .08 mm, it's pretty cool looking with a metallic gold/silvery sheen because of the copper and nickel, and it is building a Faraday cage within your wallet to trap those RFID signals! You'll never see it because it is between our layers of tyvek which are almost as thin! Thin is always In and now you can be thin and safe.



  • Material - Tyvek, High-Quality,Durable,Ecofriendly
  • Types - Small,Madium,Large
  • Pockets - Depends how will your wallet looks like
  • Attachment - Maybe(Strech goal)
  • Capacity- Small(3-5 cards + cash), Medium(6-12 cards + cash), Large(15+ Cards + cash)
  • Over 25 componenst to choose from
  • Life expectancy-  3+ years
  • Functionality- Tight performance, Almost impossible to destroy


                                     Always ready for adventure!

            Several trips= survived and slightly damaged but......survived :)



Revolution has been the way of life and infact improving is the way of our company.
Improving the design and the quality of material is the true sign of it in Your Wallet.
We are confident that you will fall in love with your Wallet once you start using it.
Don't forget the first 99 backers will get their wallet faster! Thank you in
advance for your support.


                                             Fit everywhere.

                                                  Stay classy!


This is where Indiegogo and you come in . We need your support to launch this line of wallets. We are raising funding for manufacturing, packaging, and logistics for Your Wallet. Your support for the production of these wallets will help to make everyday life as good as possible. Thank you for taking the time to check out the project.



David Vlk: Co-Funder,wallet desing
Luděk Dvořák: Co-Funder,technical engineer
Hana Racková: Prototype Consultant
Petr Dolanský: Component design, support




Since we've already developed the final version of the wallet, and we have more componentsto choose from,the main risks are a possible delay with the production time, and unexpected problems with attaining the the raw materials. But… To be honest, there is a very tiny possibility that any of that will happen. With our years of experience, strong connections and know-how of the manufacturing processes we’re here to guarantee the timeline, schedule, and of course the Product! And who knows, if we work hard and with a little luck, we might even be ready to ship the wallets ahead of schedule.



How thin is it?

  • The thickness is between 0.5 - 1 cm/0.2 - 0.4 inches(Large) with full capacity of cards,receipts and casht. But it depends on the type of wallet too .

Do i get components or complete wallet?

  • You will get a complete wallet, it means that we will build it for you of the components that you selected.

I have different currency, will my fit?

  • We designed the wallets with after we measured all major international notes. The wallet fits USD, GPB, EUR, YEN, and more!

  • Note: The EURO Note ranges in size. The higher the value of the note the bigger the dimensions of the note. The high value notes are bigger than most currencies and don't fit in most wallets, You also find them less.

  • The most commonly used EURO notes of 5,10,20,50,100 EUR all fit in the wallet. 

Will my wallet last?

  • Yes. Tyvek material is paper thin but extremely durable, tear resistant and 100% water resistant. This wallet will last you years!

how do i choose my wallet?

  • When the campaign is over we will send you an email with all the wallets and components to choose from  - You choose. We ship.

Are they waterproof? Really waterproof?

  • Since Tyvek is technically a sheet plastic, it's completely waterproof. It's HDPE like milk jugs so if it gets wet, you can just shake the water right off of it.

Can i order more then 1 wallet?

  • Yes one way is to donate again or after campaign is over and you will get email from us to choose your wallet, choose second one and email us back with both of them and we will talk about it with you :)


Do you still have a question?

  • Ask us : askyw.ld@gmail.com
story_txt:
The story of perfect wallet began in april 2012. I was on the party with friends we were having fun and the morning after I found out that i lost my wallet or someone stole it from me. I always wore it in back of my jeans like 90% population but after this experiance i want wallet that fit into my front pocket or into small packet of shirt. So i looked for this specific wallet and the only wallets i found that fits my needs were from 199$ to 299$ and that is too expensive for something you will use 2-4 years. So in May me and my friends put together ideas for wallet that fits everyone, with packets and sizes you want that means no unnecessary pockets that will create "fat" wallet and in july was born first prototype.So now we had wallet and we needed material that will suit us for our wallet. Leather was too expensive and its not perfect material. After month of looking i found Tyvek. That was the best material for this. Easy to work with,waterproof,eco-friendly and the most beautiful things is that it's durable. So in November we created almost 30 prototypes for our families and friends. In video we use these prototypes and they are 2 and a half years old :)Difrent sizes and difrent structure of pockets. In 2013 it was year of testing how durable and good these wallets are. The fedback was amazing even from people that has the wallet olny for 1-2 month. We were quite happy but we knew we had to improve s me things like add more components to choose from, stronger back, RFID, building proces. By the end of a year we had everything ready to build a final form of wallet that we wanted. In march 2014 we created wallet that looks and feel like something special and incredible together. After a half year testing this wallet we knew that this was the thing we wanted to create. Perfect in every aspect. And this is the born of Your Wallet.






To achieve our goal and create a perfect wallet, we need your help in two ways: 


Ordering Your wallet by clicking on the right side of the campaign to choose the offer you want.

Sharing our campaign using the buttons that you can find on the left side of the page. 
 
It's perfect to carry everything you need
Strong back of the wallet helps to prevent deformation
Select from 3 diffrent sizes to fit you lifestyle
It gives you full control over elements
No limit for the number of cards you carry ( Unless you like to carry 50 cards, then this is not the best wallet for you.)
Never forget your wallet, keys or phone(attachments?)
Your Wallet is redesigned but still keeps it slim and low profileFashionable and minimalist 
Choose componenst you like, no more "FAT WALLET"
Make your pants fit better, or your butt look nicer
Keeps it simple but in a new
                                              Of course inside ;)                                                 Normal day.                                                   GentlemanOn our website you will select what type of wallet you want - small,medium,large then the components that fits your selected type of wallet.                                        Example of components OR choose already assembled versions.




 Color is next part of this proces.

 After you have selected everything you want, the last thing is to order Your wallet. Yes it's that simple :)



Ultra-thin at .08 mm, it's pretty cool looking with a metallic gold/silvery sheen because of the copper and nickel, and it is building a Faraday cage within your wallet to trap those RFID signals! You'll never see it because it is between our layers of tyvek which are almost as thin! Thin is always In and now you can be thin and safe.








Material - Tyvek, High-Quality,Durable,Ecofriendly
Types - Small,Madium,Large
Pockets - Depends how will your wallet looks like
Attachment - Maybe(Strech goal)
Capacity- Small(3-5 cards + cash), Medium(6-12 cards + cash), Large(15+ Cards + cash)
Over 25 componenst to choose from
Life expectancy-  3+ years

Functionality- Tight performance, Almost impossible to destroy





                                     Always ready for adventure!





            Several trips= survived and slightly damaged but......survived :)







Revolution has been the way of life and infact improving is the way of our company. Improving the design and the quality of material is the true sign of it in Your Wallet. We are confident that you will fall in love with your Wallet once you start using it. Don't forget the first 99 backers will get their wallet faster! Thank you in advance for your support.



                                             Fit everywhere.





                                                  Stay classy!

story:
Clasp Magic is the complete solution to a very, very old problem...attaching clasp bracelets.  

It's time to get ready for work in the morning. The outfit is carefully chosen, hair is carefully styled, and makeup is applied to perfection. Now, what accessories to wear? “Oh no, I really wanted to wear my clasp bracelet, but no one is here to help me. I am going to chip my nails trying on my own or I'm going to end up leaving late!” Back in the drawer goes the favorite clasp bracelet and it is replaced by a cuff. This scenario would have been prevented with the help of Clasp Magic!

 

 With Clasp Magic, bracelets attach within seconds, making it quick and easy to use.  Simply put the clasp end into the Clasp Magic, securing it into place.  Then, wrap the bracelet around your wrist, drop the loop end into the open clasp, push the button, and your bracelet is attached!

 Clasp Magic is the first and only device on the market that keeps the clasp end open, making it simple and quick to attach your bracelet.

 Clasp Magic works with almost any type of clasp! It works for ring clasps and lobster clasps of different sizes, and so much more! One tool does it all!

 Clasp Magic will attach both ring and lobster clasps in ten seconds or less!

 Clasp Magic's built-in jewelry storage compartment can hold up to five bracelets, making it easy to take your favorite bracelets anywhere.  It also provides a secure place to store your bracelets while at the gym or traveling.

 There are no batteries needed, nothing needs to be charged, and it never stops working!

 The compact size of the Magic Clasp makes it easy to take with you anywhere! It is small enough to carry in your purse and durable enough to add to your gym bag or suitcase.  Just toss into your bag and go!

 The anti-slip tread on the bottom of the Clasp Magic allows bracelets to be attached without the unit moving or scratching any surface.  It has the perfect grip, every time!

 

Wear Bracelets Again!

Have the freedom to wear bracelets again and accessorize with your style! No more worries about having to swim, sleep, workout, or shower with your bracelet on in order to avoid reattachment. Clasp Magic makes it easy to put on and take off bracelets in ten seconds or less. Without the stress of bracelet attachment, it is easy to put on and change out bracelets more often and with confidence.

Eliminate Embarrassment and Frustration

No more asking for an extra set of hands anymore. The struggle is over! Clasp Magic is here to save the day and completely eliminate this time-consuming struggle from women's lives forever!

Save Time

No more wasting time as you struggle to attach the clasp on your bracelet. Clasp Magic will quickly attach your bracelet within seconds!

Easy to Use with Long Nails

Long nails are beautiful, but they make jewelry attachment almost impossible. No matter the length of your nails, Clasp Magic is easy to use and makes it possible to be able to quickly and easily secure bracelets without the worry of chipped or broken nails.

User-Friendly at Any Age

Clasp Magic is user-friendly with both the young and the old. If you struggle with health problems which make it difficult to grasp or see the clap on a bracelet, Clasp Magic will make it possible for you to be able to wear your favorite bracelets again.

                                                 

  

                                                    

Alison Brett:  Inventor, Business Owner, Patent Owner 

Nicholas Brett:  Financial Advisor 

John Vipond:  Engineer

Mako Invent:  Design Team

Francis Coral-Mellon:  Videographer / Advisor

Stephanie Robin:  Photographer

 My four children are the bright stars of my life.  Throughout the whole Clasp Magic journey, they have been a part of it.  That's why they are the inspiration behind each one of the stars in the Clasp Magic mini logo.  Each star represents each of my children, the largest star representing my oldest child, down to the smallest star for my youngest child.

Clasp Magic has a United States Utility Patent with the USPTO, Canadian Utility Patent with the CIPO, and a patent filed in the United Kingdom.

I am Alison Marie Brett (Miss Vipond). I have lived in Canada, Singapore, and Switzerland. I have four young children and I am a very proud stay-at-home mother. I am the CEO of Clasp Magic, a tool that revolutionizes clasp bracelet attachment! My utility patent is so strong that no one will EVER be able to file a patent with the USPTO securing the clasp end of jewelry in an open position! I have two further ideas down the road: a compact, streamline mini-version for bracelet removal and an adapted version to help with necklaces. I will have three products in my line someday! I have a story. It is real. It is raw. It is powerful. I think of Clasp Magic as a blazing trail behind me and all of my backers are helping lay down the fuel it needs to be ENORMOUS! 

 I am one of four children. I fought my way into a very select program at Queen’s University in Canada. The program was called ConEd and it guaranteed two degrees in five years. I have a B.A.H. in Psychology and a B.E.d for primary and junior students. It was a breakup in my final university year that sparked the desire to teach internationally. I was initially rejected by my desired school for being too young and inexperienced. However, I continued to follow-up with them and was finally offered a junior kindergarten teaching position at the Canadian International School (CIS) in Singapore. On the day I left, I took seven pieces of luggage and flew around the world to a country I knew nothing about to start my first year as a teacher. I vividly remember sitting in my new classroom, full of boxes and crying, “What am I supposed to do now?” I got up and I just did It. I am a tough woman and will push and challenge myself on my own. One of my new students came in early to meet me…I had chosen to become a teacher back in the day as opposed to a pediatric nurse because I did not want to work with sick children. I did not think I would be strong enough. So, one week into living in Singapore, I met a 4-year-old American expat in my class who was in remission for leukemia. I was mad! Why did I have to have this sweet girl with this condition in my very first class? Long story short, my student relapsed…she went back to a specialized hospital in the United States after her first year with me. Her cancer came back for the third time. I was starting my second year in Singapore at the time and was given special permission to fly to Florida, where she was spending the last few weeks of her life. I played, walked, and talked to this sweet girl, who loved me, her teacher, Miss Vipond. On the day I had to leave, she had fallen into a sleep from which she never awoke. Two days later, she passed away. To say that this affected my young 22-year-old heart is putting it lightly!!! I had a dream a few weeks later where she told me not to look up when I was talking to her because she was sitting right beside me! This happened in October 2003 and it shaped my life forever! She is still with me in spirit today. I vowed that day to never give up, never take anything for granted, and to live a life to the fullest without any regrets. I had personally witnessed a family loss, one of the hardest things in the world! I saw how deeply it affected that family and how they would have given anything to have had more time with her. This experience made me grow up really fast and showed my young self the most important things in life. I wanted to leave Singapore at the end of my second year but I was not ready to come back to Canada. I decided I would go to a job fair and try to get a position at another international school in Switzerland. Again, the first reaction was, not enough experience. I committed to following-up and was finally offered another kindergarten position. 

After moving to Zurich, I had to attend a work function. This is when I first struggled with the two clasp bracelets from Tiffany & Co.! I knew at that moment how I would later solve this problem! I met my husband, Nick at a tram stop downtown Zurich at the end of my first year in Switzerland. We met in May 2005. Fast forward to August 2007, we got engaged in the Limmat River, which runs through the town of Zurich, and we were married in the Fraumunster on June 25th, 2008. I ran my one and only marathon the following spring. It was the London marathon in April 2009. This was always something that I had wanted to do, so I bought myself a training watch, a book, and I trained myself. Nick would drop me off and pick me up from my long training runs. I got into the London Marathon 2009 (you have to apply) and I ran for the charity, Children with Leukemia. I raised over 2,000 GBP and ran on my own in 4:48:00:00, just under five hours. 

 My first child was born on March 18th, 2010. We decided to move back to Canada and bought a house in March 2011. My second child was born on March 14th, 2012 and my third child just 15 months later on June 23, 2013. I had stopped my teaching job a few months before my first child was born and was still an at home mom in June 2014. I found out that I was expecting, my fourth baby on the day of my 7th wedding anniversary, June 25th, 2014. This was only two days after my third child turned one. Around that time, the “panic” of having and raising four children under the age of five set in. My sister had loosely mentioned that there are companies that help to design inventions. So, it was during a nap time in June that I looked into a few companies in Toronto, Canada. I wrote down a few numbers and starting dialing. The first number I called put me through to an automated recording and I decided against leaving a message. Then, I picked up MAKO’s number and called. A REAL, LIVE PERSON picked up the phone and spoke to me right away! I had a really good feeling about this company and during that very first phone call, I was put through to the vice president. I was VERY hesitant to give away too many details about my idea at that time, but he agreed to meet with me for my free consultation. I cannot remember the exact date, but it was mid-August 2014 and I was about 12 weeks pregnant with my fourth child. My dad drove me into Toronto while my mother stayed at home with my three napping children. I pitched my idea to the vice president of MAKO and he liked it. 

What I have found amazing, as many women have done before me, is how I have never given up. I made time at all costs to get to Toronto (for product development with MAKO) even with a newborn baby, two other toddlers napping at home, and one in her first year of kindergarten. I have never stopped for a second believing in Clasp Magic. Gaps in my timeline were due to waiting for patent protection and monetary funds. I do not have an MBA. I did not get a grant to financially start on this path. I have a loan from my parents and we have a line of credit…I am ALL in! For years, other mothers would ask me, “Oh, do you work?” And before my patent went through in July 2017, I would answer, ”No, I am at home with my children”. The school year of September 2013 through September 2015, I had three young children at home. But I have been working. I was working on something the whole time! I do not have many friends who stayed at home after their third child was born. I don’t personally know many moms of four. My stay-at-home days were hard! I went one year wearing the same seven outfits and I was just happy to be in clean clothes. I had to fully remove myself from social media for this year. It was so upsetting for me to see my close friends on holidays, date nights, lunches with friends, etc. I had little to no freedom in those years. I am not complaining because I have healthy children and the sacrifice was and will always be worth it, but, it was hard living through it at the time. The social media age has changed everything for mothers too. I was so isolated! This was my low self-esteem period. I cannot remember exactly how, but slowly I started to pick myself up. My kids were always perfectly taken care of, they looked amazing, but there was only so much effort I could afford for myself. I looked tired and worse for wear. I still have such little time to get ready in the morning. When I had Clasp Magic’s prototype in my possession, I used it ALL THE TIME!!! Only seconds to accessorize, Clasp Magic got my old Tiffany & Co. bracelets out of the drawer and on my wrists. It is truly amazing how putting on a few accessories transforms your persona. I felt more on top of everything in my life and was more confident when I did. I added makeup back into my routine - which helped too. Mothers noticed and would say, “I don’t know how you do it!” This gave me such pride! This gear shift helped me to work harder than ever. I always work during nap times and evenings. My youngest child is not enrolled in any preschool this year. She has one morning at my parents’ house so I can work on Clasp Magic and I have her with me for the rest of the week. I have still been able to drive progress this year with Clasp Magic. My little student whom I witness lose her battle with cancer 15 years ago is still with me. My life and experience have driven this project from its conception. The idea of not trying, of not bringing Clasp Magic to life, was never a risk I was willing to take. I want to help motivate other women and mothers everywhere with my story! I want to be able to give back to communities of mothers in less fortunate countries. I will always help anyone who asks! This is what life and the world are about.

I ran my one and only marathon the following spring. It was the London marathon in April 2009. This was always something that I had wanted to do, so I bought myself a training watch, a book, and I trained myself. Nick would drop me off and pick me up from my long training runs. I got into the London Marathon 2009 (you have to apply) and I ran for the charity, Children with Leukemia. I raised over 2,000 GBP and ran on my own in 4:48:00:00, just under five hours.  My first child was born on March 18th, 2010. We decided to move back to Canada and bought a house in March 2011. My second child was born on March 14th, 2012 and my third child just 15 months later on June 23, 2013. I had stopped my teaching job a few months before my first child was born and was still an at home mom in June 2014. I found out that I was expecting, my fourth baby on the day of my 7th wedding anniversary, June 25th, 2014. This was only two days after my third child turned one. Around that time, the “panic” of having and raising four children under the age of five set in. My sister had loosely mentioned that there are companies that help to design inventions. So, it was during a nap time in June that I looked into a few companies in Toronto, Canada. I wrote down a few numbers and starting dialing. The first number I called put me through to an automated recording and I decided against leaving a message. Then, I picked up MAKO’s number and called. A REAL, LIVE PERSON picked up the phone and spoke to me right away! I had a really good feeling about this company and during that very first phone call, I was put through to the vice president. I was VERY hesitant to give away too many details about my idea at that time, but he agreed to meet with me for my free consultation. I cannot remember the exact date, but it was mid-August 2014 and I was about 12 weeks pregnant with my fourth child. My dad drove me into Toronto while my mother stayed at home with my three napping children. I pitched my idea to the vice president of MAKO and he liked it. What I have found amazing, as many women have done before me, is how I have never given up. I made time at all costs to get to Toronto (for product development with MAKO) even with a newborn baby, two other toddlers napping at home, and one in her first year of kindergarten. I have never stopped for a second believing in Clasp Magic. Gaps in my timeline were due to waiting for patent protection and monetary funds. I do not have an MBA. I did not get a grant to financially start on this path. I have a loan from my parents and we have a line of credit…I am ALL in! For years, other mothers would ask me, “Oh, do you work?” And before my patent went through in July 2017, I would answer, ”No, I am at home with my children”. The school year of September 2013 through September 2015, I had three young children at home. But I have been working. I was working on something the whole time! I do not have many friends who stayed at home after their third child was born. I don’t personally know many moms of four. My stay-at-home days were hard! I went one year wearing the same seven outfits and I was just happy to be in clean clothes. I had to fully remove myself from social media for this year. It was so upsetting for me to see my close friends on holidays, date nights, lunches with friends, etc. I had little to no freedom in those years. I am not complaining because I have healthy children and the sacrifice was and will always be worth it, but, it was hard living through it at the time. The social media age has changed everything for mothers too. I was so isolated! This was my low self-esteem period. I cannot remember exactly how, but slowly I started to pick myself up. My kids were always perfectly taken care of, they looked amazing, but there was only so much effort I could afford for myself. I looked tired and worse for wear. I still have such little time to get ready in the morning. When I had Clasp Magic’s prototype in my possession, I used it ALL THE TIME!!! Only seconds to accessorize, Clasp Magic got my old Tiffany & Co. bracelets out of the drawer and on my wrists. It is truly amazing how putting on a few accessories transforms your persona. I felt more on top of everything in my life and was more confident when I did. I added makeup back into my routine - which helped too. Mothers noticed and would say, “I don’t know how you do it!” This gave me such pride! This gear shift helped me to work harder than ever. I always work during nap times and evenings. My youngest child is not enrolled in any preschool this year. She has one morning at my parents’ house so I can work on Clasp Magic and I have her with me for the rest of the week. I have still been able to drive progress this year with Clasp Magic. My little student whom I witness lose her battle with cancer 15 years ago is still with me. My life and experience have driven this project from its conception. The idea of not trying, of not bringing Clasp Magic to life, was never a risk I was willing to take. I want to help motivate other women and mothers everywhere with my story! I want to be able to give back to communities of mothers in less fortunate countries. I will always help anyone who asks! This is what life and the world are about.

story:
At William Painter, we were tired of all the compromises made in the products we use on a daily basis. While other companies are racing to the bottom, we stand for something more. 

We believe everyone deserves to have the best products, with the best materials, best manufacturers, and solid customer service that treats you like family.

We make products that can keep up with your adventures. That's why we use the most durable materials and back it up with a lifetime guarantee. 

We truly believe that having trusted everyday accessories will enhance your life and inspire you to be more.

              

              

              

              

              

              

You’re a person who needs eyewear to keep up with style. With an iconic silhouette, new age materials, and classic vintage design, The Oasis sets you apart and gets you ready for any occasion.

              

Titanium frames with the world’s lightest lenses make The Oasis the lightest sunglasses ever! While the fit ensures that the frames stay absolutely secured to your face.

These sunglasses are made from the same materials used in a Fighter jet, F1 Race Car, Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron and many ultra-luxury watches. The Oasis is extremely strong, but also deceptively light.

Titanium is also hypoallergenic, meaning it is perfectly safe for the human body. In fact, doctors use it for hip and knee replacements for this very reason.

You’re an active person who needs eyewear that can keep up. We examined drill bits, knives, firearms and F1 race car pistons. From this, we developed our own titanium protective coating.  

 Get out there! Our durable coating has got your back.

Ever had sunglasses fall down your nose? We HATE that! Proper sunglass fitting is taken to heart. By using a thick titanium and ultralight lens, we are able to greatly improve the center of balance.

Adventure as hard as you want, these puppies aren’t flying off!

The Oasis frames come with the highest quality Japanese nylon polarized lenses. They are light, durable, clear and, most impressively, extremely scratch and shatter resistant.

We put a hammer to ours just to show you how true this is.

Polarization neutralizes glare and drastically reduces eye strain. They work especially well on car windshields, oceans or lakes, and other high glare environments.

The problem is most lenses use a polarizing and tint coating added on top of the lenses to achieve this effect. Over time, these coatings bubble and flake off the lens. Ever seen a bad tint job on a car? Same problem.

Our LifeLong Lenses integrates both polarizing and tint layers entirely inside the lens rather than just a surface film layer, so it lasts forever. No more peeling tints!

We searched around the world looking for the lightest lenses with the best optics - we got them. And for this, they cost us a premium. In fact, it costs more to produce one of our lenses than to produce an entire pair of “high-end” brand lenses.

But don’t worry, because we believe in quality products for everyone, we’ll take the hit, so you can get the best.

Our frames are made prescription ready. You can take them to your local optometrist and have your prescription put in with ease. 

Each one of our titanium arms is laser engraved with our challenge to you to “Find Your Oasis”. Let it be a subtle reminder to never settle for less than best.

It’s the details that matter, and we think this is the perfect finishing touch.

We worked really hard on making a high quality pair of sunglasses, so why not do the same for a way to protect them? Every pair of The Oasis comes with a custom-built hard case made just for it.

 Your sunglasses will fit snuggly and won’t shake around inside.

              

You are family. We truly mean it. Whether it’s a problem, concern, or therapy after Avengers: Infinity War, we’ll gladly chat with you and help you out. No machines, no jaded scripts. Only real humans and real conversations with people that care about you. 

              

              

Pick a reward, become a backer, and help us bring these new products to life. To say thank you, we offer the lowest possible price and deliver to you before anyone else.

story:
Hi, my name is Sophie. I am 12 years old. My mom, some friends and I went to the Women's March in LA on January 21.  I left there feeling more powerful than I've ever felt in my life.

That day was a day I will never forget.  I loved the feeling of speaking my mind along with everyone else that cared so much that they flooded the streets around the world. I wanted my voice to be heard.  And even though my voice may be small, I felt powerful. 


I came home that day wishing that I had something that could show how I felt and what I thought.  

So I begged and begged and begged and begged…and begged my mom for a pink hat to wear to school.

But she said that some of the accessories were not practical for everyday use. 

So that’s when I came up with an idea… The Power Pom.

I wanted to make something that I could wear, all the time, every day, to show how I felt.  And how I feel. I wanted my voice to be heard.  And I wanted all of my friends and family and everyone else to be able to show how they feel and have their voices heard, too.

I showed my idea to my parents. They thought it was a really great idea and they said would help me bring my idea to life.


Then they showed it to some friends and several more friends and we decided to do a crowdfunding Indiegogo campaign to raise the money and awareness needed to make The Power Pom a reality (or a real life every day wearable statement).  
Everyone wanted to help; moms, daughters, grandmas and even a few dads.

But I wanted to do more.  I wanted to make a difference. My mom and I talked about it and I decided that since 51% of the US population is female…

…we would to give 51% of the profits to Planned Parenthood as way to support the health of women and girls! 

We have made a few prototype Power Pom's and want to continue to produce more and more.

You can put The Power Pom on your backpack, purse, stroller, briefcase, bike…anywhere you like.  My hope is that everyone everywhere will want a Power Pom too, to show their support for girls and women and what we believe in every day.  

Get your Pom on now and let your voice be heard.

POWER POM!

story:
Monica and I are childhood friends who are raising our kids in DC. The expense of replacing our kids sports gear was getting so frustrating! The tenth goggle of the summer lost...enough was enough! We asked ourselves: How can we identify the kids gear?..the Sports Stud was born!

A Sports Stud can easily attach to anything! Backpacks, cleats, lacrosse goggles, field hockey goggles, helmets, swimming goggles, etc.!! It is made of a soft silicone for comfort and safety and we have designed it so the designs are interchangeable!

We are starting a campaign because we want to raise funds to:

1.develop a system to create studs that can be customized with a school or club logo or a childs name or monogram, etc. and then pay for the production of the new studs.

2. launch an effective socail media campaign to get the word out about our product.

3. develop more effective marketing, packaging of the product, and displays for retailers.

Our campaign contributors are and will be total studs!! We will share their name on our website (www.sports-studs.com) as well as give them some studly products!!

story:
What is Show Discipline?

Show Discipline is a thought-provoking street wear brand for the mavericks that question the standards set by society.  Show Discipline is for those who believe in deeper meanings, reading between the lines, and thinking outside the box.  Those who Show Discipline believe in seeking out information, rather than accepting that which is fed to them on a daily basis.  Those who Show Discipline stay focused and do not allow the everyday distractions of life to divert them from their goals or knock them off course. 

Initially Show Discipline will be producing basic clothing items such as graphic tees, sweatshirt, and hats.  In addition we will continue to make films and art pieces to create social awareness and promote an artistic lifestyle.  Overtime we aspire to expand the brand into the realm of cut and sew, creating a full collection of men’s and women’s clothing items ranging from outerwear and denim, to leggings and buttons ups.  Eventually we would like to expand even further, to become a full lifestyle brand producing accessories, leather goods, shoes, and even household products and gadgets such as phone cases, towels, clocks, etc. 

 

Why Back this Project?

Show Discipline needs your help to raise brand awareness in order to successfully launch our clothing line

 We will be using the money donated to cover the production costs of a capsule collection that will be strategically distributed and sold to trendsetters, artists, and fashionistas who will promote the brand and spread the message.

Funds will also go toward creating one of a kind art/fashion pieces such as limited edition hand painted and patch worked vests, as well as one of a kind paintings we will place around New York City. 

 We will also be using the funds to cover the costs of basic promotional materials such as business cards, stickers, and flyers.

 

Who is Show Discipline?

Show Discipline is the brainchild of Jay Jefferson and Michelle Sordi.  Jay grew up in Brooklyn, and has always had a finger on the pulse of the streets.  Growing up during the evolution of both hip hop and the street wear phenomenon has given him a deep understanding of the culture of the street wear market.  Jay was formally trained as an artist working in various mediums, from studying at the High School of Art and Design in New York City.  He continued to cultivate his craft by attending FIT to study fashion design.  After school he worked for several fashion companies including Giorgio Armani and FILA, before straying into the real estate market. He eventually established an appraisal company of his own.  In recent years, Jay has decided to make drastic life changes to return to his passions of art and design.  Through his artistic journey he met Michelle and the two established Show Discipline in 2012.

 Michelle on the other hand grew up on Long Island with an infatuation for clothes and design.  She began attending classes in her spare time at the Fashion Institute of Technology when she was 13.  She also attended a fashion design program at a vocational school part time during her junior and senior year of high school, and eventually went on to study fashion design at FIT.  Michelle studied abroad in Milan, Italy during her junior year, where she learned a different approach to design through European training.  She traveled throughout Europe, and was inspired by the art, history, and fashions she saw, which expanded her creativity a geat deal.  After graduation Michelle gained industry experience working for a luxury outerwear company.  During this time she met Jay and decided to take a leap of faith and persue her dream of creating a brand of her own with her new partner in crime.

 

Special Thanks

We would like to give a special thanks to Daniel Holt & Scarecrow Productions (http://scarecrowdancer.blogspot.com/) for filming this video, as well as the wonderful Pam Schneider and Elijah Servance for devoting their time to star in this film.  We would also like to thank Ramy Elsokry (https://soundcloud.com/cleo-in-the-clouds) for his musical contributions.  And last but not least, we would like to thank all of you donating to help us achieve our goal!

 

Follow us 

on Instagram @showdisciplineny 

on tumblr http://www.showdiscipline.com/

like us on facebook http://www.facebook.com/ShowDiscipline

like us on facebook http://www.facebook.com/ShowDiscipline

story:
Hi - We're Michael, Bryan, and Jay!

 

We love sports… maybe even too much.  But we have gotten tired of spending tons of money buying our favorite players' jerseys, only to have those players leave the team through free agency, trades, or even worse reasons.

We think we have a solution!  We want to create a "communal closet" of officially licensed sports jerseys.  

Imagine being able to chip in a few dollars to help us purchase a large inventory of jerseys, then having the ability to "borrow" a jersey whenever you need it!

We are going to start this with the upcoming basketball season.  If you help us reach our funding goal, we will be able to buy 100 officially licensed NBA jerseys of the league's top 10 best selling players. Then we will send you the jerseys (shipping included!) so you can wear real jerseys without the full costs of buying them!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Our goal is purchase 100 jerseys: 50 Adult Large and 50 Youth Large

To satisfy the most people we will be starting with the most popular NBA jerseys:

1.  Derrick Rose, Chicago Bulls

2.  Jeremy Lin, Houston Rockets

3.  Kobe Bryant, Los Angeles Lakers

4.  LeBron James, Miami Heat

5.  Carmelo Anthony, New York Knicks

6.  Dwyane Wade, Miami Heat

7.  Dirk Nowitzki, Dallas Mavericks

8.  Kevin Durant, Oklahoma City Thunder

9.  Blake Griffin, Los Angeles Clippers

10.  Dwight Howard, Los Angeles Lakers

The money we raise will go towards: 

  • Purchasing the jerseys
  • Shipping the jerseys to/from your home
  • Dry Cleaning the jerseys
  • Warehousing the jerseys

We will reward you for contributing to the "communal closet" by allowing you to "borrow" jerseys for a certain amount of time as defined by the rewards on right side of the page!

 

The Impact

 

We believe this is the just the beginning!  If this works, we hope to create new projects for each of the major sports!

So if basketball isn't your sport, don't worry… we will get to you (and maybe if you're feeling generous, you can give a small donation, so we know you're out there!) 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We know this idea might not be for everybody. So if it's not for you, but you know someone who might like it… please help spread the word about our campaign! 

 

THANK YOU!

Jay, Bryan, Michael

story:
My name is Betsy Causey and I am the founder of bcause.... a tee shirt campaign that spreads global awareness through fashion.

We are a for profit LLC acting as a Social Enterprise. Through careful promotions and marketing along with quality tee shirts bcause offers a double bottom threat. Not only will we be making profit, but at the same time we will spread awareness of global issues along with generating donations for organizations. As we grow bcause plans to create jobs, on top of that!

Based out of Asheville, North Carolina myself along with Brook Aswamethi, Eric Barsotti and with a collective of artists, graphic designers, printers and laser cutters will be involved with the campaign.

This is how it all works if the funding goal is met:

We complete and launch our online identity and open sales via our website.

The first 3 shirts are “core” tees created to promote profit for the bcause movement. Essentially this will allow us to generate funds for the production cost of the first “Conscious Collection” and to provide promotions at the same time.

The next step is to raise awareness for selected global issues. We’ll allocate organizations that truly represent the collection’s issue and that will benefit from our donations.

3 shirts will be released in the 1st “Conscious Collection”. Proceeds from this line will generate contributions to its particular cause, in this case the “Clean H20 Movement”.
To be exact, 10% of the “Conscious Collection” will be donated directly to it’s selected organization.

The message will act as a gentle reminder of the true meaning of the shirt, while the artwork accentuates the social issue for each collection.

The color of the bcause logo will be determined by the cause. For example, on the first
collection the logo will be blue.... Representing “Clean H20”.

Our “No Paper Trail” philosophy will stray away from paper produced advertising and rely on Digital Media, with acception to some events we wil be related with. A strong web presence with artistic advertisements and photos by way of Tumblr, Pinterest, twitter, Facebook, instagram, blogger, and other means of social networking is how we will spread the word.

Along with interesting artist collaborations from a variety of backgrounds and relentless digital campaigning, bcause plans to be a global movement.

We are looking for $10,000 and are asking for your support to complete the www.bcausemovement.com site and
to produce the initial batch of tees along with the 1st "Conscious Collection”.

Thanks to everyone for their support and thanks for visiting our Indiegogo page!
